House Name: For rent: House Durgerdammergouw in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Living in Amsterdam countryside,
,Have the best of both worlds: the virtuous of Amsterdam within short distance, while enjoying the peace and quiet of the Dutch countryside and a lush garden surrounding the house. ,
,The house is ideal for a couple or a single. It has a bright and spacious living room with a beautiful unobstructed view over the meadows and spectacular Dutch cloudy skies. The famous painter Rembrandt drew the characteristic church tower in 1650 that can be seen from the house.,
,The open, attractive design kitchen is fully equipped and has a cooking island, a convection oven, freezer and cooking island.,
,The open staircase, especially designed for the house, provides access to the upper floor with a spacious master bedroom, a modern luxury open bathroom with bath, and a separate, modern toilet. The bright open workplace in the same room offers beautiful views.,
,A smaller room serves as a practical walk-in closet for clothes, shoes and laundry facilities. ,
,The house is attractively furnished with sustainable materials and beautiful design furniture. A water descaler provides delicious soft water throughout the house. Floor heating and a wood-burning stove ensure it’s always warm and cosy.,
,The beautiful low-maintenance garden around the house offers sun all day round, as well as plenty of shade.,
Two free parking lots are available and you reach the Park and Ride parking in 5 minutes where you can take the tram in another 10 minutes to the central station of Amsterdam (parking fee only 1 euro). The ring road to all parts of the city or the beach is  just 5 minutes away. Time to business center the Zuidas by car is just 15 minutes. By bike, which you can put on the tram, it takes 15-20 minutes to the city center of Amsterdam.,
Discover this unique property on the edge of Amsterdam and be surprised !,
,

House Name: For rent: Flat Witte de Withstraat 10 B in Den Haag
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,5 FULLY RENOVATED APARTMENTS,
We are proud to offer 5 fully renovated rental apartments in the popular Zeeheldenkwartier. Each apartment features beautiful wooden floors, sleek plastered walls, a luxury kitchen with complete built-in appliances, a modern bathroom, and a private storage unit. Sustainable and natural materials have been used to ensure a warm, luxurious, and contemporary feel. Great care has been taken with the insulation of the complex, which boasts an Energy Label A. Heating and hot water are provided by a central heating combi boiler. Will you be one of the new residents?,
,ZEEHELDENKWARTIER,
The Zeeheldenkwartier is a compact, monumental, and vibrant urban district, highly favored by young professionals. Known for its strong character, creativity, and dynamism, this neighborhood offers charming streets, canals, sunny squares, and stunning Art Nouveau architecture, providing a unique living experience. You’ll find a broad array of shops, cafés, restaurants, galleries, clothing stores, and trendy design shops in Prins Hendrikstraat, Zoutmanstraat, Piet Heinstraat, and Anna Paulownastraat. Seeking tranquility? The hidden Zeeheldentuin offers a green oasis right in the heart of the city.,
,LAYOUT,
Ground Floor: A shared entrance at street level leads to a modern hallway with a marble floor and access to private storage.,
,Second floor,
Upon entering the apartment, you arrive in the hallway which provides access to all rooms. The living room features an open, luxurious kitchen equipped with a refrigerator, freezer, oven/microwave, induction cooktop, and extractor hood. There are 2 bedrooms, both of which provide access to the spacious balcony. Additionally, there is a separate bathroom with a spacious walk-in shower, a fixed washbasin cabinet, and a towel radiator. There is also a separate toilet.,
,INSULATION AND HEATING,
The apartment is fully equipped with double glazing and wall insulation. Heating and hot water are provided by a central heating combi boiler.,
,PARKING,
The apartment is located in an area where a parking permit is required. A parking permit can be applied for at the municipality of The Hague for approximately €95.00 per year, depending on availability and regulations.,
,HIGHLIGHTS,
,
,Living space approx. 65 m²,
,2 bedrooms,
,Energy Label A,
,Upholstered,
,Luxury kitchen with all built-in appliances,
,Fully equipped with parquet flooring,
,Washing machine and dryer to be installed by the tenant,
,Private storage,
,Indefinite contract, minimum 12 months,
,No pets allowed,
,Smoking not allowed,
,Rent: € 2,250.00 exclusive per month (including upholstery and service charges),
,2 months security deposit,
,Available immediately,
,

,Beautiful, characterful family home of approximately 106 m² located in the popular Wittevrouwen district in Utrecht. This spacious house is fully equipped and features a generous living room, a stunning kitchen, 4 bedrooms, a luxurious bathroom, and a separate toilet. Its location on the edge of the city center in the beloved Wittevrouwen neighborhood ensures all amenities are within reach.,
,SURROUNDINGS,
Wittevrouwen is a sought-after, lively neighborhood in Utrecht where historical charm meets modern conveniences. Within walking distance of the city center, the area offers a diverse range of restaurants, cafés, and unique boutique shops, particularly along Biltstraat. This neighborhood appeals to both young professionals and families due to its excellent schools, green spaces like the Griftpark, and superb connections by car and public transport. Wittevrouwen provides the cozy atmosphere of a village combined with the energy and proximity of urban life.,

The staircase in the living room leads to the first floor, which offers access to two well-finished bedrooms and a spacious bathroom with a luxurious bathtub and toilet.,
,Second floor:,
The second floor features two spacious bedrooms with dormer windows, providing ample natural light.,
,Garden:,
The delightful garden can be accessed through the large glass sliding doors at the rear of the property.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Pieter Nieuwlandstraat in Utrecht
Description:

                                                        ,123Wonen, the rental agency of Utrecht, offers a rental term of 8 months:,
,Furnished 4-room house with a roof terrace, located in Tuinwijk on a quiet street near Griftpark, daily shopping facilities, and main access roads.,
,LAYOUT:,
,Entrance with coat closet, stairs to the 1st floor, living room with laminate flooring, hallway to the toilet room, and kitchen with various built-in appliances and a dishwasher. Via the stairs in the hallway, you reach the 2nd floor, with access to the newly renovated bathroom featuring a walk-in shower, sink, natural stone tiles, and a washing machine. ,Tuinwijk is a highly diverse neighborhood, green and family-friendly, with numerous amenities nearby. In the area, you’ll find shops, primary schools, daycare and after-school care facilities, a pharmacy, bike shop, cobbler, flower stand, and various cozy restaurants with takeout options. The Majoor Bosshardt Plantsoen (with Tuinwijk Library and play areas) and Griftpark (with a restaurant, petting zoo, playground, and numerous outdoor sports options) are all close to this home. Additionally, the lively city center and historic Utrecht downtown are just a short bike ride away. Tuinwijk is well-served by public transportation; Overvecht Station is just minutes away by bike, and several main access roads connect to the N230, A27, and A28 on the city’s northeast side. The bus connections to Science Park, city center, and Jaarbeurs are excellent.,

,Kralingen is a posh neighborhood located in the city of Rotterdam. It is situated in the eastern part of the city and is known for its historical significance and diverse character. Kralingen is bordered by the Nieuwe Maas River to the south and is adjacent to the neighborhoods of Crooswijk, Rubroek, and Oude Noorden. The bustling center of Rotterdam and the A16 motorway are easily accessible from the house. Various shops, restaurants, nice cafes and supermarkets are located within walking distance of the house. House Name: For rent: House Maasdijk in Rijswijk (NB)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Rent includes garden maintenance!,
A detached villa located on the old dike that runs from Woudrichem to beyond Rijswijk. From the kitchen and living room a beautiful view over a nature reserve (owned by Brabants Landschap) sandwiched between the said dike and the later constructed water retaining cycle dike. A tranquil piece of nature. Behind the bicycle dike is the dammed up Meuse. A place of pleasant recreation with beaches, swimming water and views of Loevestein Castle. Surely that's what you want!,
,The house, originally built in 1930, was virtually demolished in 2012 and then rebuilt and attached, with a new thatched roof, all under the supervision of architect Frank Ruiter. The result is a beautiful virtually new home, built with first-class materials. Spread over four floors, the house has 383 m² of living space, a huge and comfortable home. The sitting room and large kitchen are located at dike level. From these rooms, you can enjoy the beautiful view. With a bit of luck, you can see the deer walking in the morning. Pheasants and hares are regular visitors.,
,On the third floor there are several bedrooms, including the atmospheric master bedroom. The first floor has been made suitable as an independent flat with a sitting room (now office) bedroom and private bathroom. There is also a large garage here. The garden is large. If you want to live beautifully, close to nature, about 5 kilometres from the access to the A27, within walking distance to the historic fortress of Woudrichem, swimming water and the ferry to Gorinchem, you will find the ideal place here. You are invited.,
,Details;,
- Available from 01-02-2025,
- Breathtaking views,
- 2 bathrooms, 8 bedrooms,
- Ideal property for a short break,
- No house sharing,
- Deposit 2 months rent,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Do you want to live in the new Katendrecht? Then this is your chance!,
,A beautiful spacious and bright apartment of 84 m2 with spacious terrace. This carefully designed apartment is very tastefully decorated and finished to a high standard. The furniture is newly installed in the apartment. The apartment on the third floor has a beautiful view over the water towards the Kop van Zuid.,
,BAYHOUSE is the latest addition to Katendrecht. The new building was completed in 2024 and is fully equipped. With the beautiful view over the Maas and the future-oriented environment, you will live here with a lot of peace and pleasure. The Jumbo Supermarket and the metro are both within walking distance. ,
,The complex is located in the Rotterdam Rijnhaven on peninsula Katendrecht. Among Rotterdammers, this area is known as “De Kaap. This part of the city has seen many developments in recent years. This sailors' neighborhood has been transformed into a living neighborhood. The old elements of the neighborhood come together with the new construction of the city. This gives you a wonderful contrast between historic and modern design. ,
,Rotterdam Rijnhaven is an epicenter of living, working, lifestyle, fashion, art, design, architecture and nightlife. The unmistakable atmosphere of the port, water and dynamism dominates everywhere. Residents of Rotterdam Rijnhaven know themselves surrounded by high end facilities and top design.,
,Layout: ,
,Ground floor:,
Through the entrance you enter the general hall where the mailboxes and elevators are located. Here is also the concierge who can accept packages in your absence. Through the elevator you go to the third floor where the apartment is located. ,
,On floor -2 is the parking garage.,
,Third floor:,
Through the beautiful long hall you have access to all the rooms. On the right side is the master bedroom with double bed, built-in closet and desk/makeup table. On the left side is the second bedroom which can be set up as a guest room or home office. When you walk through you come to the bathroom which has a walk-in shower, sink and bathtub. There is also a separate toilet in the house. At the rear of the house is the living room with open kitchen and access to the spacious balcony. The kitchen is equipped with various appliances including, refrigerator, freezer, microwave and induction hob. ,
,The entire house is luxuriously furnished by a stylist and equipped with all conveniences such as underfloor heating and Domotics for each room (ceiling lighting and temperature setting).,

,Description provided by lessor and conditions:,
,Stylishly finished top floor apartment (77m²) with a spacious roof terrace (24m²) and a separate balcony. The property was recently (2021) renovated to a high standard and features a large bedroom and two smaller bedrooms/workrooms. Located in a characteristic building in the quiet Rivierenbuurt. This apartment has been renovated with attention to detail and offers a pleasant layout with a through-living room, open kitchen, two bedrooms, two separate toilets, and a modern bathroom. In addition, the property also has a balcony and a roof terrace.,
,Second floor: Upon entering the living room, the abundance of natural light immediately catches your eye. The long through-layout, with a bay window facing west at the front and French doors at the rear opening onto the balcony, ensures optimal light throughout the entire length of the room. The choice of beautiful wide plank parquet flooring with underfloor heating, sleek plasterwork, and a Scandinavian finish enhances the space.,
,At both the front and rear of the property, a (bed)room has been created that can be used for various purposes. The room at the rear has access to the balcony.,
,The living kitchen (2021) at the front of the property is designed along the length of the room, featuring a beautiful composite countertop that continues to the kitchen cabinets. It is naturally equipped with all necessary cooking amenities, such as a 5-burner induction cooktop, range hood, combi-oven, boiling water tap (Quooker), dishwasher, fridge/freezer combination, and wine cooler.,
,This floor also includes a separate toilet and centrally located stairs leading to the next floor.,
,Third floor: The third floor features a spacious bedroom, a separate toilet, and a modern bathroom.,
,The bedroom at the front has double French doors leading to a small balcony facing west. The bedroom is equipped with air conditioning (heating and cooling) and a large built-in wardrobe.,
,The modern bathroom (2021) is optimally designed and features a vanity with storage, heated mirror, towel radiator, and a spacious shower.,
,Roof terrace: The generous roof terrace can be accessed via the internal staircase. The roof terrace (24m²) offers a beautiful view over part of the city and faces east, where it is possible to enjoy the sun for long periods in the summer. Additionally, the roof terrace is equipped with electrical connections.,
,Special features:,
,Located in the popular Rivierenbuurt,
,Recently renovated to a high standard (2021),
,1 large bedroom,
,2 small bedrooms/workrooms,
,1 bathroom,
,2 WCs,
,Living area of 77m²,
,Spacious roof terrace of 24m²,
,Separate balconies,

,The rental price is excluding gas/water/electricity, but including service costs.,
,Deposit,
,At the start of the rental agreement, a deposit is required.,
,The apartment will be rented through 'Overbruggingsverhuur'. Overbruggingsverhuur provides a temporary rental agreement for properties. There is no waiting list and we offer well-kept houses for an affordable rent.,
,Rental period,
,The rental period is 35 months.,
,Subject to the bank's approval,
,The property will be rented subject to the bank's approval.,
,General information,
,In order to rent an Overbruggingsverhuur rental house, the tenant has to meet certain conditions. A summary of these conditions is outlined below.,
,Conditions regarding house hold income,
,To meet the income requirement, your net income will need to be approx. 3 times the rental price. Any other payment commitments (for example debt collection agency) will be deducted from the house hold income. Another possibility to meet this requirement is to pay a higher deposit.,

,You can contact the landlord for all these questions.,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,THE HAGUE LEYENBURG: Spacious apartment with 2 bedrooms and a parking spot, available as of 01-01-2025. The property has a living area of approx. 95m² and features a balcony.,
,Interested? Respond via the contact buttons next to this description or send us an email.,
,KEY FEATURES:,
•   Apartment is rented unfurnished,

,AREA:,
Leyenburg is a charming and vibrant neighborhood located in the southwest of The Hague. Known for its diverse and welcoming community, Leyenburg offers a unique mix of urban conveniences and tranquil residential areas, making it an ideal place to live. For nature lovers and sports enthusiasts, Leyenburg boasts various parks and green spaces. The Zuiderpark, one of the largest city parks in the Netherlands, is nearby and offers numerous recreational opportunities such as walking paths, sports fields, and an outdoor swimming pool. This park is a great place for families to enjoy a picnic or a day out. Leyenburg is excellently accessible by both public transport and car. Several tram and bus lines connect the neighborhood to The Hague city center, the beach of Scheveningen, and other important locations. Additionally, the A4 and A12 highways are easily accessible, making travel to other cities simple.,
,Complex "Langs de Ley" has 127 apartments spread over 21 floors. There are 2-, 3-, and 4-room apartments with areas ranging from approximately 60 to 130 m². Particularly attractive is the fact that from the higher floors of the residential tower, you can enjoy views of the beautiful coast or the lively city. This complex was newly built in 2020 and is located right next to the HAGA hospital.,
There is an option to rent a parking space in the communal parking garage. Tenants can also use the shared bicycle storage.,
Because the view from Langs de Ley is beautiful on all sides, a rooftop terrace has been built, which is accessible to everyone renting in the complex.,
,GROUND FLOOR:,
Access via closed porch with mailboxes, doorbells and elevator.,
,FIFTH FLOOR:,
Hall with a separate toilet, a storage room with washing machine connection and the bathroom.,
The spacious living room with open kitchen provides access to the balcony.,
The kitchen is equipped with various built-in appliances such as a dishwasher, combi oven, extractor hood, induction hob and a spacious refrigerator and freezer.,
From the hallway there is access to the two bedrooms.,
The bathroom has a walk-in shower, a bath and a sink with mirror.,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,VIEWING THE PROPERTY,
Unfortunately, it is not possible to request a viewing by phone. To view this property, please respond via email, the application form on our website, or through digital platforms such as ****** and Pararius. We strive to respond as quickly as possible!,
,WELCOME TO THE HAGUE,
In the charming and beautiful district of Benoordenhout, you'll find this stunning and spacious property of approximately 160 m² with a delightful and sunny 25 m² rooftop terrace facing south. The home features a large living room, 5 bedrooms, a spacious luxury open kitchen, a room set up as a laundry room/dressing room, and a bathroom. The property is very well furnished and maintained. This is where you want to live and enjoy!,
,BENOORDENHOUT AREA,
Benoordenhout is a quiet, green, and luxurious district located a short distance from the city center. Throughout the neighborhood, such as on Van Hoytemastraat, Willem Royaardsplein, and Weissenbruchstraat, you will find a wide range of artisanal specialty shops and daily shopping options. Additionally, there are several exclusive fashion and interior design stores and numerous cozy restaurants and cafes to explore. For those who enjoy walking and nature, the nearby Clingendael Estate is the perfect spot. The estate offers beautiful nature, winding paths, and large play areas, ideal for escaping the hustle and bustle of the city. The highlight of Clingendael is the unique Japanese Garden, which is open only a few weeks each year. However, the estate itself is open to the public all year round.,
,LAYOUT,
Ground floor and 1st floor:,
Entrance on the ground floor, stairs to the 1st floor, hallway with toilet, access to the spacious and atmospheric L-shaped living room featuring high ceilings, 2 original fireplaces, and French doors leading to the balcony, elegant open kitchen equipped with various built-in appliances. From the hallway, there is access to the large laundry room which also includes a sizable wardrobe.,
,2nd floor:,
Stairs to the bedroom floor, landing with toilet, this floor features a very bright and spacious rear bedroom with a balcony accessible from the bedroom, smaller bedrooms on both the front and back sides, and a spacious front bedroom. The beautiful bathroom is equipped with a bathtub, separate shower, and washbasin. The children's beds can be replaced with single beds.,
,3rd floor:,
Stairs to the top floor, here is a large room that provides access to the stunning sunny rooftop terrace, an ideal spot for relaxation. The room includes a small kitchenette with a dishwasher.,
,INSULATION AND HEATING,
The current energy label is F; a new energy label is forthcoming and likely to be C. The property is fully equipped with double glazing. Heating and hot water are provided by a central heating combi boiler. There are 4 solar panels installed.,
,PARKING,
The property is located in a permit area. Applying for a parking permit from The Hague municipality costs approximately €95.00 per year, subject to availability and regulations.,
,HIGHLIGHTS,

Leyenburg has various parks and green spaces for nature lovers and sports enthusiasts. The Zuiderpark, one of the largest city parks in the Netherlands, is a short distance away and offers numerous recreational opportunities such as walking paths, sports fields and an open-air swimming pool. This park is a great place for families to enjoy a picnic or a day out. Leyenburg is easily accessible by both public transport and car. Several tram and bus lines connect the district with the center of The Hague, Scheveningen beach and other important locations. In addition, the A4 and A12 highways are easily accessible, which makes traveling to other cities easy.,
,Complex "Langs de Ley" has 127 apartments spread over 21 floors. There are 2-, 3- and 4-room apartments with surfaces from approximately 60 to approximately 130 m². It is particularly attractive that the residential tower offers a view of the beautiful coast or the lively city from the higher floors. This complex was newly built in 2020 and is located right next to the HAGA hospital.,
It is possible to rent a parking space, located in the communal parking garage. You can also use the communal bicycle shed.,
Because the view from Langs de Ley is beautiful on all sides, a roof terrace has been built, which is accessible to everyone who rents in the complex.,
,GROUND FLOOR:,
The communal hall/entrance with doorbells provides access to the apartments, the elevator installation, the stairwell and the parking garage. ,
,TWENTIETH FLOOR:,
Hall with a meter cupboard, a laundry room and a separate toilet and sink. From the hall there is access to all rooms.,
The living room has an open kitchen which is equipped with several built-in appliances such as a dishwasher, oven / microwave, induction hob and fridge-freezer combination.  From here there is access to a private balcony.,
The first spacious bedroom offers enough space for a double bed and a wardrobe. There are two more bedrooms, slightly smaller sized, which can be used as a bedroom, office or dressing room.,
The luxurious bathroom has a sink with mirror, a towel radiator, a shower and a bath.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Haagdijk in Breda
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Unique loft-2 room apartment in the center of Breda.,
The apartment complex "Hip Haagdijk" to which the apartment belongs, has its own closed parking cellar, two closed communal bicycle storage areas and a communal inner garden with garden furniture and BBQ. Residents can use the parking spaces belonging to the complex for their guests through an internal reservation system. The city center of Breda with the Port and the Grote Markt is a few minutes' walk away. The bright apartment is therefore ideally suited for people who love living in style. A large supermarket and many other amenities are just steps away. The station and the roads are also easily and quickly accessible.  ,
,Layout :,
Ground floor:,
General entrance with doorbells, mailboxes and access to the stairwell, the spacious elevator, the parking garage and bicycle storage, as well as the door to the communal garden.  ,
,First floor apartment:,
One enters a hall with tiled floor with access to a separate spacious toilet and a laundry room / storage room. From the hall you walk on to the living room where the steel glass wall with brick half-height wall immediately catches the eye. The bedroom is located behind the glass wall and accessible through a steel glass door. A 'walk-in closet' has been realized between the bedroom and the hall.  ,
,Opposite the bedroom is a bathroom with a large walk-in shower and hanging bathroom furniture. To the right of the bathroom is the semi-open kitchen where you look from the kitchen counter through a large opening in the wall to the living room and outside. The kitchen is tiled with a mosaic tile and equipped with built-in appliances including dishwasher, gas stove and combi oven.,
The apartment looks characteristic due to the high ceilings and the use of different materials in the floors and walls.  ,
,Particularities:,
- Exclusive living in the center,
- Private parking space in underground basement,
- High ceilings (3.30 m) with high windows,
- Modern kitchen and bathroom- Viewings will take place on Monday morning 25-11-2024,
- Contribution service costs € 55 p.m.,
- Deposit 2 months rent,

Stijlvolle en rustige oase in Amsterdam West. Een vier verdiepingen tellend huis met een eigen parkeerplaats.,

◦ Ideale woning voor een koppel of klein gezin. Delen met max twee personen is toegestaan.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Hoofdweg in Amsterdam
Garden: Present (45 m², located on the east)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,FOR RENT:,
Beautiful recently renovated and stylishly furnished ground floor apartment of approx. 73 m2 with a spacious garden, located in the middle of the cozy neighborhood "De Baarsjes"!,
,LAYOUT:,
Small front garden with private entrance on the ground floor. Through the vestibule with wardrobe and modern black steel/mesh door, you enter the hall with a storage room and the meter cupboard for extra storage. Then you enter the very spacious living room with open kitchen. Here you will find a large dining table for 6 people and a cozy sitting area with fireplace. Through the many windows and patio doors you have a beautiful view and access to the garden. The garden is located on the east and is equipped with, among other things, a large dining table where you can dine in the summer. There is also a shed, which is ideal for storage. The luxurious and modern white kitchen with gray hardstone top is equipped with all necessary built-in appliances, the cooking island has a nice bar. The bedroom is located at the front of the house and has enough space for closet space. The bathroom has a spacious walk-in shower, washbasin with furniture, toilet and a washing machine and dryer.,
,There is a beautiful wooden floor throughout the house, the house is rented furnished.,
,PROPERTIES:,
- Available from December 1, 2024,
- Rental price excluding user charges,
- Deposit 2 months rent,
- Type of rental contract Model-A (indefinite period),
- Surface area approximately 73 m2 (GO),
- Garden of approximately 45 m2 with garden shed,
- 1 spacious bedroom,
- Modern fitted kitchen with cooking island and bar,
- Delivery furnished and upholstered,
- Not suitable for house sharers,
- Rental subject to approval by owner,
,LOCATION:,
De Hoofdweg is located in the "De Baarsjes" district in Amsterdam West and close to many amenities. For example, the recently renovated Mercatorplein and the Jan Evertsestraat with a variety of shops and eateries are within walking distance. You can also walk into the green Rembrandtpark for a lovely walk or head to the Ten Kate fresh market for groceries. The centre of Amsterdam can be reached in about 10 minutes by bike. The public transport facilities are excellent with the various bus and tram lines and they run frequently to and from various surrounding stations. In addition, you can reach the Ring A-10, A-4 and A-9 motorways in no time. Parking facilities are available in the street.,

House Name: For rent: House Johannes Verhulststraat in Amsterdam
Garden: Present (90 m², located on the south)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,A truly unique five-story townhouse that perfectly balances modern luxury and charming character.,
,This impressive property, located in one of Amsterdam's most desirable neighborhoods, offers a generous living space of 346 m² (196 & 150 m²). It features two separate entrances, a sunny 90 m² garden, a spacious roof terrace, and multiple balconies. With 7 bedrooms, 3 stylish bathrooms, 5 toilets, and 2 fully equipped kitchens, this home is ideal for a large family — and perfectly suited to provide additional space for a nanny or au pair. A rare opportunity to enjoy space, comfort, and style in the heart of Amsterdam.,
,BEL-ÉTAGE (Elevated Ground Floor), At the back of the property, there is a bright living room with French doors leading to a balcony, which provides access to the low-maintenance, sheltered 90 m² garden. Facing south, this garden offers sun all day. At the front, you'll find a modern kitchen fully equipped with conveniences such as a 6-burner stove, a luxury coffee machine, and a combination oven. This floor also has a separate toilet.,
,SOUTERRAIN (Lower Ground Floor), The stairs from the bel-etage lead down to the souterrain, which includes 2 spacious bedrooms. These rooms are quiet and dark due to their basement location, ensuring a good night's sleep. This floor also features a bathroom with a toilet, walk-in shower, and a sink with a mirror. A beautiful wooden floor runs throughout the apartment, with recessed lighting in the ceiling.,
,FIRST FLOOR, Here you’ll find two spacious rooms (25 m² at the front and 20 m² with a balcony at the back). Both rooms have access to a large, modern (second) bathroom with a bathtub, separate walk-in shower, sink with a mirror, and a toilet. There is a separate laundry area with space for a washing machine and dryer.,
,SECOND FLOOR, This floor has a living room at the front with large windows that allow plenty of natural light. The open kitchen at the back is fully equipped with a 5-burner gas stove with an oven, built-in oven and microwave, a dishwasher, and access to a balcony.,
,THIRD FLOOR, The third floor offers three bedrooms and a spacious bathroom with a double sink, toilet, shower, and bathtub.,
,FOURTH FLOOR, Here, you can enjoy the large 29 m² roof terrace with stunning views.,
,LOCATION, This townhouse is located in a sought-after, attractive residential area with grand and stylish homes and apartments, with numerous amenities within walking distance, such as Vondelpark, the Concertgebouw, Museumplein with its renowned museums, and chic boutiques. You’ll also find high-quality shops on Cornelis Schuytstraat, Van Baerlestraat, and P.C. Hooftstraat, as well as trendy restaurants and nightlife options nearby.,
,ACCESSIBILITY, A 10-minute bike ride brings you to the city center or the Zuid-As. Excellent public transport links are close by, and parking is available with a permit. By car, both the A-10 and A-4 motorways are easily accessible. Schiphol Airport is only a 20-minute drive away.,
,SPECIAL FEATURES,
,
,Unfurnished;,
,Located in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid,
,Walking distance from Vondelpark,
,Two separate units rented together as a full townhouse,
,Total living area of 346 m²,
,Rental price: €15,000 per month,
,Deposit of two months’ rent,
,90 m² garden, three balconies, and a 29 m² roof terrace,
,3 bathrooms and 2 kitchens,
,Total of 7 bedrooms.,
,

House Name: For rent: Flat Jan van Foreeststraat in Utrecht
Garden: Present (13 m², located on the north-west)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,In the Dichterswijk, right on the Central Station of Utrecht, near the old city center and on the water. Despite the central location in this bustling city there are several communal terraces on the water and on the roof that provide a lot of peace and privacy. The city center can be reached within a few minutes via the Moreelse bridge. In the district you can find various shops and restaurants.,
,There are more than sixty car parking spaces on the green area, and there are several terraces and places to relax. There are also various underground waste containers at the entrance of the site.,
,In the basement of the building there is a large and easily accessible bicycle shed with a capacity of approximately 350 bicycles. You can get directly to the main staircase and the elevator via the bicycle shed. There are also about 150 storage spaces in the basement. On the ground floor there is a 'Miele Laundrette' equipped with washing and drying machines for residents. On the fifth floor are two communal roof terraces that offer a magnificent view over the city.,
,The apartments,
The smaller apartments with a floor area of approximately 30 m2 have a free height of approximately 3.5 meters. To make optimum use of this height, these houses are equipped with a living room furniture. The following facilities are combined in a compact manner: bed, shower, washbasin, toilet, wardrobe, bookcases, TV cabinet and kitchen. Because the bed is located above there is extra space for the living room. As a result, the living space of these apartments is comparable to homes of approximately 40 m2. In addition to the apartments that are equipped with a living room, two-room apartments are located in the basement which are located directly on the water. On the top floor are the three-room apartments with private roof terraces.,
,The delivery level of the apartments is high-quality. For example, the entire building is insulated according to the latest standards and all dwellings are equipped with both floor and wall finishes, curtains, luxury kitchen and sanitary facilities. The kitchens are equipped with Siemens appliances including an oven-microwave combination, dishwasher and fridge with freezer. Furthermore, all houses are equipped with a video intercom system, a private meter cupboard and fiber optic connection.,
,Apartment specific:,
This apartment is located in the basement on the water. At this level is also the joint bicycle storage and storage. Layout: From the hall there is access to the different rooms: the living room, the bedroom, the bathroom and the storage room. Near the front door is a video / intercom system for access control in general main entrance. The living room has a luxury open kitchen with ceramic hob, extractor, fridge / freezer, dishwasher and microwave. The bedroom offers space for placing a double bed and a wardrobe. The bathroom has a shower, sink and toilet. At some of the apartments in the basement there is a separate toilet and most have their own storage room in the house with a connection for a washing machine.,

,
,Rent includes carpeting and exclusive optional parking of 110 per month.,
,Rent is excluding gas / water / electricity / tv / internet,

House Name: For rent: House Bollenhofsestraat in Utrecht
Garden: Present (23 m², located on the north)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Spacious and Charming 6-Bedroom Home in Strategic and Family-Friendly Wittevrouwen neighbourhood, Utrecht,
,Description,
,This family home from 1895 is located in the middle of one of the most pleasant neighbourhoods in Utrecht. With 6 work/bedrooms and a spacious extension, in a house that was completely renovated in 2021, this is an ideal home for a family who wants to discover the pleasant life of Utrecht. The Griftpark is nearby, with a spacious playground and always fun activities, which is ideal for the weekend. The centre of Utrecht is within walking distance and by bike within a few minutes at Utrecht CS for example if you work in Amsterdam. The garden has just been redone.,
,Notes: No Pets, No Students, No Sharing,
,Lay-out,
,Ground Floor,
Upon entering the house, you’ll find an open kitchen equipped with essential appliances and ample cupboard space for storage. Adjacent to the kitchen is a spacious living room, perfect for relaxing and spending time with family. At the back of the house, there’s a versatile room that can be used for various purposes, with direct access to the back garden. A separate toilet is in the hall next to the stairs leading to the upper floors.,
,First Floor,
Upstairs, the landing hall connects to three bedrooms. The bedroom at the rear of the house has access to a small terrace, offering an outdoor space for fresh air. The centrally located bathroom features a tub, walk-in shower, double washbasin, and an additional toilet.,
,Second Floor,
On the top floor, there are three more bedrooms connected by the landing hall. This floor also includes a small storage space, providing extra room for storing personal belongings.,
,Location,
,The house is located in the highly sought-after Wittevrouwen neighbourhood, known for its charm and vibrant community. This area offers a wide array of amenities within walking distance, including the popular ice cream parlor Roberto Gelato, Koffie75, restaurant Goesting, and Gastmaal Café. The lively Biltstraat is just around the corner, lined with cozy cafés, diverse restaurants, supermarkets, and specialty shops. Families will appreciate the proximity to several primary schools, daycare centres, and playgrounds, with the Jenaplan school just around the corner. The beautiful Griftpark is also nearby, offering green spaces and recreational opportunities. The neighbourhood is well-connected by public transport, with the city centre just a short drive away, making it a convenient and delightful place to live.,
,Transportation,
,The property offers excellent transportation options, with the city centre just a short walk away. A bus stop on Biltstraat, within walking distance, provides convenient connections to De Uithof and Central Station. Additionally, the accessibility to major arterial roads is ideal, allowing you to reach the bustling Voorstraat and the heart of Utrecht in just a few minutes by car. The train station is also nearby, making commuting and travel effortless.,
,Amenities,
,- Easy access to public transport,
- The house is conveniently located in the child-friendly neighbourhood "Wittevrouwen neighbourhood",
- Near various amenities such as childcare, schools, playgrounds, shopping centre and highways.,
- Double shower with associated central heating (from 2021), two mechanical ventilation systems for air regulation.,

Description:

Unfortunately, it is not possible to schedule a viewing by phone. If you would like to view this property, please contact us via email, fill out the request form on our website, or use digital platforms like ****** and Pararius. We will do our best to respond as quickly as possible!,
,WELCOME TO THE HAGUE,
Located in the charming Valkenboskwartier, close to Fahrenheitstraat, this beautiful and very well-maintained double upper house spans approximately 100 m². The apartment features an atmospheric living room with an open kitchen equipped with all built-in appliances, 3 bedrooms, a lovely bathroom, and a spacious 16 m² terrace where you can enjoy the sun. Will you be the new resident of this delightful home?,
,NEIGHBORHOOD - VALKENBOSKWARTIER,
The Valkenboskwartier in The Hague is a lively and historic neighborhood with a distinctive character. The streets are lined with stately, often pre-war buildings with traditional Hague facades and charming details such as bay windows, ornaments, and high ceilings. This gives the area an authentic and timeless appeal. All daily shopping options are within easy reach, particularly in the friendly Fahrenheitstraat. A 15-minute bike ride brings you to the old city center, where you’ll find all the shops, cinemas, museums, restaurants, cafés, and vibrant nightlife. Additionally, public transportation is conveniently located for quick and easy connections.,
,ACCESSIBILITY,
The location is good. The old city center of The Hague is easily accessible by bike. Public transportation in The Hague is very well organized, with a tram or bus stop always nearby, making it easy to get to Central Station, from where you can reach all parts of the city. Scheveningen is also easily accessible by bike or tram. The location is conveniently situated near all main roads (A12 and N44).,
,LAYOUT,
Ground floor: Private entrance at street level with a hallway and stairs to the first floor.,
,1st Floor:,
Hallway with a separate toilet and washbasin. Cozy and bright living room with a dining area at the back. Beautiful open kitchen equipped with a refrigerator/freezer, induction cooktop, extractor hood, combination oven/microwave, and dishwasher. The kitchen provides access to the spacious terrace of approximately 16 m².,
,2nd Floor:,
Stairs from the living room lead to the sleeping floor. This floor includes a large bedroom at the front and two bedrooms at the back. The modern bathroom features a bathtub, separate shower, vanity with sink, and a designer radiator. On the landing, there is a separate toilet with a washbasin and a laundry room with a washing machine.,
,INSULATION AND HEATING,
Eenrgy Label E. Fully double-glazed. Heating and hot water are supplied by a central heating boiler.,
,PARKING,
The property is located in a permit zone. Parking permits can be requested from the municipality of The Hague, costing approximately €95.00 per year, subject to availability and regulations.,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Beautiful bright apartment with character and comfort in the heart of Amsterdam East. With its spacious layout, luxurious amenities and lively environment, this apartment offers the best of Amsterdam East. An ideal home for those who love comfort, coziness and a vibrant neighborhood full of activities and facilities.,
,This beautiful apartment is in a prime location in the popular Oost neighborhood and offers everything you are looking for in a city home. With three spacious bedrooms, this apartment offers plenty of flexibility for both families and professionals. The layout, modern finishes and the cozy atmosphere of the neighborhood make this apartment highly recommended!,
,Layout,
Third floor,
Via the stairwell you reach the third floor, where a bright, open kitchen flows seamlessly into the spacious living room. The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances and offers enough space for delicious cooking and dining. From the living room you have access to one of the two balconies, where you can enjoy the sun.,
,Fourth floor,
One floor higher you will find two spacious bedrooms, both of which provide access to the second balcony. In addition to the bedrooms, there is an extra room that is ideal as a work or hobby room and can also serve as an extra bedroom. The luxurious bathroom on this floor features high-quality finishes and provides a relaxing place to start or end the day.,
,Environment,
This apartment is located in a vibrant neighborhood full of amenities and character:,
,The apartment is located in a lively area with everything within easy reach. Directly opposite is the Coffee Company, the meeting place for local residents of all ages. Here you can enjoy a cozy atmosphere with delicious coffee, delicacies and good conversations. A little further on you will find Het Badhuis, a popular spot on the corner that is open all day. Whether you fancy a cup of coffee and breakfast in the morning, a tasty lunch in the afternoon, dinner in the evening or a drink with a DJ later in the evening, Het Badhuis offers it all.,
,The pleasant Javastraat, known for its diversity of shops and restaurants, is on the doorstep. Whether you are looking for local delicacies or want to discover the flavors of world cuisines, you will find it all in this street. The neighborhood is also easily accessible; the bus and tram stop in front of the door, and you can be at Central Station within 15 minutes. Muiderpoort station is also within walking distance.,
,The Flevopark is just a five-minute walk away, a green oasis where you can enjoy a walk, picnic or exercise. The neighborhood also has an active community spirit, with a neighborhood committee that regularly organizes cultural activities.,
,With its spacious layout, luxurious amenities and lively environment, this apartment offers the best of Amsterdam East. An ideal home for those who love comfort, coziness and a vibrant neighborhood full of activities and facilities.,

It is located 4.6 km from the amusement park De Efteling.,

,First floor:,

,Spacious and Private Garden: The garden is completely fenced, so you have plenty of privacy and can enjoy nature in peace. The wooded area and the beautifully landscaped garden give a wonderfully relaxed feeling.,
,The accommodation has a garden, a terrace and offers free private parking and WiFi.,
,It is very suitable for both short and long stays, making it an excellent choice.,
,The rental price is €2700,- including an advance payment for energy (excluding underfloor heating), internet/TV, service costs, upholstery, furniture, white goods bed linen and cleaning once every 2 weeks. There is also a gardener every week for garden maintenance. Pellets are supplied for the pellet stove. The costs for municipal taxes and other levies are also excluded. There is no use of gas in the property.,

,

,14 solar panels available.,

House Name: For rent: Flat ms. van Riemsdijkweg in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Ms. Van Riemsdijkweg, Amsterdam/Pontkade (apprx. 88m2) € 2955,- excl. G/W/E and including private parking,
,Always wanted to live in the city and by the water? Look no further; because living on Pontkade makes both possible. This completely newly completed and beautifully designed 3-room flat offers all the benefits of living in Amsterdam as well as peace, space and spectacular views from the fifth floor with private parking!,
,The apartment is superbly finished: light grey tiled floor with underfloor heating, black window frames, electric blinds, curtains, a luxury kitchen with Siemens appliances and a comfortable ultramodern bathroom. Through the hall you reach the living room and open kitchen, which is very spacious and bright thanks to the high windows. Enjoy breathtaking views from the spacious terrace (28m2) over the Amsterdam IJ. The open kitchen is equipped with all the necessities such as an oven/microwave, induction hob, dishwasher, fridge, freezer and a Quooker. The first bedroom is particularly spacious and gives access to the terrace. The second bedroom is also spacious and is ideal to use as a children's or study. The bathroom is extremely luxurious and equipped with a very spacious walk-in shower and beautiful washbasin. There is also a separate toilet. ,
,The apartment has modern features such as an intercom and heat-back-win system, mechanical ventilation and double curtain rails, giving it a luxurious feel. Moreover, the flat has a private parking space under the building and a storage room. Finally, you can enjoy the attractive courtyard garden which provides plenty of outdoor space to enjoy the sun.,
,Living on Pontkade, that's ‘Urban Chic Living’. These apartments are located on the populair NDSM werf right on the IJ in Amsterdam and features tiled floors, modern sleek walls and unique views of on the IJ. A relief to live both spacious, light and quiet with wide views and at the same time be so close to the city centre. Living on Pontkade also means lively and colourful living within walking distance of hotspots such as Pllek, the IJhallen and the Veronicaschip. This ‘upcoming’ residential area has all the necessities for comfortable living, such as supermarkets (Albert Heijn), event venues, hotels and many catering establishments like Loetje, Bagels and Beans, Cannibale Royale and many more. Several sports facilities are located around the corner, including a padel club. The Pontkade can be seen directly on the harbour where several ferries make the direct connection to Amsterdam CS and the Houthavens every 10 minutes. Pontkade is part of 4 buildings around a central courtyard garden, a green oasis that completes the living experience and is mainly situated in 2 towers with phenomenal views over the city.,
,In short, a unique property in a beautiful location in Amsterdam!,

House Name: For rent: Flat Cornelis Houtmanstraat 23 in Den Haag
Garden: Present (65 m², located on the south-west)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,INTERESTED,
It is not possible to schedule a viewing by phone. To view this property, please submit your request via email, our website’s application form, or through digital platforms such as ****** and Pararius. We will do our best to respond as quickly as possible!,
,WELCOME TO THE HAGUE,
Located in the charming and popular Bezuidenhout neighborhood, this beautiful and stylishly furnished apartment of approximately 80 m² features a delightful 65 m² garden facing southwest. The apartment includes a cozy living room (with an option to create a second bedroom), one bedroom, an open kitchen, and a modern bathroom. The entire property has underfloor heating and triple glazing. The rental term is for a maximum of one year, making this an ideal place to live and enjoy!,
,AREA – Bezuidenhout,
Situated in the highly desirable and trendy Bezuidenhout neighborhood, right in the center of The Hague, this area has everything you could wish for. Here you’ll find the lively Theresiastraat with its variety of shops, cafes, and restaurants. At the heart of the neighborhood lies the famous and historic Haagse Bos, where Huis ten Bosch Palace is located. This is the perfect spot for a run, a picnic by the water, or a stroll among beautiful, old trees – a green oasis within the city! Public transportation is excellent in The Hague, with trams and buses always nearby to take you quickly to Central Station, from which the entire city is accessible. The property is conveniently located near major highways (A12 toward Utrecht and N44 + A4 toward Amsterdam).,
,LAYOUT,
Ground Floor,
The entrance hall provides access to all rooms. The cozy and inviting living room has French doors that open onto the sunny garden. The lovely open kitchen is equipped with all necessary appliances, including an induction cooktop with extractor, oven, dishwasher, and refrigerator/freezer. The spacious bedroom at the front of the apartment can also serve as a workspace. The comfortable bathroom features a walk-in shower, vanity unit, and toilet. A closet in the living room houses the washing machine.,
,INSULATION AND HEATING,
The property has an energy rating of A+++. It is fully equipped with triple glazing and underfloor heating. Heating and hot water are supplied via a ventilation heat pump boiler. The apartment was built in 1928.,
,FIXED UTILITY PAYMENT,
The tenant will pay a monthly advance of €150,00 for water, electricity, internet, and cleaning (once per month). This payment is fixed.,
,PARKING,
The apartment is located in a permit parking area. A parking permit can be requested from The Hague Municipality for approximately €95,00 per year, subject to availability and regulations.,
,HIGHLIGHTS,

House Name: For rent: Flat Prinsengracht in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Prinsengracht, Amsterdam/ Grachtengordel (apprx. 135m2) € 3150,- excl. G/W/E,
,Renovated and spacious two-bedroom apartment on a unique location on the Prinsengracht in the heart of Amsterdam's historic centre! The apartment is located on the 3rd & 4th floor of a completely renovated canal house. The property will be delivered furnished and is available for an indefinite period. ,
,Entrance takes place in the hallway, which provides access to the very spacious living room and open kitchen at the front of the apartment with generous views of the Amsterdam canals. The front windows are fitted with solar control glass and electric blinds. The living room has a sofa, large flat-screen TV and sitting and dining area. The modern open kitchen is equipped with all conveniences such as an oven/microwave combination, built-in fridge with freezer compartment, dishwasher, induction hob and plenty of storage space. The kitchen can also be used as a comfortable kitchen bar. A staircase from the living room leads to the second floor, which is very spacious. The second floor can be used for various purposes.,
,At the rear of the apartment is the bedroom, which is equipped with a wardrobe. The bathroom has a luxurious walk-in shower, washbasin and mirror. There is also a separate toilet. There is also a laundry room in the hallway.,
,Prinsengracht is part of Amsterdam's historic canals, which dates back to the 17th century. The canals breathe history and is known as a charming, quiet but also lively canal. Various catering establishments, supermarkets and various shops are located within a stone's throw. Moreover, the very popular neighbourhood De Jordaan, which is part of the bustling city centre, is also just around the corner. This unique location in the city provides excellent public transport connections throughout the rest of the city. Various bus, tram and metro stops are within walking distance and Amsterdam Central Station is easy to reach by bicycle.,
,In short, this property offers a unique opportunity to be part of Amsterdam city life!,

,Description,

                                                        ,Fantastic, completely renovated double-level ground floor apartment in Amsterdam Zuid, featuring many authentic details characteristic of the Amsterdam School style. Various restaurants such as George Bistro, Neni, and Ferilli's are within walking distance. There is easy access to the A-10 ring road, and the Vondelpark and Beatrixpark are within reach. There is also a separate bathroom accessible from the hallway, with a walk-in shower and spacious vanity unit.,

Situated close to Bentwoud, various public amenities, public transport connections, and major highways to The Hague, Rotterdam, and Utrecht, this is an ideal apartment in the Randstad area.,

It is also worth mentioning that the washing machine and dryer connections are located separately in the spacious utility room within the apartment, keeping the bathroom uncluttered with only the essential fixtures.,

,

,This property scores sufficient points in the WWS point system to be offered in the private sector. A current points breakdown will be made available to the tenant at the start of the lease.,
,This property has an A+++ energy label.,
,This property includes a spacious storage room on the ground floor of the complex.,
,Free parking is available in the immediate vicinity of the building.,
,
,SELECTION PROCEDURE:,
,Rotsvast determines which candidates responded first based on incoming emails. Given the expected high volume of responses, not all candidates can be invited. This email must contain at least the following information:,
,
,Name(s) of tenant(s),
,Description of household composition,
,Gross annual income of tenant(s),
,
,Responses that do not meet these requirements will not be processed.,
,Viewings are scheduled in the order in which responses are received; space is limited.,
,After the viewing, income and reliability screenings will be conducted through various (public) registers. Tenants must fully complete this screening with the best possible score, 5 stars, in our screening tool (Properize). The choice to rent the property to candidates is entirely up to the owner of the property. If multiple candidates pass the screening successfully, the choice will be based on income, screening results, and the personal situation of the tenant. As a tenant, you will have the opportunity to explain your personal situation during the screening.,
,Candidates who are not selected for the property after screening are entitled to further clarification and can review the screening report.,
,PLEASE NOTE:, Rotsvast represents the interests of the owner, who prefers to rent by the available date. After completing the screening, Rotsvast will promptly propose a dossier to the owner. If a dossier is already accepted, subsequent completed dossiers will not be considered in the process. It is the responsibility of candidate tenants to submit a complete dossier as quickly as possible. Rotsvast will not actively inform tenants about the progress of the ongoing screening process of other candidate tenants. In a competitive housing market, Rotsvast assumes that candidate tenants are aware of the importance of acting promptly.,
,Are you interested in this rental property? Contact Rotsvast Gouda to schedule an appointment!,

,Description,

De woning is zeer netjes en ook erg geschikt voor een expat gezin. De woning wordt gestoffeerd opgeleverd met complementair een wasmachine en wasdroger. De woning is keurig afgewerkt en valt direct te betrekken.,
De woning heeft 4 kamers waarvan 3 ruime slaapkamers. Alle kamers hebben een coax aansluiting voor (digitale)televisie en de woning kan ook worden aangesloten op een glasvezel netwerk voor internet met 1 gigabit up en down snelheid.,
Verder heeft de woning 2 badkamers (waarvan er 1 ensuite de slaapkamer beneden zit) met daarin een toilet en ligbad met douche en een apart toilet in de hal beneden! Ook is er nog een ruime berging met opbergkast.,

De A6 snelweg is in 4 minuten te bereiken en Amsterdam ligt 12 minuten verder.,
Met het openbaar vervoer is Amsterdam Zuid in 39 minuten te bereiken en Amsterdam centraal station in 41 minuten.,
,Begane grond:,
Entree via de hal met garderobekast en een apart toilet. Daarnaast is de toegang tot de ruime woonkamer met veel licht door de grote raam partijen aan de voor en achterkant.,
Direct aan de woonkamer is de luxe open keuken voorzien van een vaatwasser, magnetron met oven, koelkast met aparte vriezer en een 4 pits koopplaat met afzuigkap. De keuken heeft ook diverse kastjes inclusief een le mans kast onder de trap zodat er veel ruimte is voor het opslaan voor keukengerei.,
Naast de woonkamer is een ruime slaapkamer waarvan de wanden gemakkelijk te verwijderen zijn zodat deze om te bouwen valt naar b.v. een eetkamer. De slaapkamer heeft een eigen badkamer met toilet en ligbad met douche en daarnaast een wasruimte met de complementaire wasmachine en wasdroger.,
De woonkamer bied toegang tot de patio aan de achterkant met een ligging op het zuid westen waar het 's zomers heerlijk vertoeven is in alle privacy.,
De ruime berging aan de zijkant van de woning is zowel vanuit de patio bereikbaar als via de voorkant van de woning.,
De gehele begane grond is voorzien van een mooie tegelvloer met een luxe uitstraling.,
De trap naar de 1e verdieping zit heel gunstig centraal aan de woonkamer.,
,1e verdieping:,
Een lange en lichte hal met aangrenzend een ruime badkamer met daarin een toilet, ligbad met douche, een aparte douchecabine en dubbele spoelbakken, opbergkasten en designradiator. Ook zijn er 2 ruime slaapkamers bereikbaar via de hal. De hal en slaapkamers zijn voorzien van een nette laminaatvloer.,
,Engels;,
Description,
,Soon this single-family home in the Literatuurwijk is available within walking distance of the international primary school Letterland, daycare center, public transport, a large Vomar supermarket, Actifit wellness center and gym and pharmacy Archipel.,
The property is very neat and also very suitable for an expat family. The house will be delivered unfurnished with a washing machine and tumble dryer complementary. The house is nicely finished and ready to move into.,
The property has 4 rooms including 3 spacious bedrooms. All rooms have a coax connection for (digital) television and the home can also be connected to a fiber optic network for internet with 1 gigabit up and down speed.,
Furthermore, the house has 2 bathrooms (one of which ensuite to the bedroom below) with a toilet and bath with shower and a separate toilet in the hall below! There is also a spacious store room with storage cupboard.,
,The house is in a very child-friendly street with no cars passing by and with a playing field next door. You can park your cars 20 meters away in the adjacent street.,
The A6 motorway can be reached within 4 minutes and Amsterdam is 12 minutes away.,
Amsterdam station Zuid can be reached in 39 minutes by public transport and Amsterdam Central Station in 41 minutes.,
,Ground floor:,
Entrance through the hall with wardrobe and a separate toilet. In addition, access to the spacious living room with lots of light through the large windows at the front and back.,
Directly next to the living room is the luxurious open kitchen with a dishwasher, microwave with oven, fridge with separate freezer and a 4-burner plate with cooking hood. The kitchen also has various cupboards including a le mans cupboard under the stairs so that there is plenty of room for storing kitchen utensils.,
Next to the living room is a spacious bedroom that can also be easily converted into for example a dining room by removing the bedroomwalls. The bedroom has its own bathroom with toilet and bathtub with shower, as well as a laundry room with the complementary washing machine and dryer.,
The living room has access to the patio at the back via a sliding door which is oriented on the south west where it is wonderful to spend the summer in privacy.,
The spacious storage room on the side of the house is accessible both from the patio and through the front of the house.,
The entire ground floor has a beautiful tiled floor with a luxurious appearance.,
The stairs to the 1st floor are very conveniently located centrally in the living room.,
,1st floor:,
A long and light hall with an adjoining spacious bathroom with a toilet, bath with shower, a separate shower cabin and double sinks, storage cupboards and design radiator. There are also 2 spacious bedrooms accessible via the hall. The hall and bedrooms have a nice laminate floor.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Johannes Verhulststraat in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Johannes Verhulststraat, Amsterdam (approx. 140m2) € 4.750,- Excl. electricity, heating and water,
,Ultra-luxury and high-quality finished double upstairs apartment of over 140 m2 on the second and third floor in the heart of Oud-Zuid! Located on the corner with Emmastraat, in the characteristic Albert Heijn building, this very spacious, amazing apartment boasts a tasteful finish and lots of natural light. The apartment has a herringbone floor with infrared underfloor heating and a sunny private roof terrace. Completely renovated, making you the first resident since the renovation.,
,Entrance hall with access to the spacious living room with many windows and modern open kitchen. The living and dining areas are practically separated from each other by the authentically restored en-suite doors. The chic open kitchen is equipped with various high-end built-in appliances, such as a fridge-freezer combination, Miele combi oven, induction hob with extractor system, Quooker and a dishwasher. The kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space because the kitchen cupboards reach the ceiling. In the hall there is also a separate guest toilet and the open staircase provides access to the third floor. On the landing there are fitted wardrobes and no fewer than three bedrooms. There are also two bathrooms on this floor. The bathroom with bath, walk-in shower and washbasin can be reached from the master bedroom. The second bathroom has a walk-in shower and toilet and is accessible from the landing. The open staircase from the landing provides access to the roof terrace of no less than 24 m2.,
,This apartment is located in a truly prime location, exactly between the two elegant districts of Willemspark and the Museum Quarter. Recognizable by its beautiful avenues, charming bakeries and chic restaurants. With direct access to some of Amsterdam's most popular attractions, such as the Vondelpark, the beautiful Rijksmuseum and the Concertgebouw, all of which can be reached on foot in 15 minutes or less. Sufficient public transport connections, including bus and tram lines, are at your disposal.,

Description:

,Are you looking for an inspiring place to live and study or work in The Hague? We offer a beautiful home and a flex space, ideal for students or creatives looking for a comfortable and efficient solution. Both the house and the flex place are centrally located and easily accessible by public transport or highway.  ,

,The flex space,
The flex space features include printers, good coffee, toilets and an outdoor area.  ,
,Costs and support,
As a tenant, you choose one package in which you purchase two services, each with its own contract. You pay a fixed price for this package. This is a cost-effective solution compared to renting a separate office/study space in the city, which often carries higher costs and offers less convenience.  ,

The studio is located on the second floor. It has an open kitchen with appliances, a lovely sitting area and a loft with a comfortable bed. The studio also has a separate bathroom with shower, sink and toilet. The shared laundry room can be found in the hallway.  ,
,We look forward to welcoming you to your new home and workplace!,

,
,SURROUNDINGS,
The Geuzen and Statenkwartier is a popular urban district in The Hague where many international organizations and expats are located. Wide avenues run through the district with beautiful squares and lively streets in between. Here you will also find the popular shopping street Frederik Hendriklaan and a diverse range of restaurants. Feel like getting a breath of fresh air with a fantastic view of the sea? The boulevard of Scheveningen and the Pier are a stone's throw away. And you don't have to travel far for a walk in the greenery either. The Westduinpark and the Scheveningse Bosjes are nearby. Here you can enjoy walking, sports, boating or in spring and summer enjoy a culinary festival such as the Parade, TREK or DORST. On Frederik Hendriklaan, also called 'De Fred' by the locals, you will find a shopping area with a very wide selection. From fruit and vegetable stalls to supermarkets and from well-known chain stores to trendy boutiques. You can also go there for a good coffee and a tasty lunch or meal. Also in the nearby Aert van der Goesstraat you will find many (often small independent) stores. And on the bike you can be downtown within fifteen minutes.,
,PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION,
,
,Streetcar 1 (World Forum),
,Bus 28,
,

House Name: For rent: Flat Westermarkt in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,The apartment is situated in a unique location in the Felix Meritisbuurt in the Grachtengordel-West. From the living room you can enjoy a spectacular view of the Westermarkt, Westerkerk, Westertoren, the Prinsengracht and the Keizersgracht.,
,The apartment is situated on the third floor of a small-scale complex and has a living area of 67 m². At the rear, the house has a lovely, spacious balcony facing south.,
,The house is within walking distance of the Dam and a variety of other nice shops, restaurants, bars and other entertainment venues. Furthermore, the popular Negen Straatjes and the Jordaan can also be reached on foot. And not unimportant, public transport stops practically in front of the door. Like the entire city centre within the Singelgracht, this house has also been designated as a Nationally Protected Cityscape.,
,LOCATION,
,This 3-room apartment is situated in a prime location in the heart of the city centre, with a view of the Westerkerk. From the Westermarkt you can easily walk to the Dam and there are numerous cafes, supermarkets, gyms, restaurants, shops and markets in the area. For example, on Mondays there is the Noordermarkt with antiques, second-hand goods, clothing, flowers and fresh produce and on Saturdays the usual fresh market on the Lindengracht with organic products on the Noordermarkt. The famous Nine Streets with special shops and boutiques are also around the corner. For your daily shopping you can go to the Albert Heijn diagonally below the house.,
,ACCESSIBILITY,
,The apartment is very easily accessible by car from the A-10 ring road (S106, S108). Tram lines 13 and 17 and bus lines N47, N57, N82, N83, N84 and N97 are within walking distance. The Amsterdam Central Station is within cycling distance. Parking in the area is possible through a permit system, on the public road there is also the possibility of paid parking. There are several parking garages in the area where parking spaces are offered for rent.,
,LAYOUT GROUND FLOOR: Closed entrance with doorbells, mailboxes and staircase.,
,THIRD FLOOR (fully equipped with a beautiful laminate wooden floor): All rooms are accessible via the central hall, at the front of the house is the spacious living room. The living room has pleasant natural light through the 3 large windows and a fantastic view of the Westertoren. The open kitchen is placed in a corner arrangement and equipped with built-in appliances. At the rear of the house are the two well-sized bedrooms. The large bedroom has a fixed wardrobe wall and a door to the south-facing balcony of 4 m². The bathroom is neutrally tiled and equipped with a bath and a sink. There is also a separate toilet, a large storage room and a laundry room with the central heating combi boiler.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Steenderenstraat in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Fully modern finished 4-room apartment (approx. 90m²) with 3 bedrooms and 2 balconies located on the 3rd floor (no neighbors above). Plastered walls, modern kitchen and bathroom, energy label B (HR++ and double glazing), fully furnished and free parking. Incomecheck applies,
,The apartment is located in a spacious, quiet and green neighborhood near the Reigersbos shopping center, where you can do your daily shopping and the weekly market. Public transport is well organized. Metro stations Reigersbos and Gein are within walking distance and the same applies to the bus stop. With bus 47 and metro 50 and 54 you are in the center of Amsterdam in 15 minutes. With various roads nearby (A2, A9 and A10), accessibility is excellent. There is ample (free) parking for your own car and visitors. In the immediate vicinity are the nature reserves "het Gein" and the popular "Gaasperplas" with a beach. Layout General entrance on the ground floor, renovated in 2012, with access to the stairwell to the 3rd floor. Entrance house in the hallway. Spacious living room with HR ++ glazing with access to the balcony. The walls are plastered and look radiant white. The sockets, doors, door fittings and frames have been renewed throughout the house. The radiator pipes are made of of cove neatly finished and the windows and exterior doors are fitted with mosquito nets. The white high-gloss kitchen is modern and equipped with various built-in appliances (Quooker tap, dishwasher, induction hob, fridge, freezer and extractor hood). At this front also access to a balcony. Next to it are 2 spacious bedrooms and a 3rd bedroom at the rear. Currently in use as a study/office. There is a spacious separate storage room with washing machine connection. The modern bathroom has a walk-in shower with shower drain, design radiator and a double sink with furniture. There is also a separate toilet with a fountain. There is a beautiful wenge laminate floor throughout the house with the exception of the wet areas (tiled). On the ground floor there is a separate spacious storage room (approx.9m2). Balcony The balcony at the front is located on the east (morning sun). The balcony at the rear is located on the west (afternoon sun). Particularities - Living area approximately 90 m2 - 3 bedrooms; large storage room in the basement; - Year of construction approx. 1983 - Sockets, doors, door fittings and frames (inside) have been renewed throughout the house, as have the radiators. - Kitchen is equipped with Quooker tap (hot/cold/boiling).,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,This is a ground floor upholstered family-apartment, with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, washroom, large garden, walk in closet, and spacious lounge, kitchen and dining area. ,
,The apartment exudes a luxury feel in its finishing as it is newly renovated and has energy efficient floor heating throughout and has a label B rating. ,

,The kitchen is fully equipped and offers plenty of storage, it has a nice island underneath a skylight. It is in a shared space that also offers enough room to create dining area and a cosy and comfortable lounge. It overlooks the 68m2 garden, which is north facing, but deep enough to have plenty of sun during the summer and has a wooden shed (of approx. 6 m2) for additional storage. Ensuite to the living is a third bedroom that also overlooks the garden. ,

,The master bedroom is a spacious and comfortable bedroom which has a walk in closet connecting it to the ensuite bathroom. The bathroom is fully equipped with walk in shower, bathtub, toilet, towel heater, double vanity sink and non-fog mirrors.,

,The apartment is located next to Rembrandtpark, for local shopping there are supermarkets within 5 minutes walk and Hoofddorpplein and Kinkerstraat are within 5 minutes cycling. Leidseplein, Jordaan and de Pijp are within a 15 minute bike ride. ,

,
,SURROUNDINGS,
The Geuzen and Statenkwartier is a popular urban district in The Hague where many international organizations and expats are located. Wide avenues run through the district with beautiful squares and lively streets in between. Here you will also find the popular shopping street Frederik Hendriklaan and a diverse range of restaurants. Feel like getting a breath of fresh air with a fantastic view of the sea? The boulevard of Scheveningen and the Pier are a stone's throw away. And you don't have to travel far for a walk in the greenery either. The Westduinpark and the Scheveningse Bosjes are nearby. Here you can enjoy walking, sports, boating or in spring and summer enjoy a culinary festival such as the Parade, TREK or DORST. On Frederik Hendriklaan, also called 'De Fred' by the locals, you will find a shopping area with a very wide selection. From fruit and vegetable stalls to supermarkets and from well-known chain stores to trendy boutiques. You can also go there for a good coffee and a tasty lunch or meal. Also in the nearby Aert van der Goesstraat you will find many (often small independent) stores. And on the bike you can be downtown within fifteen minutes.,
,PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION,
,
,Streetcar 1 (World Forum),
,Bus 28,
,
