House Name: For rent: Flat Kleine Houtstraat in Haarlem
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,*English below*,
,In de historische binnenstad van Haarlem gelegen ZÓ TE BETREKKEN gemeubileerde 3-kamerappartement met hoge plafonds! Het fraaie complex is compleet GERENOVEERD in 2014. Het appartement is gelegen op de 2e verdieping en is heerlijk RUIM en LICHT. De woonkamer is door de hoge plafonds en de open woonkeuken met kookeiland een MOOIE OPEN ruimte. De 2 goede slaapkamers grenzen aan het zonnige BALKON; een heerlijke plek om in de zomer te genieten van een kopje koffie!,
,Verder beschikt het appartement over een moderne badkamer, een apart toilet en een aparte wasruimte.,
De ligging van het appartement is perfect voor binnenstadliefhebbers; midden in het historische stadshart, in één van de leukste (grotendeels autoluwe) winkelstraatjes van Nederland. De Kleine Houtstraat is meerdere achtereenvolgende jaren uitgeroepen tot 'leukste winkelstraat van Nederland'. De Grote Markt, het Spaarne en alle winkel-, horeca- en culturele voorzieningen die de Haarlemse binnenstad rijk is bevinden zich op loopafstand van de woning. Evenals Parkeergarage De Kamp en het NS-station bevinden zich op korte loopafstand. Uitvalswegen richting Amsterdam, Schiphol en Den Haag zijn eenvoudig bereikbaar. Ook de duinen en het strand zijn op 30 minuten fietsafstand.,
,* HARTJE CENTRUM * ROYAAL * LICHT * GERENOVEERD * SFEERVOL * ZONNIG BALKON * HOGE PLAFONDS * 2 SLAAPKAMERS * WOONKEUKEN MET KOOKEILAND * MODERNE BADKAMER * INSTAPKLAAR * KLEINE HOUTSTRAAT *,
,Indeling, begane grond,
Entree, gezamenlijke entree, intercom met camera, brievenbus, gang met stallingsruimte voor fietsen, galerij met Scandinavisch uiterlijk en wenteltrap naar de bovengelegen verdiepingen.,
,2e verdieping,
Entree, ruime hal, royale woonkamer met fraaie raampartij en hoog plafond, moderne open keuken v.v. kookeiland en diverse inbouwapparatuur waaronder 5-pits gaskookplaat, afzuigkap, combi-oven, koel-/vriescombinatie en vaatwasser, ruime ouderslaapkamer met schuifpui naar het zonnige balkon gelegen op het zuidoosten, 2e slaapkamer of mogelijk kantoor in huis met eveneens toegang tot het balkon, moderne badkamer met inloopdouche, dubbele wastafel en designradiator, zwevend toilet met fonteintje, praktische inpandige berging met wasmachine-/drogeraansluiting, c.v.-opstelling en mechanische ventilatie unit.,
,Bijzonderheden,
- prachtige voorgevel,
- gelegen in één van de gezelligste winkelstraten van Haarlem,
- ruim opgezet appartement,
- hoge plafonds; ruim 3 meter!,
- royale woonkamer,
- 73 m2,
- 2 slaapkamers,
- fraaie pvc-vloer door het gehele appartement,
- zeer centrale ligging,
- geheel vernieuwbouwd in 2014,
- volledig v.v. dubbel glas m.u.v. de 2 kleine vaste raampjes,
- elektra; 5 groepen + 2 aardlekschakelaars,
- Beschikbaar per 1 december 2024,
- De VvE beheert gezamenlijk het gas, water en elektriciteit. De kosten voor deze voorzieningen bedragen tezamen €220 per maand. Als het verbruik het budget overschrijdt, worden de extra kosten in rekening gebracht. In de meeste gevallen gebeurt dit echter niet.,
,Situated in the historic city center of Haarlem, this READY-TO-MOVE-IN 3-room apartment of 78 m2 boasts high ceilings! The beautiful complex was fully RENOVATED in 2014. Located on the 2nd floor, the apartment is spacious and filled with natural light. The living room, with its high ceilings and open kitchen featuring a cooking island, creates a BEAUTIFUL OPEN SPACE. The two well-sized bedrooms both open onto the sunny BALCONY, a perfect spot to enjoy a cup of coffee in the summer!,
,The apartment also offers a modern bathroom, a separate toilet, and a separate laundry room. The location is ideal for city lovers, right in the heart of the historic center, on one of the most charming (largely car-free) shopping streets in the Netherlands. Kleine Houtstraat has been repeatedly voted 'the most charming shopping street in the Netherlands.' The Grote Markt, the Spaarne River, and all the shopping, dining, and cultural amenities Haarlem’s city center has to offer are just a short walk away. Parking garage De Kamp and Haarlem train station are also within walking distance. The main highways to Amsterdam, Schiphol, and The Hague are easily accessible. The dunes and beach are just a 30-minute bike ride away.,
,HEART OF THE CITY * SPACIOUS * BRIGHT * RENOVATED * CHARMING * SUNNY BALCONY * HIGH CEILINGS * 2 BEDROOMS * OPEN KITCHEN WITH COOKING ISLAND * MODERN BATHROOM * MOVE-IN READY * KLEINE HOUTSTRAAT *,

gallery with Scandinavian design, and spiral staircase leading to the upper floors.,
,2nd floor:,
Entrance, spacious hall, large living room with beautiful windows and high ceiling, modern open,
kitchen with cooking island and built-in appliances including a 5-burner gas stove, extractor hood,,
combi-oven, fridge/freezer combo, and dishwasher, large master bedroom with sliding doors to,
the sunny southeast-facing balcony, second bedroom (or possible home office) also with access,
to the balcony, modern bathroom with walk-in shower, double sink, and designer radiator,,
floating toilet with hand basin, practical indoor storage room with washer/dryer connections,,
central heating system, and mechanical ventilation unit.,

,Description,

                                                        ,Have you ever dreamed of living in a medieval castle, but with all the modern comforts? Welcome to Kolmonderstraat 22A, a fully renovated home on the enchanting grounds of Nijswiller Castle in Wittem. Picture yourself waking up to stunning views of the historic castle, taking peaceful walks with a cup of coffee by the river in your backyard and its charming stone bridge, while enjoying access to the beautiful and private castle grounds.,
,This spacious 152 m² home offers 4 bedrooms with AC and 4 bathrooms (including 1 bathtub and 4 showers), perfect for both families and professionals who seek a balance of character and modernity. With underfloor heating, energy label A, and practical amenities, you'll be living the dream of castle life with all the conveniences of a well-equipped home.,
,Nijswiller is located minutes drive from the highway and 10 minutes from Aachen (near the RWTH Campus / Klinikum). The location is central ‘Heuvelland’ (land of hills), a touristic destination in the Netherlands. Minutes walk to public transport.,
,Key details:,
Rent: €2,950 per month (plus €150 for electricity and €150 for service costs, which include underfloor heating, hot water, internet, park lighting, and park maintenance).,
Deposit: 2 months' rent.,
Energy label: A,
Airconditioning: A+++ in every room.,
Outdoor space: small private garden. Castle grounds, and on-site parking.,
Availability: immediately.,
Pet policy: Cats allowed (no dogs).,
Smoking: non smoking.,
EV charging: available on request.,
Minimum stay: 6 months.,
Furnishing: unfurnished.,
No home sharers.,
,You’ll have plenty of privacy while being part of a friendly international expat community. Ideal for working professionals and couples with kids. This is your chance to live in a unique and magical setting, combining history and comfort in one of the most charming locations in the Netherlands!,
,Future Potential: Purchase of the apartment may be possible in the future, offering you an opportunity to make this fairy-tale setting your permanent home.,

,Surroundings,
The Centrum district is vibrant and multifaceted and known for such things as the Binnenhof, the Hofvijver, Noordeinde Palace and the Royal Stables.  You will find many stores, restaurants, nightlife, cultural institutions and museums. Modern high-rise buildings form the impressive skyline of The Hague. In the old town with monumental buildings, stately avenues and charming squares you can stroll endlessly and get lost in the small streets and intimate courtyards. The Center is also the place for large-scale events on the Malieveld,around the Hofvijver and on the Lange Voorhout.,
,In the Center you will find a wide mix of homes. From stately canal houses and 17th century almshouses to modern apartments. The squares and streets each breathe their own atmosphere and you will find many beautiful public courtyards. Living in the Center you have all the amenities you could want at your fingertips. In the car-free and historic core you will find well-known international chains within walking distance of trendy fashion boutiques, artisan stores and concept stores. Also special are the Hague passage and Chinatown. Feel like grabbing a terrace or going out? The Plein or the Grote Markt are excellent places to do so.,
,In accordance with new housing regulations, this apartment does not require a housing permit.,

House Name: For rent: House Paganiniplantsoen in Nieuw-Vennep
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,In the child-friendly neighborhood Getsewoud in Nieuw-Vennep, we offer this spacious 4-bedroom family house for rent. The house is conveniently located with respect to shopping centers, schools and motorways and has a lovely garden with spacious (bicycle) storage and back entrance. The house is rented partially furnished for a period of at least 12 and maximum 60 months.  ,
,Ground floor: Entrance in the hall of the house, where the modern separate toilet with sink is located.,
At the end of the hall you can enter the spacious living room. The living room is wonderfully light due to the large windows and patio doors along the back. The backyard can also be entered from here. The modern open kitchen is situated at the front of the house. It is equipped with built-in appliances, namely; fridge/freezer, dishwasher, induction hob with extractor hood, oven, microwave oven and coffee machine. Here you will also find the dining area with a view of the neighborhood through the large windows at the front.,
The garden faces northwest and has a detached, wooden (bicycle) storage shed and a back entrance.  ,
,First floor: From the landing there is access to three of the bedrooms, including the master bedroom. One of the bedrooms is furnished as an office/study space, which is perfect for working from home. The bathroom has a toilet, corner bath, towel radiator, sink with cupboard and mirror and a shower.  ,
,Second floor: The connection for the washing equipment is located on the landing. The last two bedrooms can also be reached, both of which are spacious and have dormer windows.  ,
,Specifications:,
- Quiet, child-friendly neighboorhood,
- Close to supermarkets, schools and motorways,
- Modern kitchen,
- Garden with (bicycle) storage and back entrance,
- Non-smoking house,
- No pets,
- Partly furnished,
- Available for a minimum of 12 and a maximum of 60 months,
- Rent excluding G/W/E/TV, internet and municipal charges,
- Allocation subject to landlord's approval,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,SHORTSTAY - AVAILABLE JANUARY to MARCH 2025,
,This lovely and fully furnished apartment located in the Lusthofstraat is available for rental for a period of 3 months.,
,The Lusthofstraat in Kralingen is truly one of the nicest shopping streets in Rotterdam. With its charming mix of small boutiques, trendy coffee shops and artisanal specialty shops, Lusthofstraat has a unique appearance that feels both authentic and contemporary. The street is popular with both local residents and people from outside.,
,One of the special things about Lusthofstraat is the variety of shops. You will find luxury delicatessen shops, a flower shop with beautiful bouquets and a traditional bakery. There is also plenty for everyday life: a supermarket, a drugstore and a few fantastic specialty shops for cheese, wine and meat, for example.,
,Eating and drinking in Lusthofstraat is a highlight in itself. From cozy coffee shops where you can enjoy a good cappuccino, to restaurants with flavors from all over the world - there is something for everyone.,
,The apartment is located on the first floor which can be reached via a shared staircase.,
,The apartment has a living room with an open fitted kitchen and is equipped with all modern conveniences.,
,The bedroom and office are both located at the quieter rear of the apartment and provide access to the balcony.,
,The neat and luxurious bathroom and toilet can be found between the living room and bedroom.,
,Are you specifically looking for a short-term rental period of 3 months from the beginning of January? Please contact our rental agents to discuss the options.,
,The final rental price will be a total price that will also include a GWE advance.,

A former school building has been transformed into the high-quality residential building Residentie ‘t Vleuterhuys, offering spacious studios and lofts. The studios and loft apartments enjoy a modern and tasteful mid-century interior design, featuring warm wooden accents, and complementing comfort to another level! Large windows provide plenty of light.,

There are two bedrooms with entresol, offering a perfect storage place. There's a high-quality finished bathroom with a walk-in shower, sink, and toilet.,

The historical building ‘t Vleuterhuys is located at the Vleutenseweg ****** in the Lombok district of Utrecht, on the west side of Utrecht’s city center, opposite the green Majella Park.,
,Many people consciously choose to live in this part of the Lombok neighborhood because of the proximity of the city center with its range of conveniences. The pleasant area is filled with all kinds of local bars and shops. A stone’s throw away is Buurten in the Fabriek, where you can enjoy lunch or a cup of coffee on the waterfront. And foremost, ‘t Vleuterhuys can be found just 5 minutes away by bike from the Dutch largest indoor mall Hoog Catharijne shopping center, and is just a 10-minute bike ride away from the famed canal Oude Gracht.,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Houtwal Brunssum in the complex "Bronsheimstate": Spacious apartment with 2 bedrooms and a NEW kitchen with all appliances is located on the main floor with an external storage room in the basement. This complex has an elevator.,
,The complex is located in the district Schuttersveld, about 800 meters from the center of Brunssum and in the vicinity of the complex are several amenities.,
,Layout apartment: All apartments have two spacious bedrooms. Neatly finished bathroom with sink, bathtub and separate shower. The apartment has a separate toilet and a large storage room with central heating system and washing machine connection both accessible by entrance / hallway. Spacious living room with open kitchen with a four-burner hob, extractor, sink, fridge-freezer and a dishwasher.,
From the living room is the balcony accessible. In the basement is a second storage room.,
The apartment complex accommodates 44 apartments and has ample parking on site. In addition to the general on-site parking there are 14 garages. At an additional cost these can be rented.,
,The rent is excluding gas/water/electricity, €40,00 service costs and €125,00 garage rental.,
,For the protocol good tenant management and the allocation of rental properties to prospective tenants we refer you to useful links at the bottom of our homepage,
,Brunssum,
There are indications that in prehistoric times there was already habitation in the area around Brunssum. This also applies to the neighboring municipalities of Heerlen and Landgraaf. Little is known about this occupation. Finds from the soil and medieval records indicate an uninterrupted occupation of this area during the last 2,000 years.,
In the Middle Ages, the land defenses in the Schutterspark were erected for protection.,
The parish of Brunssum is known since 1150, and formed with Schinveld and Jabeek a bench of aldermen within the Land of Valkenburg. In 1557, the aldermanic district of Brunssum, consisting of Brunssum, Schinveld and Jabeek, was elevated to a seigniory by the government of the Spanish Netherlands and pledged to the Hoen family of Amstenrade, and sold in 1609 to Arnold III Huyn of Geleen. In 1664, this fiefdom of Brunssum merged into the county of Geleen and Amstenrade. At the end of the ancien régime per 1794 Brunssum became an independent municipality.,
In 1150 there was already a St. Gregory's Church in the center and in 1579 it was elevated to a parish church. The present church is modern.,
Neither seals nor seal images are known from the bench of aldermen or the parish. The coat of arms is therefore composed of the coat of arms of the Huyn family and the parish saint.,
,LIABILITY,

House Name: For rent: Flat Bundlaan in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,ENGLISH BELOW,
,Stijlvol appartement in Amsterdam Noord, tegenover het Centraal Station.,
,Te huur: een prachtig en zorgvuldig ingericht appartement van 105 m² aan de Bundlaan in de moderne wijk Overhoeks, gelegen nabij het karakteristieke Eye Museum. Dit ruime appartement biedt een perfecte balans tussen luxe en comfort, met een ideale ligging dichtbij het centrum en een rustige, groene omgeving in de buurt van het water. Bovendien ligt het op loopafstand van Amsterdam Centraal Station, waardoor je gemakkelijk toegang hebt tot alle stadsvoorzieningen.,
,KENMERKEN VAN HET APPARTEMENT,
,• Woonoppervlakte: 105 m²,
• Energielabel: Groen A+++ label, waardoor de temperatuur in het appartement het hele jaar door aangenaam blijft.,
• Indeling: Gelegen op de eerste verdieping van een nieuwbouwcomplex, met lift in het gebouw. Alle ruimtes zijn voorzien van ramen van vloer tot plafond, wat zorgt voor veel natuurlijk lichtinval. Stijlvol ingericht met een doorlopende houten visgraat vloer en vloerverwarming door het gehele appartement aanwezig voor optimaal comfort.,
• Ruime woonkeuken: Moderne keuken met bar en inbouwapparatuur.,
• Slaapkamers:,
o Master bedroom: 17 m², uitgerust met een ruim bed (210x180) en een kledingkast van 3 meter breed.,
o Tweede slaapkamer: 20 m², voorzien van een bed (210x160) en twee bureaus, ideaal voor thuiswerken of het ontvangen van gasten.,
• Badkamer: Grote badkamer met dubbele wastafel, regendouche en radiator.,
• Toilet: Apart toilet.,
• Balkon: Met uitzicht op een goed onderhouden gedeelde tuin.,
• Berging: Voorzien van kastruimte, wasmachine en ingebouwde droogrekken.,
• Parkeerplaats: Optioneel, in het gebouw beschikbaar voor €175 per maand.,
,Dit appartement is perfect voor mensen die op zoek zijn naar een luxueus en ruim verblijf in een van de mooiste wijken van Amsterdam Noord. Geniet van de rustige buurt en het groene uitzicht, terwijl je toch snel en gemakkelijk bij het stadscentrum bent.,
,EXTRA,
,Contractsvorm: De woning wordt als volgt verhuurd; tussenhuur is van toepassing doordat de verhuurder tijdelijk woonachtig is in het buitenland. De huur eindigt door het enkele verloop van het huurtermijn.,
,Servicekosten: De servicekosten (water, verwarming, electriciteit, internet) bedragen gemiddeld €160 per maand en worden maandelijks in rekening gebracht. Na afloop van de verhuurperiode vindt een nacalculatie plaats op basis van het werkelijke verbruik.,
,Huurcriteria: Mocht u geïnteresseerd zijn in de woning, dan ontvangen wij graag inzage in uw persoonlijke- en financiële situatie (minimaal kopie paspoort en drie recente salarisstroken).,
,Beschikbaarheid: Per 6 januari tot en met eind juni 2025. Eerdere intrek mogelijk in overleg.,
,Interesse? Neem contact op voor meer informatie of om een bezichtiging in te plannen!,
,_________________________________________________,
,Stylish Apartment in Amsterdam Noord, opposite Central Station.,
,For rent: a beautifully and carefully designed 105 m² apartment on the Bundlaan in the modern Overhoeks neighborhood, located near the iconic Eye Museum. This spacious apartment offers a perfect balance of luxury and comfort, with an ideal location close to the city center and a peaceful, green environment near the waterfront. It is also within walking distance of Amsterdam Central Station, providing easy access to all city amenities.,
,APARTMENT FEATURES,
,• Living area: 105 m²,
• Energy label: Green A+++ rating, ensuring a pleasant temperature in the apartment year-round.,
• Layout: Situated on the first floor of a new building with an elevator. All rooms have floor-to-ceiling windows, allowing abundant natural light. Stylishly finished with continuous herringbone wood flooring and underfloor heating throughout for optimal comfort.,
• Spacious kitchen: Modern kitchen with bar and built-in appliances.,
• Bedrooms:,
o Master bedroom: 17 m², featuring a large bed (210x180) and a 3-meter-wide wardrobe.,
o Second bedroom: 20 m², equipped with a bed (210x160) and two desks, perfect for remote work or hosting guests.,
• Bathroom: Large bathroom with double sinks, a rain shower, and a radiator.,
• Toilet: Separate toilet.,
• Balcony: Overlooking a well-maintained shared garden.,
• Storage room: Includes shelving, washing machine, and built-in drying racks.,
• Parking: Optional, available in the building for €175 per month.,
,This apartment is ideal for those seeking a luxurious and spacious residence in one of the most beautiful areas of Amsterdam Noord. Enjoy the peaceful neighborhood and green views while still being quickly and easily connected to the city center.,
,ADDITIONAL INFORMATION,
,Rental contract: The property is rented as a temporary lease as the owner is temporarily residing abroad. The lease will end automatically at the expiration of the rental term.,
,Utilities: The utilities (water, heating, electricity, internet) amount to an average of €160 per month and are billed monthly. At the end of the rental period, a final settlement will be conducted based on actual consumption.,
,Rental criteria: If you are interested in the property, we will request insight into your personal and financial situation (minimum: copy of passport and three recent payslips).,
,Availability: From January 6 until the end of June 2025. Earlier move-in possible upon agreement.,
,Interested? Contact us for more information or to schedule a viewing!,

House Name: For rent: Flat Saskia van Uijlenburgkade in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Spectacular two bedroom apartment of 90m2 with a lovely south-facing terrace and a beautiful view of the water of the Westlandgracht. In addition, the house is luxuriously finished, has one spacious bedroom, a spacious bathroom with large bath and rain shower. ,
,Layout,
Entrance complex, with the elevator or by the staircase you reach the apartment on the eight floor. Entrance house, spacious L-shaped hallway that gives access to all rooms. Spacious and bright living room due to the large windows that stretch from floor to ceiling. From the living room you have an amazing view over the Westlandgracht. Through the patio doors you have access to the lovely south-facing balcony. At the rear the open kitchen is situated with a spacious cooking island that is equipped with all desired built-in appliances. Next to the kitchen is the storage room where the washing machine is located. Two bedrooms that give access to the balcony. The beautifully finished bathroom has a spacious bathtub, walk-in rain shower and sink. Separate toilet in the hallway. ,
,For a clear overview of the layout and dimensions, please refer to the attached floor plans.,
,Environment,
The house is part of the Andreas Ensemble (located on the site of the former Andreas hospital), which is one of the most popular new construction projects in recent years and has developed into an absolute top location on the edge of Amsterdam South. A pleasantly chic appearance thanks to a special architecture and very well-kept, beautifully contrasting courtyard gardens contribute to this. It is only a 5 minute bike ride to the Vondelpark, Amstelveenseweg and Overtoom with its wide variety of shops, supermarkets, bars and restaurants. All kinds of facilities are just a stone's throw away: groceries at Jumbo or Lidl, exercising in the David Lloyd fitness center or running in Rembrandtpark or Vondelpark. There are also several good schools and various childcare options in the area. The location is also ideal for car owners, with the A10 and A4 ring road a two-minute drive away and a private parking space under the building.,
,Details,
,
,Rent €2900 excluding utilities,
,Available from December 1st,
,Security deposit equal to two months' rent ,
,Contract A, min 12 months ,
,Furnished,
,

Description:

Furnished corner house located on Van der Fuyckstraat in the "Rugge" district in Brielle. The house has a living area of 95m2, has 4 bedrooms, a storage room and a sheltered garden. The house is suitable for 4 persons. Are you looking for a furnished house in a residential area in Brielle? Then this house on the Van der Fuyckstraat is definitely worth a visit!,

The corner house is located near the Maasvlakte and the Europoort. In the immediate vicinity are secondary school Maerlant, the Idylle park, a pharmacy and sports center within cycling / walking distance. Tinte, Rockanje, Spijkenisse and Vierpolders are also easily accessible by public transport by means of direct bus connections. Vlaardingen, Schiedam and Rotterdam are easily accessible via the N218 and A15. The house offers sufficient parking space in front of the door.,
,Layout:,
The furnished house consists of 2 floors. On the ground floor there are the hall, toilet, living room, kitchen and the garden. The living room has a laminate floor, an open kitchen and a door to the backyard on the north-west. The open kitchen is neatly arranged and has all the necessary equipment. On the first floor there are 4 bedrooms and the bathroom. The bathroom has a walk-in shower and washbasin. There is a separate laundry room with washing machine and dryer.,

,The house offers enough space for 4 people.,

House Name: For rent: House Orchideeënstraat in Eindhoven
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Soft furnished Terraced House for Rent in Stratum, Eindhoven,
,Located in the charming Stratum neighborhood of Eindhoven, this spacious terraced house with garage is available for rent. Perfect for families or professionals seeking comfort and space.,
,Layout:,
,Ground Floor:,
Upon entry, the hall leads to the staircase to the first floor. Here, you’ll find a partially tiled toilet with a small sink and handy storage space under the stairs. The hallway features a charming stained-glass window with a view into the living room.,
,The bright, spacious living room receives ample natural light from both the front and rear. The kitchen is in open connection with the living room.,
,The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances, including a built-in refrigerator, dishwasher, 4-burner gas stove, exhaust hood, oven-microwave combo, and plenty of cupboard space. The kitchen also provides access to the garden.,
,First Floor:,
The landing provides access to three bedrooms, the bathroom, and stairs to the second floor.,
,The master bedroom at the rear features a sink and two built-in closets.,
,The second bedroom at the front includes a built-in closet and two French doors opening to a small balcony, bringing in extra natural light.,
,The third bedroom, located at the back, can serve as an office or nursery.,
,The fully tiled bathroom has a shower cabin with folding doors and a sink with cabinet.,
,Second Floor:,
On this floor is the spacious fourth bedroom, complete with a large dormer window that provides plenty of natural light and unobstructed views. This room has a sink, washing machine connection and practical fitted wardrobes and storage space.,
,Garden & garage:,
The property includes a spacious north-facing garden with a sun terrace and a shaded terrace. At the back, there is a covered passageway leading to the garage. The practical garage offers space for one car and additional storage.,
,Oud-Stratum/Bloemenbuurt,
The property is located on a quiet street in a pleasant, child-friendly neighborhood (Old-Stratum/Bloemenbuurt). It is within walking distance of a primary school, shops, the Stadswandelpark, and the nature and recreation area Genneper Parken. The property is a short bike ride from the center of Eindhoven. The A2 and A67 highways are easily accessible from the neighborhood.,
,The house is equiped with 10 solar panels.,
,Important:,
,- Available per: 02-01-2024,
- The advertised rental price is based on an intermediate agreement for a fixed period of 1 or 2 years.,
- Energy costs are not included in the rental price.,
- Internet and tv are not included in the rental price.,
- Soft furnished, including washing machine,
- Parking in the street is free,
- Pets are not allowed,
- Smoking is not allowed,

House Name: For rent: Flat Beeklaan in Den Haag
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Beeklaan 341,
,Beeklaan 341 was restored and repurposed into three apartments in 2011. The building style is typical of the period around 1900, featuring what is known as transitional architecture, which aligns with Art Deco and Jugendstil. Given the modest design of the ground-floor shopfront, it is presumed that it dates back to the 1930s. The property was most likely originally used as a residential space, with one unit on the ground floor and a triplex apartment above.,
,LAYOUT,

House Name: For rent: Flat Grubbehoeve in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Your search for a spacious, bright apartment in Amsterdam ends here. On the fourth floor of the Grubbehoeve apartment complex, this well-maintained 95m2 apartment is for sale. The apartment has a bathroom with bath, a fully equipped kitchen and no fewer than four bedrooms, making this a perfect place for a large family or extended family. From the balcony of more than 9.60 meters wide, located on the southeast, you have a beautiful view of the park and the water.,
,You live in a very green area within walking distance of the Ganzenpoort shopping center, Ganzenhoef metro station, the Diemerbos and the Bijlmerweide with petting zoo. The Cultural Education Center (CEC) with training options, a gym, daycare center and catering is located next to the complex. Ample parking options are available in front of the building and in the surrounding area. Get on the metro and you are in the center of Amsterdam in fifteen minutes. You can reach the Johan Cruijff Arena, Pathé cinema, Amsterdamse Poort shopping center and Amsterdam Bijlmer train station within 10 minutes by bike.,
,On the ground floor is the spacious, bright entrance with the elevator to the upper residential floors. In the basement is a general closed bicycle storage room and the apartment has a private storage room right next to the elevator for extra storage. There is also a collective space where activities are organized for and by residents. De Grubbehoeve has been officially designated as a protected cityscape by the municipality of Amsterdam since 2019.,
,Apartment:,
Open the red front door to the hall that is open to the living room. On the right in the hall there is room for a coat rack and the solid pine floor (for acquisition) is located in almost the entire apartment.,
,The living room with semi-open kitchen is an attractive, bright living space with a door to the balcony and a nice division between the sitting and dining area. Several apartments in the building have moved the dining area to one of the bedrooms, giving the living room even more space. In the intermediate hall to the bedrooms there is room for a nice workplace.,
,At the front is the spacious kitchen with a U-shape, with plenty of storage space in the cupboards and drawers. All necessary equipment is present: a large Atilla gas stove with oven (for sale), an extractor hood, dishwasher, refrigerator and a freezer.,
,This apartment has no less than four bedrooms and is therefore very suitable for a large family or extended family. Two rooms adjoin the gallery and the two largest bedrooms have a door to the sunny balcony.,
,The bathroom is divided into a bath/shower combination and a washbasin. The walls are tiled in a light color, the taps are from Grohe and the sanitary facilities are from Ucosan. Next to the bathroom is the spacious toilet room with a design toilet by Alessi. There is also a separate room where the washing machine and dryer can be located.,
,Exterior:,
From the living room and two bedrooms you have access to the more than 9.60 meters wide balcony, located on the southeast. The view to the park with tall trees and the water is very beautiful. Can you see yourself sitting here already?,

•   Number of bedrooms: 4,
•   Number of bathrooms: 2,

House Name: For rent: Flat Woestduinstraat in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,ATTENTION: PETS AND HOME SHARERS (max 2) POSSIBLE IN CONSULTATION,
,
,NO GUARANTORS - NO STUDENTS,
,
,This beautiful and bright upper-level apartment on Woestduinstraat, located in the desirable Hoofddorppleinbuurt neighborhood of Amsterdam, is now available for rent. This well-designed home offers a spacious and bright living room with large windows providing a stunning view of the green street. The modern open kitchen features a large cooking island and all essential built-in appliances – perfect for cooking enthusiasts. In the living room, there’s a comfortable love seat with a view over the Westlandgracht canal, making this the only home on the street where you can enjoy ample winter afternoon sun thanks to the open view.,
,The apartment further offers two well-sized bedrooms and a luxurious bathroom with a walk-in shower with a bench, a vanity unit, and electric skylights equipped with a rain sensor. At the rear, there are balconies on both floors, facing east, where you can enjoy the morning and early afternoon sun. Additionally, the apartment boasts a lovely roof terrace of 24 m², complete with water and electricity connections, ideal for barbecuing and enjoying the sun all day until late in the evening.,
,Surroundings,
The apartment is situated in the lively and desirable Hoofddorppleinbuurt in Amsterdam-South, known for its friendly atmosphere and wide range of amenities. The property itself is on a quiet, green street. The neighborhood has a rich history and was developed in the 1930s, featuring characteristic architecture from that period. Within walking distance, you'll find various shops, cafes, and restaurants, primarily around Hoofddorpplein.,
,Public transportation options are excellent: tram and bus connections to the city center and Amsterdam-South are within walking distance. Amsterdam Lelylaan station is nearby, offering direct train connections to Schiphol and other major cities. Additionally, the A10 and A4 highways are easily accessible, which is ideal for commuters.,
,Lay-out:,
Second floor: Spacious and modern dining kitchen with access to the large balcony at the rear, laundry room with washer and dryer, and an L-shaped living room at the front.,
Third floor: Landing, modern bathroom with a walk-in shower (with a bench), toilet, and sink, 2 well-sized bedrooms, access to the balcony at the rear and rooftop terrace. This floor also includes an attic loft and e separate attic storage room, which is equipped with a large wardrobe. ,
,Extra: ,
,
,Fully furnished,
,2 bedrooms,
,2 floors,
,2 balconies facing East + spacious rooftop terrace,
,Modern kitchen and bathroom,
,Separate attic storage + attic loft,
,Total area: 86 m²,
,PETS AND HOME SHARERS (max 2) POSSIBLE IN CONSULTATION,
,NO GUARANTORS - NO STUDENTS,
,

House Name: For rent: Flat Eric Kropstraat in Rotterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Now available this special and spacious (140 m2) 2 bed-room apartment with a huge living room, a luxurious open kitchen, a very spacious balcony (± 14 m²), 2 very spacious bedrooms, a spacious bathroom with jacuzzi, is located in the luxury apartment complex "De Statendam" on the Kop van Zuid.  ,
,The neighbourhood:  ,
,Formerly a real dock workers' place and now you can live there fantastically with an overwhelming view. The Kop van Zuid is a lively and especially centrally located neighbourhood with all amenities within easy reach. The entrance to the metro is right outside the door, with 2 stops you are in the city. The Luxor theatre is only a 5-minute walk away.,
Various shops, large supermarkets such as Albert Heijn and Jumbo and restaurants can be found within walking and cycling distance. For example, you can go to the Entrepotgebouw or Vuurplaat for your daily shopping, enjoy culture and catering on the Wilhelminapier and you are in the bustling city centre in a few minutes for shopping. And it only gets better. A new swimming pool is currently being built on the Laan op Zuid and no fewer than three large city parks are being added in the area.  ,
,Public transport facilities:  ,
,All facilities such as public transport (tram, metro, NS station, water taxi and bus) are within walking distance. At the Wilhelminaplein metro and tram stop, you can board various lines. You can even take the Randstadrail all the way to The Hague from here, and the Zuid train station is less than a minute's bike ride away. Fancy a different way to get around? Then you can also get a long way in Rotterdam by water taxi! The residential location provides good access roads with quick access to the A16 and A15.  ,
,Parking:  ,
,Parking in your own parking space in the closed parking garage.  ,
,Restaurants and nightlife:  ,
,For example, you can go shopping or enjoy one of the cozy terraces in the nearby Entrepothaven. Around the corner you will find the Nieuwe Luxor Theater, Hotel New York or the LantarenVenster movie theater on the Wilhelminapier, but the vibrant center of Rotterdam and trendy Katendrecht can also be reached within a few minutes. The Feyenoord stadium and adjacent Pathé cinema with various DIY stores and shops are also located a short distance away.  ,
,Layout  ,
,Hall, toilet, spacious indoor storage room and wardrobe.  ,
,The spacious living room with access to the balcony, a luxurious open kitchen in a U-shape, which is equipped with all conceivable and high-quality equipment.,
Two spacious bedrooms, and the spacious bathroom with walk-in shower, double sink with furniture, and a jacuzzi.  ,
,Conditions:  ,
,- Acceptance immediately,
- Minimum rental period of 12 months,
- Income exclusively from employment, the monthly income requirement is 3.5x the rental,
price as gross income,
- Students are allowed provided that a working family member can provide a financial,
guarantee with income in the Netherlands (Above average income required),
- The deposit is € 6000.00,
- The rental price excludes district heating, water, electricity, TV/internet etc.,
- Viewing requests exclusively by email,

House Name: For rent: Flat Brahmsstraat in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Very spacious, luxurious, and recently renovated 3rd-floor apartment of approximately 128 m² with a lovely balcony of approximately 7 m² facing north located in a beautiful street in Amsterdam Oud-Zuid. This apartment is nicely finished and contains a large living room with open luxurious kitchen, three bedrooms, a luxurious bathroom, and a separate toilet. ,
,NOT FOR SHARING!,
At the request of the lessor, it is not possible to make this property available to sharers. Shareholders are students and/or friends who rent the property together. Also, living together with 2 or more (highly educated) working persons is not possible. A couple, a couple or a family is eligible for this property.,
,THE LAYOUT,
Through the well-maintained communal staircase, you reach the luxurious apartment on the second floor. You will enter a spacious hall which gives access to the other rooms.,
The spacious and bright living room with bay window and open kitchen measures approximately 60 m²! The luxury kitchen is fully equipped with a 5-burner gas stove, dishwasher, microwave/oven combination, fridge, and three drawers freezer. From the living room, you have access to the lovely balcony of approximately 7 m² through the sliding doors. From the hall, you have access to the laundry room of approx. 3 m² and a separate toilet with hand basin.,
The first bedroom is located at the front of the apartment and measures approximately 16 m² (4.35 m x 3.72 m). The second bedroom is also located at the front and measures approximately 8 m² (2.07 m x 3.98 m). The modern bathroom is centrally located. This bathroom has a double sink with storage drawers, a radiator, a bathtub, and a large walk-in shower. The third bedroom is located at the rear of the apartment and measures approximately 16 m² (3.74 m x 4.35 m). From this room you also have access to the balcony. ,
,THE LOCATION,
The apartment is located just around the corner of the popular Beethovenstraat in the Apollo area. The Zuidas, Vondelpark, Cornelis Schuytstraat and the Concertgebouw can be reached within a few minutes. Station Zuid is within walking distance and tram lines 5 & 24 stop around the corner. There are good primary and secondary schools and crèches in the immediate area and the beautiful Beatrixpark is a 5-minute walk away. The Stadionweg can be easily reached by car.,
,THE MAINTENANCE,
The apartment is newly renovated (renovation year 2020). All the walls are plastered and painted. The entire apartment has curtains and under curtains and a neat floor. The electricity and the central heating system have both been renewed. The kitchen and bathroom have both been renewed too.,
,PARTICULARITIES,
,
,Not suitable for sharers;,
,Rental price is excl. G/W/E;,
,Deposit of 2 months;,
,Minimum rental period is 1 year;,
,An income requirement applies to this object, based on a gross monthly income of at least 4x the net rent.,
,

Private parking,
Fully luxury furnished,
2 bathrooms,
,This spacious and attractive family home is located in a child-friendly neighbourhood. This bright house of approx. 165 m2 has a sunny and well-designed backyard (West), terrace on open water and no less than 5 bedrooms.,
,LAYOUT:,
,Ground floor: Entrance, spacious hall with separate toilet, stairs to upper floors and access to wide living room. The living room is pleasantly light due to the large glass frontage at the rear and at the same time offers beautiful views of the garden. The garden is west-facing and comes with private terrace and boat (optional) to enter the water. At the front of the house you will find the modern kitchen equipped with various built-in appliances, such as a Quooker, oven, dishwasher, a hob with extractor hood, large fridge, freezer and a composite worktop.,
,The ground floor has pvc flooring with underfloor heating. This house is wider than the average house in the Bongerd and you notice that immediately. Room-high doors are also present throughout the ground floor, adding character to the house. First floor: There are three spacious bedrooms on the first floor. Bedroom 1 and 2 are located at the rear of the house, while bedroom 3 and the bathroom can be found at the front. The modern bathroom has a walk-in shower, large bathtub, double washbasin and second toilet. Second floor: The top floor offers a landing with second bathroom, 2 large bedrooms and lots of storage space.,
,LOCATION:,
,"De Bongerd" is one of the most emerging and popular neighborhoods in Amsterdam North, located near the iconic NDSM. This district has developed in recent years into an attractive living environment, thanks to a combination of modern architecture, green areas and the proximity of cultural hotspots.,
,Furthermore, the district is easily accessible by both car and public transport. The ferry from and to Central Station to/from the NDSM provides a fast connection with the city center (about 5min!), while the proximity of the A10 ring road provides good access from and to the district.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Fokke Simonszstraat in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Including all utilities (Electricity, Water, Heating and service costs),
,This high-end two bedroom premium apartment provides approximately 75m2 of luxurious and modern style living comfort. The floor’s natural wood color, the light color on the walls and the high ceiling create a peaceful ambience. At the front side we find massive glass doors through which natural light easily shines throughout the entire apartment. During the warmer summer days, these can be opened and serve as a French balcony.,
,The apartment is modern style furnished and fully equipped with everything you may need. The apartment has floor heating throughout the whole apartment and a smart panel to regulate both the lights and heating for every space.,
,In the hallway of the apartment, you find a big coat closet, a small storage closet and the restroom.,
,Entering the bright and spacious living room, there is natural light shining through during the day. In combination with the luxurious and modern style furniture, a comfortable and peaceful living ambiance is created.,
,The large and bright living room is connected to a spacious, fully equipped, open kitchen with a cooking island. The kitchen has a dishwasher, fridge & freezer, a quooker (instant boiling water), a Nespresso machine and an induction stove with an in-built exhaust hood.,
,The grand master bedroom has a queen-sized bed, a large built-in closet and a smart TV. It has a large bathroom directly connected, similarly provided with a heating element for towels, a separate ventilation system and a shower with two modern shower heads. A rain shower head and a hand shower head. During the warmer days the large glass doors can be openend and serve as a French balcony.,
,The bedroom also has its own balcony overlooking the green wall facade.,
,
,€3.725,- including utilities (Electricity, Water, Heating) and service costs,
,1 bedroom,
,Laundry area in the complex,
,Storage unit in the complex,
,Property manager available,
,

House Name: For rent: Flat Donkerstraat 51 in Harderwijk

,Description,

                                                        ,Nice apartment for rent in Harderwijk with 1 bedroom in the Binnenstad Zuid district.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Kerkstraat in Den Bosch
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Unique apartment in a beautiful location in a monumental building with a rich history located in the center of 's-Hertogenbosch.,
,This is a three-room apartment on the first and second floor with entrance on the ground floor.,
,Are you interested? Request a viewing via the website. PLEASE NOTE, we cannot process your request by telephone.,
,First floor:,
Entrance on the first floor. Entrance in the hall, from the hall access to the spacious living room (located at the front). From the kitchen access to the very spacious and sunny roof terrace. It is a very well finished apartment and in combination with the authentic style elements this makes a nice cozy apartment.,
,Kitchen:,
Adjacent to the living room we find the neat, neutral, fully equipped kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with dishwasher, refrigerator, freezer, combi-microwave and lots of storage and cupboard space.,
,Roof terrace:,
From the kitchen you can reach this spacious, south-facing terrace (surface area approx. 25m2). It is striking how quietly you can sit in such a beautiful place in the middle of the center.,
,Second floor:,
The modern bathroom is adjacent to the hall and is also in very good condition and is equipped with a luxurious washbasin with bathroom furniture, spacious walk-in shower, bath and extra space for, for example, a cupboard for towels.,
,Bedrooms:,
A nice spacious bedroom/study is located both at the rear and at the front of the house, from the bedroom at the rear there is a view of the private roof terrace.,
,This apartment is located in the middle of the monumental city center of 's-Hertogenbosch. The Kerkstraat is one of the most beautiful shopping streets in 's-Hertogenbosch. In the immediate vicinity a richly varied offer with a mix of functions such as shopping / living / working and catering establishments.,
,The cozy terraces on the Parade and the Markt, cultural attractions such as the Sint-Jan, Noord Brabants museum and of course the other shopping streets. The Central Station and various arterial roads are also nearby.,
,Special features:,
- Available from December 1, 2024; - The house is rented furnished, there are floors and wall decorations in the entire house;,
- The apartment is rented for a rental price of €1950 excluding costs for G/W/E and other usage costs;,
- Deposit €3250;,
- No pets allowed.,
,Parking in the city center is possible via a permit that can be requested via the municipality. There is a waiting list in the city center to obtain a permanent (24-hour) permit. It is possible to obtain a parking subscription via the municipality in the nearby parking garages that are facilitated by the municipality.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Tweede Jacob van Campenstraat in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Completely renovated furnished apartment (165 sqm) located on the Tweede Jacob van Campenstraat in De Pijp,
,Layout,
,Possibility to enter the apartment directly with the elevator or stairs. Walking into the apartment you will find the bright living room which is connected to a lovely open kitchen. The luxurious open kitchen is equipped with a big cooking island, oven/microwave, fridge and freezer, dishwasher, and wine fridge.,
,The living room and kitchen are filled with light through the many windows present in this apartment.,
,Bedrooms,
,The two spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms are located on the street side of the apartment. The very spacious main bedroom is on the right side of the apartment. The bathroom that adjoins the main bedroom is luxurious and spacious and has a double sink and a lovely walk-in shower. On the landing, there is a separate toilet and you will find the second bathroom connected to the second bedroom with a walk-in shower and a double sink.,
,Both bedrooms have air conditioning present.,
,Location,
,In a prime location, close to the Sarphatipark in the middle of 'De Pijp', you will find this apartment of approximately 165 m² located on the ground floor. All hotspots of the Pijp are within walking distance! In the immediate vicinity many restaurants, cozy cafes, terraces, and shops.,
,The city center of Amsterdam is of course also nearby. The public transport facilities are excellent. The Albert Cuyp market and all imaginable shops are a few minutes walk away.,
,Particularities,
,
,Furnished,
,Monthly rent is €3.950,- excl. utilities;,
,2-month deposit;,
,2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms 3 toilets;,
,Airconditioning in the bedrooms;,
,Fireplace;,
,Floor heating;,
,

House Name: For rent: Flat Mauritsstraat in Breda
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,This nice studio is located in a very good location within the canals, a short walk from the center of Breda and the station.,
,The studio located on the second floor (left side) is offered partly furnished and has an area of 40m2. The studio is fully equipped and has the following equipment in the kitchen: dishwasher, refrigerator, combination oven/microwave, 4-burner stove, built-in extractor hood.,
,The studio has a separate bathroom with sink/mirror and shower. There is also a separate room where the washing machine is located. The toilet is also a separate room. The small-scale complex has a shared storage room with the possibility to store bicycles.,
,The rental price of €957,80 includes €75 service costs, including internet. You must apply for gas, water, electricity, TV and municipal levies and taxes yourself.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Prins Frederikplein in Rotterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Beautiful unfurnished 2-bedroom apartment located on the 3rd floor with a beautiful view of the Willemsbrug and the Koningshaven where the large sea-going vessels pass. Just 5 minutes from the city center and public transport. Complex is gated and has a courtyard with greenery and seating.The apartment comes decorated.,
,Description: Communal entrance with mailboxes and doorbells. The hall provides access to the elevator. From the hallway you have access to all rooms. Spacious and bright living room at the rear of the apartment. The wood-finished open kitchen is equipped with various appliances such as an oven, microwave, fridge with freezer, gas hob, aluminum extractor hood and dishwasher. Master bedroom with a spacious double four-poster bed, which can be removed. Bright second bedroom can be arranged freely. The bedrooms provide access to the spacious balcony with a beautiful view of the Maas, De Hef and the Willemsbrug. The fully tiled bathroom in white color scheme has a shower, bath and washbasin with mirror.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Voorstraat 8 J in Delft
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Are you interested in renting this property? We request that you inform us by email (******) that you are interested in a viewing appointment. We also ask you to provide an explanation in this email about your current situation: consider the family composition, your financial situation and the reason that you are looking for a new rental home.,
,Located in the center of Delft, next to the Choorstraat and Voorstraat and also next to the Oude Kerk, we are now offering this upholstered  3-room apartment. This apartment is located on the second and third floor and has two bedrooms, a spacious, modern bathroom, a terrace with a beautiful view and private bicycle shed and parking space on the ground floor. Just stone's throw away from various shops, restaurants, public transport (bus, tram, train) and near highways such as the A4/A13. Rent is € 1.950,- per month excluding G/W/L/TV and internet. Available from January 1st, 2025.,
,Layout:,
Ground floor: entrance, elevator or stairs to the apartment. There are 2 elevators: from the ground floor to the first floor and from the first floor to the second floor.,
Second floor: entrance with stairs to the third floor and modern, hanging toilet with sink. Entrance into open kitchen (approx. 3.45 x 4.95) with various built-in appliances such as an oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, gas hob, extractor hood. There is also a fixed dining table mounted. Passage to the very bright living room (approx. 4.57 x 7.45) because of the glass front. The terrace (approx. 4.80 x 3.50) is accessible from the living room. Also on the second floor, you will find the spacious, fully tiled bathroom in modern style with bath-shower combination, washbasin and storage space. Bedroom (approx. 3.45 x 4.00) with wardrobe.,
Third floor: landing with space for washing machine and dryer (these are not included), space for central heating boiler. Second bedroom with three windows.,
,Conditions:,
,
,Suitable for a family household of maximum 3 persons, no students, PHD couple is possible,
,1 month deposit payable before the start of the rental contract,
,The rent must be credited to the landlord before the 1st of the month in question,
,No statements are made about the allocation policy,
,Minimum rental contract of 12 months,
,1 month viewing right for the landlord upon termination of the rental contract,
,Keeping pets in the rental is not allowed,
,ROZ rental contract (******),
,Smoking is not permitted and no changes may be made to the rented property without written permission from the landlord.,
,As a tenant, you must be demonstrably sufficiently financially stable for the entire length of the agreed rental agreement.,
,
,This is an offer from which no rights can be derived, as changes are possible.,
,Are you interested in renting this property? We request that you inform us by email (******) that you are interested in a viewing appointment. We also ask you to provide an explanation in this email about your current situation: consider the family composition, your financial situation and the reason that you are looking for a new rental home.,
,We select the best three to ten candidates who we then invite for a viewing. If you have not heard from us after 3 working days, you have unfortunately not been selected for the viewing round. After the viewing, you must also let us know by e-mail whether you are actually interested in renting the property. We will submit your request to the landlord.,
,If the landlord agrees, we will draw up a rental contract in accordance with the Real Estate Council model. We will send this to you by email for approval, after which we will schedule an appointment for signing as well as an appointment for the delivery inspection of the property you rented (you will then receive the key from us).,

House Name: For rent: Flat Weverstede in Nieuwegein
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,VIEWINGS,
,It's possible to view the model apartment (Weverstede 649) on Monday and Friday mornings between 9:00 and 11:00. Want to take a peek inside? Send us a message or simply drop by!,
,ABOUT THE WELL,
Become the first resident of The Well, a sustainable new residential complex in the heart of Nieuwegein. The project consists of two residential towers with 240 apartments, ranging from 46 to 88 m².,
,The Well has a prime location in the city center of Nieuwegein, next to the Cityplaza shopping center. This mall features several supermarkets, shops, and a gym. Eight trams per hour run from Nieuwegein to Utrecht. A new tram and bus station is currently under construction, providing direct connections to Utrecht’s city center once completed.,
,ABOUT THE APARTMENT,
This stylish and spacious apartment offers a modern and comfortable living experience. The apartment is unfurnished, allowing you the freedom to decorate it to your own taste.,
,You enter the apartment through a large hallway, which leads to the living room. The living room is spacious and features a modern open kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped with high-quality appliances, including a dishwasher, fridge-freezer combo, and a combi-oven.,
,From the living room, you can access the spacious bedroom. Both the living room and bedroom provide access to the loggia, where you can create a cozy sitting area.,
,The hallway also gives access to the bathroom, which is finished with white wall tiles and gray floor tiles. The bathroom includes a walk-in shower, sink, and mirror. The toilet is separate. Lastly, there is a storage room with technical installations and connections for your washing machine and dryer. This storage space is ideal for storing your personal belongings.,
,Good to know,
,
,Walls are finished with white wallpaper,
,You will need to install flooring (PVC or laminate),
,Curtains are already installed,
,Heating, water, electricity, internet, and TV are not included. You must arrange these utilities yourself.,
,
,The Well has a large bicycle storage area and an underground parking garage (with shared cars). Additionally, The Well features a beautiful rooftop garden on the fifth floor and shares a courtyard with The New Citizen and Ivy Apartments. These are perfect spots to relax with fellow residents.,
,ABOUT THE CONTRACT,
,
,Indefinite, minimum stay of 12 months,
,Minimum income is approx. 4x the rent,
,Deposit is approx. 1x the rent,
,

the master bedroom is located at the rear and has air conditioning. Bathroom with towel radiator, washbasin with furniture, bath and shower. Bedroom II at the front also with air conditioning. Bedroom III is also located at the front.,

House Name: For rent: House De Wijer in Hapert
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,310163,
,NB! You can only request a viewing online via this website.,
,Mention the 7 answers to these questions in your viewing request (without these 7 answers, a viewing is not possible):,
,
,Number of adults who will live in the house?,
,Number of children who will live in the house?,
,Do you have pets, if so? Which?,
,Amount of the joint net monthly income?,
,Can you pay an increased deposit if you have insufficient income?,
,The reason for moving?,
,By when you want to move into the house?,
,
,Rental price,
The rental price is excluding gas/water/electricity, but including service costs.,
,Deposit,
At the start of the rental agreement, a deposit is required.,
The apartment will be rented through 'Overbruggingsverhuur'. Overbruggingsverhuur provides a temporary rental agreement for properties that are for sale, based on the legal requirements of the 'Leegstandwet'. There is no waiting list and we offer well-kept houses for an affordable rent.,
,Rental period,
The minimum rental period is 6 months up to a maximum for the duration of the permit according to the 'Leegstandwet'.,
,General information,
In order to rent an Overbruggingsverhuur rental house, the tenant has to meet certain conditions. A summary of these conditions is outlined below.,
,Conditions regarding house hold income,
To meet the income requirement, your net income will need to be approx.3 times the rental price. Any other payment commitments (for example debt collection agency) will be deducted from the house hold income. Another possibility to meet this requirement is to pay a higher deposit.,
,Questions about the property?,
You can contact the landlord for all these questions.,

,Furnished house located near Amsterdam, within walking distance of the Center of Almere Buiten and Doemere with bus stop nearby.,

,Layout: The house has 2 bathrooms, 3 bedrooms and a backyard on the Southeast with veranda.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Bridgemankade 38 in Hoofddorp
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Luxury apartment with stunning views in Hyde Park!,
,Living in a brand new and gas-free apartment as the first resident as of today? This is your chance.,
,This spacious 86 m2 apartment, located under the smoke of Amsterdam, not only offers great views of the beautiful architecturally landscaped city park with an ornamental fountain, but also embodies the ultimate luxury of Hyde Park. And this is only 12 minutes away by train to the Zuidas and 4 minutes from Schiphol Airport. This apartment has a spacious storage room in the basement of no less than 8 m2 and the option to rent a private parking space.,
,Step into a world of comfort and elegance, with a luxurious bathroom, a beautiful kitchen and a stylish toilet. This spacious three-room apartment offers many possibilities. A home office or a spacious family apartment. The home has a lovely private garden overlooking the courtyard garden landscaped by Piet Oudolf. ,
,Hyde Park is an entirely new city neighborhood. Block Kensington is the first unique block in this project with as many as 233 apartments. Designed by Barcode Architects, Block Kensington is very high quality and has a modern and luxurious look. Enjoy the beautiful views of the green, architecturally designed city park and the panoramic views across Hoofddorp. In clear weather, even Zandvoort is visible. ,
,Surroundings:,
Hyde Park gives new meaning to living. There will be various amenities such as restaurants, cafes, a gym, wellness, a supermarket and much more activity. At a short 10-minute walk, through the beautiful city park, you will also find the city center of Hoofddorp.,
The train is within walking distance so you are within 4 minutes at Schiphol Airport, 12 minutes at the Zuidas and in over 20 minutes you are at Amsterdam Central. Also, Haarlem, The Hague and Leiden can also be reached within 30 minutes. Enjoy concierge service, the Hyde Park Butler Point. Arrange your daily packages, dry cleaning services, your groceries and a flower arrangement; Hyde Park Butler Point takes care of it all.,
,Sustainability:,
Homes throughout the new Hyde Park development will be equipped with a Thermal Storage System (WKO). This system provides cooling and heating of the floor. Partly due to the high-quality insulation, this results in an A+++ energy label.,
,Tour:,
Upon arrival at the main entrance, you can already enjoy the ultimate luxurious appearance of the lobby. You can reach the third floor by elevator or stairs.,
After entering the apartment you will immediately find the meter cupboard and storage room and the toilet on the left and a little further on the right. On the other side of the hall are the master bedroom and the second bedroom. Through the hall you also have access to the beautiful and well-equipped bathroom with beautiful sanitary ware and luxurious Porcelanosa tiles.,
Further on you enter the beautiful, well-organized living room with lots of light and a spacious balcony. There is a beautiful view of the city park and the lake with a beautiful fountain. The luxurious kitchen is also fully equipped.,
,Details:,
,
,Usable area 86 m2,
,Completely new, you are the first resident,
,Energy label A++,
,2 bedrooms,
,2 toilets in the apartment,
,1 bathroom with bath, shower, toilet and double sink,
,Lovely terrace with breathtaking views on the city park,
,Storage room of 8 m2 in the basement,
,Underfloor heating and cooling,
,View and access to the communal courtyard garden designed by landscape architect Piet Oudolf,
,Two elevators,
,There is a private parking space underneath the complex that can be rented separately. Inquire about the possibilities,

House Name: For rent: Flat Theresiastraat in Den Haag
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,THE HAGUE BEZUIDENHOUT: Fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment on the first floor, next to the city center of The Hague!,
,PLEASE NOTE: The apartment is ONLY available for 2 STUDENTS who are not from the municipality of Rotterdam and whose duration of study lasts approx. 1 year!,
, Interested? Please respond by the contact buttons next to this description or send us an e-mail ,
,KEY FEATURES:,
• Property is rented furnished,
• Living area of approximately 106m2,
• Located in a pleasant shopping street,
• Close to a wealth of amenities and transport links,
• Also suitable for 2 house sharers,
,AREA:,
Haagse Hout, one of the most beautiful and greenest districts of The Hague, offers a perfect mix of nature, culture and urban life. This district is a true oasis in the busy city and attracts both residents and visitors with its beautiful parks, stately avenues and various facilities. One of the highlights of Haagse Hout is the Haagse Bos, a vast forest area that extends from the center of the city to Wassenaar. This historic forest is one of the oldest forests in the Netherlands and offers numerous hiking and cycling trails, tranquil ponds and even a deer park. The Haagse Bos is the perfect place to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and enjoy nature. The stately Benoordenhout district is located in the middle of Haagse Hout, known for its elegant mansions, wide streets and green squares. This neighborhood exudes an atmosphere of peace and class, with a rich history and a diverse population. It's also home to some of the city's best schools and sports facilities, making it a popular choice for families. The Bezuidenhout district, another important part of Haagse Hout, offers a more lively atmosphere with numerous shops, restaurants and cafés. The famous Theresiastraat is the heart of this neighborhood, where you will find everything from boutiques to cozy eateries. Bezuidenhout is a dynamic and accessible neighborhood, ideal for young professionals and families who enjoy an urban lifestyle with a village character.,
,GROUND FLOOR:,

Garden: Present (5 m², located on the south-east)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Luxury "turn-key" two bedroom apartment with a stunning location beautiful view in new urban district of Hyde Park! ,
,We are proud to present this well-designed "turn-key" apartment with two bedrooms in the beloved new development of Hyde Park, Kensington. This corner apartment of 72m², located on the third floor with a southwest sun orientation, offers a unique location with beautiful views within the new urban district of Hyde Park.,
,T O U R:,
At "Kensington Five", you enter the building through the impressive six-meter high entrance on the ground floor. This entrance, with a modern design, leads you to two elevators that take you to the third floor. Through the spacious hallway, you will find a luxurious separate toilet, a bathroom equipped with Porcelanosa tiles and high-quality Duravit materials, and a large internal storage room. The master bedroom is equipped with high-quality custom-built wardrobes and adjoins a lovely lockable outdoor space. Thanks to the numerous large windows and the corner location, the living room with open kitchen benefits from plenty of natural light. The outdoor space is accessible from the living room and has a pleasant south-facing sun orientation. The modern kitchen is fully equipped with all conveniences and appliances. Additionally, the second bedroom can serve well as an office. The apartment also has a practical storage room separate from the external storage in the basement.,
,L O C A T I O N:,
Hyde Park offers a groundbreaking new development that sets a new standard for contemporary living. A complete new urban district in a unique living environment where comfort and convenience come together. Amenities such as restaurants, cafes, a gym, wellness center, and supermarket are all within easy reach. The shops in the center of Hoofddorp are also nearby.,
,Hyde Park provides an ideal location for commuters, with excellent connections to major cities like Amsterdam, Haarlem, and The Hague, as well as to Schiphol Airport. This location is perfect for those who work in the city but want to enjoy the tranquility and space of a green environment. The train station is within walking distance, providing quick access to your destination: 4 minutes to Schiphol, 12 minutes to the Zuidas, and just over 20 minutes to Amsterdam Central. Haarlem, The Hague, and Leiden are all reachable within 30 minutes.,
,F E A T U R E S:,
,

,Energy label A+,

GO Apartments has 57 parking spaces and 20 scooter parking spaces at ground level. You can park your bicycle in the bicycle shed on the 1st floor. Here you will also find the charging points for electric bicycles.,
There are all kinds of facilities in the building. You can enjoy the rooftop lounge on the 11th floor. How cool is that! From here you have a view of the city. There are intimate areas for lounging and sunbathing and there is room to celebrate the weekend together. There is room in the planters for collective urban farming.,
,You can also use a common study/lounge area on the 1st floor. You do your laundry in the launderette on the ground floor and there are bring-me boxes for your packages. Are we there yet? Almost. We arrange super fast WiFi for you and there is a concierge in the building. GO and enjoy!,
,Go to the project website ****** for more information!,

Private entrance, storage room in the common hallway.,
Bright living room with open kitchen, equipped with a refrigerator with freezer, an induction hob.,
Spacious fully tiled bathroom with a bathtub, shower, double sink with mirror.,
The spacious bedroom offers enough space for a double bed and a large wardrobe.,

,Light, space, and a view! Always wanted to live by the IJ? Then this is the perfect place for you.,
,This lovely 3-bedroom apartment at the NDSM Wharf is directly located by the IJ in Amsterdam. Pontkade was built in 2020 as part of a new project on the NDSM Wharf in Amsterdam. Pontkade is characterized by two towers positioned around the inner courtyard, connected to 8 deck houses. It was even named one of the ten most beautiful projects built in Amsterdam in the past year. The location is at the harbor, allowing you to reach Amsterdam Centraal within a few minutes by ferry.,

The apartment is equipped with a high-quality PVC floor and a modern kitchen with built-in appliances, such as: an induction cooktop, extractor hood, dishwasher, combination microwave, and a fridge-freezer or fridge with freezer compartment. All apartments are also equipped with automatic design sunscreens and underfloor heating. The bathroom is fully tiled to the ceiling and features a walk-in shower and sink. The apartment has a separate toilet. Additionally, the apartment includes a balcony facing the northwest.,

,Location and accessibility:,
The NDSM wharf is a lively square on the banks of the IJ. Here, you can relax with your favorite coffee to-go on a bench, enjoy the sun by the water, and have a spectacular view across the IJ towards Amsterdam.,
,With the free ferries, you can reach Amsterdam Central or Houthaven in 15 minutes, and the Pontsteiger in 5 minutes. By car, you can reach the A10 in 10 minutes via the Klaprozenweg and S118. On a nice day, you could also choose to take a boat ride.,

If you're in the mood for lunch, a drink, or a nice meal out, you can visit one of the exciting dining spots on the wharf, such as Pllek, Noorderlicht, Loetje, CanibaleXL, etc.,

The house has a spacious living room with a beautiful view of the iconic Hofplein. An open kitchen with luxurious furnishings and various built-in appliances. Modern herringbone PVC floor, sleek walls and ceilings. Modern bathroom.,
,This recently renovated apartment on the 7th floor combines modern comfort with a central location in the dynamic CS Kwartier. With Central Station within walking distance, surrounded by various shops and catering establishments, you can enjoy the best that Rotterdam has to offer.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Da Costastraat in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Gorgeous refurbished and upholstered apartment with 2 bedrooms, 1 office/walk in closet, 2 French (Juliet) balconies of around 70 m2 on a quiet location in the popular Oud-West on the edge of Jorda...,
,For this precious penthouse apartment we are looking to find a couple or a single (no sharing) to enjoy its great location as well as its versatile layout with three (3) separate bedrooms! ,
,The apartment is energy efficient with an A label and has both a full kitchen as well as a full bathroom.This is a gorgeous refurbished and upholstered apartment with 2 bedrooms, 1 office/walk in closet, 2 French (Juliet) balconies of around 70 m2 on a quiet location in the popular Oud-West on the edge of Jordaan.,
,The building has been completely rebuilt in 2013, delivering the apartment a label A for energy efficiency, and has been refurbished in November 2020. Located on the second floor one enters the apartment in a hallway that connects to all the rooms of the apartment (see floorplan).,
,The orientation of the apartment is that it runs over the width of two buildings, giving 6 windows facing the pedestrian only zone in the front and 5 windows facing the interior gardens. The windows are oriented East and West, giving excellent morning and afternoon/evening light.,
,The living room is nice and spacious and has a French (Juliet) balcony facing South-West as well as an open kitchen with all modern appliances installed such as dishwasher, fridge, freezer, oven/microwave, stove and extractor fan.,
,The three bedrooms are laid out with two smaller ones in the front and the master bedroom in the back with the bathroom in the middle. One of the bedrooms is too small to be used as a bedroom for adults and can only be used as a walk in closet or small office. ,
,The master bedroom overlooks the interior gardens and is equipped with a French (Juliet) balcony. The bathroom is equipped with a washbasin, cabinet space and a shower in the bathtub.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Lutonhof in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Viewing,: Join us on Saturday, November 30, 2024, at 01:30 PM for a tour. Registration via email is required; selected candidates will receive a confirmation for the viewing day. Please check your spam folder for this invitation.,
,New Development: 5 Beautiful Apartments for Rent in Sloterdijk Centrum (Lutonhof),
,In the vibrant heart of Sloterdijk Centrum, Amsterdam West, we offer five beautiful new apartments for rent. These apartments are situated in an up-and-coming, dynamic neighborhood, full of modern amenities and ideally located for those who want quick access to the city or enjoy a green environment. Ranging from 55m² to 80m², the apartments come with 2 or 3 rooms, ideal for couples, small families, or professionals looking for a stylish and comfortable living space.,
,Only a few minutes’ walk away is Sloterdijk Station, a major hub for train, tram, and bus connections. From here, you can quickly reach the center of Amsterdam, as well as other cities like Haarlem, Zaandam, and Schiphol. The proximity to the A10 ring road also makes it a perfect base for commuters.,
,The neighborhood itself is undergoing a wonderful transformation, combining urban life and relaxation. Sloterdijk has developed significantly in recent years, with new restaurants, coffee bars, and green areas growing in popularity among residents and visitors alike. Amsterdam West is known for its lively atmosphere, cultural diversity, and proximity to the city center without the hustle and bustle.,
,Apartment Specifications,
,Each apartment is carefully designed with a modern layout and high-quality finishes. The spacious and bright living rooms are perfect for cozy evenings or relaxing at home. The open kitchens are fully equipped. Every apartment has its own outdoor space, such as a terrace or balcony, ideal for enjoying a morning coffee or an evening glass of wine.,
,The apartments feature one or two bedrooms, ideal for small families or an extra workspace for remote workers. The bathrooms are modern with a shower and toilet, and there is a handy utility room or storage for extra space.,
,With energy labels A+ and A++, the apartments are comfortable and energy-efficient, offering lower energy costs and a positive environmental impact.,
,Communal Facilities and Parking,
,The complex provides residents with a communal bicycle storage in the underground garage. The neat entrance with lift and staircase creates a welcoming atmosphere for you and your visitors.,
,Practical Information,
,
,Rental Price,: Prices start at €1895per month, excluding utilities (such as heating, electricity, water, internet, and local taxes).,
,Availability,: The apartments are available immediately.,
,Rental Period,: To be determined in consultation.,
,
,Why Live in Sloterdijk Centrum?,
,Sloterdijk is a unique location in Amsterdam, where the city’s modern, cosmopolitan vibe meets a peaceful, green environment. With excellent public transport connections and close proximity to the A10, you can find both urban life and tranquility. Sloterdijk Centrum offers a friendly, safe living environment with a strong community, while the lively city center is just minutes away.,
,These new apartments are the perfect opportunity for those who want to live in a modern, comfortable, and sustainable home in one of Amsterdam's most promising areas. Don’t wait and register for a viewing to experience the atmosphere and comfort of these unique apartments yourself!,
