House Name: For rent: Flat Ten Katestraat 8 H in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Beautiful and unique two-storey apartment of 80m2 located in the vibrant Oud-West district! Every detail has been taken into account, the house is furnished and has 2 large outdoor areas. Come in quickly!,
,Surroundings,
The Ten Kateschool is located in the vibrant Ten Katestraat, located in the Oud-West district. This neighborhood is known for its many trendy restaurants and cafes. You can indulge yourself at Lot 61, Bar Centraal, De Spaghetteria, Café Panache, Le French Café, Café Hendrix, and The Breakfast Club. The crowning glory is the meeting place De Hallen, realized in 2014. Here you will find a diverse range of food courts, but also a cinema and library. In the street you will find the Ten Katemarkt every day, a charming market where you can do your daily fresh groceries, ideal and very cozy!,
,The center of Amsterdam, including the Jordaan and the 9 streets, can be reached within a few minutes by bike. For relaxation and recreation, you can go to the nearby parks: the Vondelpark and the Rembrandtpark. The house is conveniently located with public transport options, so you can quickly reach Amsterdam Central Station, Lelylaan Station, and Sloterdijk. The house is easily accessible from various arterial roads such as the A10 ring road. In addition, the street is one-way and parking is possible with a permit, which also gives you access to several parking garages in the area.,
,Layout,
This beautiful building called De Ten Kateschool breathes history and has been lovingly and with an eye for detail restored to meet the requirements of modern living. With its authentic details, such as the original wooden beams, the stained glass windows, and the terrazzo floors, the entrance of this apartment is an absolute eye-catcher. We have rarely seen a more beautiful entrance in Amsterdam.,
,Through the authentic entrance, you reach the apartment located on the second floor, you enter the hall and this gives you access to several rooms in the house. The toilet is spacious and equipped with a sink.,
,When you enter the living room, you will be surprised by the high ceilings and the beautiful light through the large windows. The good layout has created a spacious sitting and dining area, all details have been thought of, and the house is beautifully coordinated. The living room has a frame TV and the spotlights can be controlled 'smartly', ideal! Through French doors, the rear balcony can be reached from the living room. This has a sunny location on the southwest and borders a green, quiet courtyard.,
,The kitchen is set up in a corner shape and finished in black color tones. The kitchen is equipped with all necessary built-in appliances, including a dishwasher, induction hob with extractor hood, sink, oven, quooker, fridge/freezer, and storage space.,
,Via the stairs in the hall, you reach the second floor of the apartment. The master bedroom has a double bed, clothes rack, and air conditioning. Here too you can see that all colors and materials are coordinated, and beautiful.,
In the heart of the floor is the bathroom, it is neatly finished and has a washbasin, toilet, and walk-in shower. The second room has cupboard space, and can be divided as desired. Ideal for those working from home to create a workplace.,
,Via the stairs, you literally and figuratively reach the highest point of the house, the wonderful and spacious roof terrace. The roof terrace is equipped with a nice lounge sofa and dining table, here you can relax on warm summer days! The wide view provides a great experience!,
,Special features:,
,
,Located in the popular Oud-West district,
,The apartment has both a roof terrace of approx. 22 m² AND a balcony (directly off the living room),
,2 bedrooms,
,Furnished,
,Available immediately,
,Rental price € 2950,- excl. facilities and incl. monthly cleaning,
,Deposit 2 months rent,
,Rental agreement model A (minimum 1 year),
,
,If you meet the following requirements, you can request a viewing:,
,
,Candidate has a permanent job,
,Income requirement 3 X the gross rent,
,Sharing of the house is not desirable,
,Guarantee not possible,
,Pets not allowed,
,

House Name: For rent: House Swaantjesweg in Echt
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,For Rent: Spacious Home at Swaantjesweg, Echt,
,Looking for a comfortable, spacious home in a green and peaceful area? This property at Swaantjesweg 15 in Echt offers the perfect balance of tranquility, nature, and accessibility. Echt is a charming town in central Limburg with all necessary amenities and a rich history, making it ideal for families and professionals.,
,About the Property:,
,
,Living Room: Generous, bright living room with modern finishes,
,Kitchen: Spacious kitchen with built-in appliances and plenty of storage,
,Bedrooms: Four large bedrooms with ample closet space,
,Bathroom: Modern bathroom with a walk-in shower, bathtub, sink, and toilet,
,Outdoor Space: Large garden with terrace, ideal for relaxation and outdoor activities,
,Parking: Private driveway with space for multiple cars,
,
,About the Area:,
,Echt is beautifully situated, with nearby nature reserves like IJzerenbos and De Doort, ideal for hiking and cycling enthusiasts. The historic center of Echt features characteristic buildings and monuments, while the nearby Lilbosch Abbey with its own trappist beer offers a glimpse into Limburg’s rich culture. Local amenities such as shops, schools, and sports facilities are abundant, and with easy access to the A2, A73, and the train station, cities like Roermond, Maastricht, and Düsseldorf are within easy reach.,
,Details:,
,
,Rent: €1,850 per month, excluding utilities (G/W/E),
,Available from: December 1, 2024,
,Rental period: Maximum of 24 months, with the option to extend to an indefinite term,
,Deposit: Two months’ rent,
,Pets allowed upon consultation,
,
,Are you interested in this home in a peaceful location with all amenities close by? Contact us quickly for more information or to schedule a viewing.,
,A unique opportunity to live in a beautiful area in the heart of Limburg!,

House Name: For rent: House Sjef van Kalmthoutstraat in Hoofddorp
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Within walking distance of the lovely shopping center De Vier Meren, we offer this fully furnished 4-bedroom family home for rent. The house has both a front and back garden with detached (bicycle) storage shed and roof terrace. The shopping center has a wide range of shops and restaurants. The train station and the motorways towards Amsterdam, Schiphol and The Hague can also be reached within a few minutes. Available for a minimum and maximum of 12 months.  ,
,Ground floor: Entrance in the hall of the house, where the modern separate toilet with sink is located. The living room can be entered at the end of the hall.,
The living room is spacious and light due to the glass sliding door at the rear of the house, which provides access to the backyard. The open kitchen has been decorated in neutral colours and forms the separation between the living and dining area. It has been equipped with built-in appliances, namely; fridge/freezer, microwave oven and oven, dishwasher, induction hob and extractor hood. The dining area at the front also has large windows along the front of the house.  ,
,First floor: From the landing, three of the bedrooms can be accessed. The bathroom is modern and has been fitted with a toilet, walk-in (rain) shower, double sink with cupboard and mirror and a towel radiator.  ,
,Second floor: On this floor, in addition to the connection for the washing equipment, the fourth bedroom is situated here. This is currently furnished as an office. The roof terrace can also be reached from there.  ,
,Specifications:,
- Walking distance from the shopping center,
- Fully furnished house,
- Front and back garden,
- Modern bathroom,
- Pets not allowed,
- Smoking not allowed,

House Name: For rent: House Valkenboslaan in Den Haag
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,As of February 1st this family home with 4 bedrooms will be available! This beautiful house will be delivered unfurnished. The curtains and various equipment such as washing machine and dryer will of course remain in the home.,
,By postponement, this house is suitable for a family that wants to rent for a period of min. 6 months and maybe this can be extended. Due to the excellent bus and tram connection and the European School within cycling distance, this house is highly recommended for a family with 2 to 4 children!,
,Layout:,
The house has 3 floors. The wooden staircase takes you to the first floor where a spacious Chambre en Suite with high ceilings welcomes you. The modern kitchen with cooking island is fully equipped and forms a beautiful whole with the dining room. On this floor there is also a small bedroom that currently serves as a closet space with a view of the Valkenboslaan. A separate toilet room and an indoor storage room are also located on this floor.,
Via the stairs you reach the master bed room with a small balcony at the front and an unobstructed view of the avenue and the many beautiful facades of buildings on the other side. Directly behind the master bedroom is a spacious walk-in closet. The small bedroom is located at the rear of the house and has 2 patio doors that allow access to the balcony and catch the afternoon and evening light. On this floor there is also a beautiful bathroom with a walk-in shower and a luxurious bath with massage jets to allow you to relax. The beautiful washbasin and the tiles contribute to the feeling of comfort and luxury. The 2nd toilet room and an extra fridge-freezer can also be found on this floor.,
On the top floor are the 2 other bedrooms with possibly an extra storage space for things you do not need immediately.,
,A pet is allowed in consultation.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Reyer Anslostraat 18 huis in Amsterdam
Garden: Present (30 m², located on the west)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Charming 3-Bedroom Apartment with Garden in the Heart of Amsterdam's Old West - Steps from Vondelpark,
,Experience Amsterdam living in this spacious and elegant three-bedroom, double-floor apartment situated on one of the city’s most beautiful side streets, Reyer Anslostraat. Recently painted and freshly upholstered (Q4 2023), this unfurnished 125 sqm apartment offers ample room for a family, along with the convenience of a private garden—perfect for relaxation and entertaining. Available from December 3, 2024, this is your chance to live in a serene, family-friendly neighborhood, just 50 meters from the iconic Vondelpark.,
,Highlights,
,
,Ideal for Families:, Thoughtfully designed for family living, this residence spans two levels and provides a private outdoor sanctuary in the heart of Amsterdam.,
,Prime Location:, Situated in the upscale, child-friendly area between Overtoom and the Vondelpark entrance, the apartment offers a peaceful setting while being within reach of the city’s vibrant café and shopping scene.,
,Nearby Amenities:, Enjoy eclectic shops, trendy eateries like Bagels & Beans and Café Oslo, and an array of boutique stores in the Helmersbuurt neighborhood.,
,Easy Access:, Well-connected by public transportation, with several direct tram and bus lines leading to Amsterdam’s city center and major train stations. For drivers, ample (paid) parking is available.,
,
,Apartment Layout,
,
,Ground Floor,: Enter through a welcoming hallway into a spacious, half-open dining kitchen, fully equipped with modern appliances and separated from the living room by elegant glass doors. The living area opens to a sunny 30 sqm garden, ideal for al fresco dining or relaxing afternoons.,
,Lower Level (Souterrain),: Three bedrooms, including a master suite with direct garden access, create a private retreat for the family. The luxurious bathroom, located centrally, boasts a double-sized shower for two, a bathtub, and even a TV. Two additional bedrooms offer flexible space for children or guests. This level also includes a practical pantry/storage room and a washer/dryer cabinet.,
,

House Name: For rent: House Hoofdweg 54 in Amsterdam
Garden: Present (61 m², located on the west)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Lovely family home spread over three floors plus basement, with five bedrooms, two bathrooms, rear garden facing south-west and private roof terrace in a very nice and ideal location in the Baarsjes between the popular Oud Zuid and trendy Oud West, with easy access to the A-10, and via the pleasant Overtoom with its many shops and cafés, to Amsterdam city centre.,
,N.B. Unfurnished and limited availability for a period of two to three years while owners work abroad. Contract based on intermediate rent (Model C). For specific furbishing/furnishing details see below.,
,Are you looking for space in the city without upstairs or downstairs neighbours; a quiet garden for private dining and to enjoy the fresh air, a playroom for the children or your own study with a view over the trees of the garden? With a second kitchen and an upstairs bedroom with access to shower and toilet, this house also offers a great space for an au-pair. Fully insulated (double glazing (HR/ HR++) and with air conditioning in all bedrooms where possible, this house has an energy label C, so it is economical for a 1920s mansion.,
,Access to the house via your own front garden with enough space for (cargo) bikes and children's bikes.,
,LAYOUT,
Ground floor,
Through a representative vestibule with original stained glass door you enter the hall, which gives access to the downstairs toilet, the stairs to the upper floor, and the stairs to the basement. A door also provides access to the spacious kitchen.,
,The kitchen is the beating heart of this family home. With three-meter high ceilings, original stained glass doors to the living room and a modern fully equipped fitted kitchen (SMEG, Bosch and AEG, such as a combination microwave, oven, built-in refrigerator and freezer, dishwasher and a Quooker. The kitchen has a 5-burner gas stove, an extractor hood and a double sink) this is the place for the family and cozy dinners. Folding French doors also provide access to the garden, where you can also eat in peace. The garden furniture can be removed in consultation, but is in good condition and fits in perfectly with the house. For example, the BBQ furniture with Green Egg is also made available to tenants. For the kids, there is also a tree house to play in and the garden to kick a ball in.,
,The ensuite cupboards to the living room offer plenty of decorative storage space, and the dining bar next to the garden doors is a perfect place to enjoy a glass of wine, for a coffee machine and to consult cookbooks. The sturdy herringbone floor (Hungarian point) runs via ensuite doors from the kitchen to the living room. Here you can enjoy beautiful morning light, and also in the evening the cozy gas fireplace.,
,
,If desired, the sofa and the dining kitchen table can be left for use by tenants.,
,
,Basement,
The modern washing machine and dryer are built in at the bottom of the lazy stairs to the basement. Here you can organize the laundry in one go to go back upstairs. These can be left on prior consulation with the owner.,
,The hall provides access to a spacious, well-ventilated playroom which is also suitable as a studio/workroom, a nice storage room with wine racks, and the utility room with sink.,
,First floor,
Via the stairs you reach the first floor, with 3 airconditioned bedrooms and a large bathroom. The bathroom, accessible from both the landing and the master bedroom, has a large walk-in rain shower, a (whirlpool) bath, a double sink, a designer towel radiator and a toilet. The bathroom has a pleasant, calm appearance due to the soft use of color, the natural materials and the Moroccan tiles.,
,The master bedroom provides access to a spacious walk-in closet, and through floor-to-ceiling French doors a balcony bordering the quiet backyard. The bedroom at the front is also light due to the large high windows and provides access to a balcony at the front. At the front is also a smaller room, which is perfect as a children's room or study.,
,Second floor,
Via the landing on the 1st floor you go to the second floor with a fixed staircase. Here are 2 more spacious bedrooms, the second bathroom and the stairs to the roof terrace. Here you will also find a pantry kitchen. The bedroom on the garden side is wonderful to use as a quiet home office, and the bedroom at the front with its high roof has an attractive spacious feeling and also gives access to the bathroom with shower, sink and toilet.,
,Roof terrace,
The fixed staircase gives access to the roof terrace, which consists of hardwood decking with sedum planting all around. The sedum, and a thick layer of insulation underneath, ensure good roof insulation.,
,SURROUNDINGS,
The area around Hoofdweg is quickly developing into a lively neighborhood with more and more delightful coffee spots and cozy restaurants. For daily groceries, you can head to Kinkerstraat. But nowadays, you’ll also find a growing number of hidden gems in the neighborhood where you can enjoy a delicious meal or a good cup of coffee.,
,For instance, Café Oslo on Sloterkade is a popular spot for lunch or drinks, with a friendly atmosphere and a large terrace by the water. Coffee lovers should check out White Label Coffee on Jan Evertsenstraat, where you can drink delicious freshly brewed coffee in a relaxed setting. Looking for a place to work quietly or catch up with friends? Bar Spek, also on Jan Evertsenstraat, combines a laid-back vibe with an extensive menu for breakfast, lunch, and dinner.,
,For food enthusiasts, there is also plenty of choice nearby. Restaurant Edel, located in a beautiful building by the water of Erasmuspark, offers a charming setting for dinner or drinks. And of course, there is De Hallen, just a few minutes' walk from Hoofdweg. Here, you can explore the Foodhallen and choose from a wide variety of global cuisines, from Asian street food to gourmet burgers, all in the hip, industrial decor of the former tram depot.,
,In addition to the emerging dining scene, the area offers plenty of green spaces and relaxation options. The Vondelpark, one of Amsterdam’s largest and most famous parks, is just a short bike ride away. Here, you can enjoy walking, jogging, or simply relaxing with a picnic in the sun. Closer to home is Rembrandtpark, a quieter but spacious park where you can walk, exercise, or relax in the greenery.,
,And then there’s the well-known Ten Katemarkt, one of the most vibrant markets in the city. Here, you can shop daily for fresh vegetables, fruits, flowers, and all sorts of other products. Right next to the market lies De Hallen, where you can not only enjoy great food but also catch a movie in the FilmHallen or explore art and culture in the various galleries and shops.,
,Within a few minutes of cycling, you’ll also reach the Jordaan, where you can stroll through charming streets and discover a wealth of boutiques, cafés, and restaurants. This mix of bustling hospitality, parks, markets, and proximity to the city center makes Hoofdweg and its surroundings an increasingly attractive place to live in Amsterdam.,
,Here, you can enjoy a dynamic neighborhood with a pleasant balance between city life, up-and-coming hotspots, and tranquil green spaces.,
,Characteristics/Conditions,
Rent: €6500,- excl. per month,

Available for 24 to 36 months (From: 01-01-2025 to 31-12-2026 (with option to extend for 1 year),

                                                        ,This beautifully furnished 3-bedroom apartment with energy label A is located on the 29th floor of the New Babylon complex in The Hague. The Hague Central Station, with its trains, trams, and buses, is just a few steps away, and major highways (A12 and A4) are easily accessible. Schiphol airport is within 30 minutes by direct train.,

Have a drink on a terrace in the city center of The Hague at the famous "Plein" or "Grote Markt" or treat yourself to a lovely lunch or dinner in one of the restaurants situated here. ,

The bright living area has ceiling-to-floor windows and sliding doors that give access to a spacious balcony offering a nice panoramic view over the city. The modern open kitchen is fully fitted with modern appliances such as an induction hob, extractor hood, microwave, oven, fridge-freezer, and dishwasher.,
,The master bedroom is very spacious and looking out on the park. Another two good sized bedrooms are present and may serve as a study or a walk-in closet if desired. The luxurious bathroom is fully equipped with a freestanding bathtub, shower, and two separate washbasins. A separate toilet is in the hall along with a large utility room equipped with a washer and dryer.,
Underfloor heating and cooling provide comfort throughout the year. Parking is not included but can be arranged separately. Service charges are an additional €200 per month.,

,Description,

                                                        ,At a beautiful location on the Zuidas, we offer this spacious apartment from the 1st of December 2024. The living room with an open corner kitchen of about 33 square metres is located at the rear of the apartment. The open corner kitchen is equipped with all the necessary built-in appliances. The three bedrooms are located next to each other and have an area of about 14, 11 and 9 square metres. The bathroom is equipped with a walk-in shower, bathtub, sink with double taps and a towel radiator. In addition, the apartment has an indoor storage room with washing machine connection and a separate toilet.,
,The apartment complex is located in the middle of the Zuidas. Also known as the international  business center of Amsterdam. In addition to working, it is also a wonderful place to live. The Zuidas is centrally located in relation to shops, restaurants, supermarkets, entertainment venues, schools and sports centers. The Beatrixpark or Amsterdamse Bos can also be reached within walking distance. From the apartment you can walk to Amsterdam Zuid station for the train, metro and bus in a few minutes. House Name: For rent: Flat Adriaan Kooningsstraat in Rotterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Now available!  ,
,A high-quality finished and stylishly furnished 3-room apartment with private parking in the vibrant district "de Veranda" in Rotterdam South. The apartment is located on the 2nd floor of the apartment complex 'Van Goghcomplex'.,
Really all amenities are within walking distance.  ,
,The district:  ,
,De Veranda is a relatively young area with its arrival in the late 90s. It is a place with on one side the wonderful peace of the passing boats and the rippling water of the Nieuwe Maas and on the other side the pleasant bustle of young Rotterdam who visit De Veranda for the necessary entertainment. De Veranda is therefore the place to be for young and old and makes it a real Rotterdam district!  ,
,Exit roads:  ,
,Over the Varkenoordseviaduct and the Laan op Zuid you are in the bustling city center by bike or car in no time via the Erasmus bridge. There are also several exit roads nearby. Via the Stadionweg you can quickly reach the Feijenoord entrance of the A16 near the Van Brienenoord bridge.  ,
,Public transport facilities:  ,
,In the district there are various public transport facilities such as tram line 23 that commutes between P R Beverwaard and Marconiplein and Rotterdam-Zuid train station is within walking distance. Want to be transported in a different way? Then you can also get a long way in Rotterdam with the water taxi!  ,
,Parking:  ,
,You can easily park in your own parking space in the closed parking garage.  ,
,Restaurants and entertainment venues:  ,
,To make living at De Veranda even more pleasant, you have several restaurants within walking distance, ranging from delicious pastas at Happy Italy to refined Afghan dishes at Helai and all you can eat sushi at Shabu Shabu. You will also not get bored quickly in this neighborhood, because you have a large Pathé cinema, bowling and a gym around the corner.  ,
,Layout of the house  ,
,Ground floor  ,
,Closed entrance with doorbells and mailboxes. Spacious central hall with elevator and staircase.  ,
,Entrance, spacious hall with access to all rooms.,
Hall, toilet and access to the two bedrooms and access to the balcony.  ,
,The bright and spacious living room is divided into a sitting and dining area, and has a lot of light due to the corner location. In the middle of the living room a very luxurious open kitchen which is equipped with all appliances.,
The luxurious bathroom has a washbasin, walk-in shower and a bath.  ,
,Conditions:  ,
,- Acceptance immediately,
- Minimum rental period of 12 months,
- Income exclusively from work, the monthly income requirement is 3.5x the rent,
as gross income,
- The deposit is € 4000,-,
- The rent is excluding district heating, water, electricity, TV/internet etc.,
- Viewing requests exclusively by email,

House Name: For rent: Flat Knollendamstraat 4 3 in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,ENGLISH TRANSLATION,
,In a fantastic location on a side street off Spaarndammerstraat, we are offering this apartment with two bedrooms, a balcony, and a wonderful rooftop terrace! The property is within walking distance of many shops, two supermarkets, restaurants, and bars.,
,LAYOUT,
The property is accessible via the communal stairwell and is located on the third floor. Upon entering, you find yourself in a hallway that leads to the living room. The living room is situated at the front of the apartment and offers a lovely view over the corner of Spaarndammerstraat and Knollendamstraat.,
,At the rear, there is a kitchen with an island. The kitchen is fully equipped with a Quooker tap, refrigerator with freezer, dishwasher, and an induction hob with integrated extraction. There is also ample storage space, and the adjacent balcony can be accessed through French doors.,
,An internal staircase leads to the second floor, where two bedrooms are located. One bedroom is at the front, and the other is at the back of the property. Thanks to the dormer windows, there is plenty of natural light and ample space. This floor also features a separate toilet and a bathroom equipped with a bathtub, walk-in shower, radiator, and double sink with matching furniture. From the hallway, the rooftop terrace can be accessed via an internal staircase.,
,The entire property has wooden flooring, finished with designer and vintage furnishings.,
,AREA,
Knollendamstraat is a charming side street of Spaarndammerstraat, located just a stone’s throw from Westerpark and the popular Westergas area. You can walk right into the wonderful Jordaan area within 10 minutes, or 3 minutes by bike. Central Station can be easily reached by bus or a 10 minute cycle and there’s great accessibility to the highway for cars.  ,
,In the immediate vicinity, there are numerous dining options and coffee bars, including Dignita, Walvis, Moos, Rayleigh & Ramsay and the atmospheric small plates restaurant Compartir. ,
,On top of that, Sparndammerstraat has everything you could ever need including an Albert Heijn and a Jumbo, numerous take-away options, 5 pizza places, a Kruidvat, a pharmacy, doctor and dental practice. Additionally, the property is situated next to the Houthaven, where there is a bustling swimming spot at Boat & Co which can be enjoyed during the summer. ,
,STREETNAME,
Knollendamstraat is a street in the Amsterdam Spaarndammerbuurt, named after the village of the same name in the Zaanstreek in North Holland. The streets in the Spaarndammerbuurt are named after places to the northwest of Amsterdam.,
,This non-binding rental information has been carefully compiled by our office based on the information provided to us by the landlord. Therefore, we cannot provide any guarantees, nor can we accept any liability for this information in any way. All measurements are indicative, and The Rental Agency accepts no liability for discrepancies.,

                                                        ,Beautiful recently renovated ground floor apartment with a big sunny garden located in the popular Statenkwartier area. This lovely apartment has beautiful parquet flooring and a brand-new kitchen en bathroom. The property is within walking distance of the beach and Frederik Hendriklaan, where you can find a wide variety of restaurants and shops. Public transport (tramline 16) stops in front of the door and many international organizations are located in the immediate area.,
,Layout:,
Entrance at street level, entrance to the apartment. Hallway with beautiful marble flooring, separate toilet, and cupboard with storage space. Spacious bright living and dining room en suite with a brand new open kitchen. The living- and dining areas are fitted with nice parquet flooring and authentic mantelpieces. The modern kitchen is equipped with all built-in appliances, like an induction cooking plate, oven, dishwasher refrigerator, and freezer. From the dining area, you can access the lovely garden via sliding doors. The sunny garden can be reached via the back and is facing West. ,
,The good-sized master bedroom is situated in the extension of the property, has opening doors to the garden, and is equipped with floor heating.  Adjacent room that perfectly can be used as an office or dressing room, second bedroom next to it. Completely renovated bathroom, that is equipped with a walk-in shower, bathtub, washbasin with mirror, washing machine, and dryer. A storage box is present in the basement of the apartment complex.,
,This lovely apartment is worth a visit! ,

,

,Description,

                                                        ,Rotterdam’s Blijdorp district is one of the greenest areas in the city, with parks and tree-lined streets that make it ideal for walking and outdoor activities. Both bedrooms have big glass doors which provide the rooms with beautifull natural daylight. There is space for a double bed, closet and a desk. ,

House Name: For rent: Flat Vrijheidslaan in Leiden
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Vrijheidslaan, Leiden (approx. 80m2) € 1950,- Excl. G/W/E,
,Alert: will be delivered without furniture (unfurnished),
,This modern furnished 2 bedroom apartment offers an excellent opportunity for those looking for a home in a central location with all amenities within easy reach. Located on the sixth floor of a well-maintained apartment complex, this apartment was modernized in 2017 and fully insulated, making it both energy-efficient and comfortable. The apartment offers a light and spacious feel, with a sunny terrace and a beautiful view of the city.,
,Layout and features of the property:,
The bright living and dining room has a neat laminate floor and offers access to the terrace, which is ideal for enjoying the sun. The sunny terrace, located on the northwest, offers a beautiful view of the city and is the perfect place to relax outside. The modern open kitchen (2017) in a practical L-shape is equipped with various built-in appliances, including a recirculation hood, 4-burner gas hob, combination microwave, fridge-freezer and dishwasher. The kitchen offers sufficient space for cooking and eating, with all necessary conveniences within reach.,
The apartment has two bedrooms, both with lots of natural light, giving the rooms a light and fresh appearance. The modern bathroom (2017) is equipped with a bath and a washbasin, and offers everything you need for relaxation and comfort.,
There is also a shared bicycle shed on the ground floor, ideal for safely storing your bicycle. The apartment is equipped with a video intercom system, which offers extra security and convenience. Thanks to the good insulation, including double glazing and a heat recovery system (WTW), you benefit from low energy costs and a pleasant indoor climate.,
,Location and accessibility:,
The location of this apartment is ideal for those who want to enjoy both the city and the proximity of amenities. The shopping centre De Luifelbaan is located nearby and offers various shops, sports facilities, a GP and a dental practice. The pleasant centre of Leiden is only a 7-minute bike ride away (2.5 km), and with various bus connections nearby, public transport is easily accessible. The house is easily accessible by car, as the N11 towards Alphen aan den Rijn and Utrecht, and the A4 and A44 motorways towards Amsterdam and The Hague are easily accessible. Leiden Central Station and Lammenschans Station are also a short distance away.,
,Special features:,
The apartment was modernised in 2017, with attention to both comfort and energy efficiency.,
The complex is well maintained, fully insulated and has energy label A.,
Ideal for those looking for a furnished home in a central and easily accessible location in Leiden.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Bergse Rechter Rottekade in Rotterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Available for rent based on the Vacancy Act!  ,
,- Fully furnished, luxury penthouse (142m2) with breathtaking views of Hillegersberg,
- Panoramic view of the Rotte, the Bergse Plas, the lock and the skyline of Rotterdam,
- Including a private jetty with moorings on the Rotte, ideal for boating enthusiasts.,
- Living area 142 m². Storage 8 m². Terrace 26 m²,
- Extensively renovated three years ago with an interior designer and sustainable living with,
energy label B.,
- One private parking spaces on enclosed grounds available. There is an option for a second parking private parking spot.,
- A storage room,
- Green surroundings around the Bergse Plassen in front of the front door, a wonderful place for a walk or a bike ride,
- Located at a short distance from supermarkets, restaurants, the village center of Hillegersberg,,
Rotterdam Noord station, the center of Rotterdam and various tram stops, the A13 and the A20.  ,
,Now available for temporary rental an exclusive and luxurious furnished penthouse (142m2) with breathtaking views in a fantastic location in Rotterdam Hillegersberg. The apartment is located on the fifth and top floor of a modern and well-maintained apartment complex "De Regentes" and has its own parking space and storage room. From the entire house you have a panoramic view over the Rotte, the Bergse Plas, the lock and the skyline of Rotterdam.,
Located a short distance from supermarkets, restaurants, the village center of Hillegersberg, Rotterdam Noord station, the center of Rotterdam and various tram stops, the A13 and the A20.  ,
,Layout ground floor:  ,
,The central entrance provides access to the apartment complex "De Regentes" with a lift, staircase, storage rooms, and the parking space at the rear.  ,
,Fifth floor:  ,
,The entrance leads to a spacious hall with wardrobe.,
The spacious living room of this penthouse shines with a beautiful gas fireplace and offers impressive views over the Rotte, the Bergse Voorplas and the Rotterdam skyline. The living room is finished with a beautiful herringbone floor, plastered walls, ceiling with recessed spotlights and equipped with various built-in cupboards. The large glass facades allow abundant daylight to flow in and provide access to the terrace that covers the entire almost 20 meter width of the apartment. Part of the terrace is covered, so that the outdoor life seamlessly connects to the spacious indoor space.,
The open kitchen with cooking island is equipped with the following luxury built-in appliances: separate fridge/freezer, dishwasher, high-pressure steam oven, plate warmer, induction hob with extractor system and a coffee machine. While cooking, you can enjoy a beautiful view of the Bergse Plas.,
From the kitchen, the utility room is accessible with lots of practical storage space, the washer/dryer connection and the location of the central heating boiler.,
The master bedroom has fitted wardrobes, offers a view of the Rotte and gives access to the terrace through a sliding door. Bedroom two is located at the rear and is currently used as a study.,
The bathroom has a bath with whirlpool, a separate shower, toilet, double sink, fixed cupboard and towel radiator.,
The bathroom has a beautiful skylight which provides extra daylight. The second toilet is very spacious and has a wall closet, urinal and fountain, which ensures optimum functionality and comfort.  ,
,Outdoor space:  ,
,Spacious terrace, located on the southeast, across the entire width of the apartment with a beautiful view of the Rotte, the Bergse Voorplas and the skyline of Rotterdam. A great combination of the city and the beautiful nature.  ,
,Conditions:  ,
,- Acceptance as of January 2, 2025,
- Minimum rental period of 6 months based on the Vacancy Act. Maximum rental period is,
decided in consultation.,
- The deposit is € 7,500,-,
- The rental price is excluding gas, water, electricity, TV/internet, etc.,
- Viewing requests only accepted by email,

Furnished,
,Located on Van Alkemadelaan in The Hague, this apartment offers the perfect combination of peace, nature, and convenience within easy reach. Just a 5-minute drive away is Gentsestraat, a lively shopping street full of charming boutiques where you can find everything you need for daily life. The coast is also nearby: within minutes, you can walk to the beach, with the iconic Scheveningen Pier just a stone’s throw away.,
,For sports enthusiasts, there are plenty of options within walking distance. At Klein Zwitserland, you can play tennis, padel, hockey, and work out at the fitness center. There's also an equestrian center nearby. Several international schools are also located in the vicinity. The neighborhood is beautifully green and peaceful, making it an ideal spot for both families and professionals.,
,Layout of the apartment,
You enter the complex through the central entrance, where you can choose between the stairs or the elevator to reach the 4th floor, where the apartment is located.,
,Upon entering, you are greeted by a spacious hallway that offers access to the toilet on the left. The hallway itself is particularly large and, with a desk, can serve perfectly as a workspace. From the hallway, you have access to the spacious living room, three bedrooms, and the bathroom.,
,The living room is bright and airy, thanks to the large windows that provide plenty of natural light. The space is divided into a cozy seating area and a dining area, perfect for relaxing and hosting dinners with friends or family. The living room also offers access to the balcony, where you can enjoy the fresh air.,
,The kitchen is equipped with every convenience a cooking enthusiast could desire. Here you’ll find an impressive 6-burner gas stove with double ovens and an extractor hood, a dishwasher, refrigerator, and freezer.,
,The bathroom provides all the comfort you need, with a bathtub, walk-in shower, and a sink with a natural stone basin.,
,The entire apartment features a beautiful herringbone parquet floor, giving the apartment a luxurious and warm appearance.,
,Garage,
On the ground floor, you will find a spacious garage of no less than 26 m², who is not included in the rental price. Perfect for parking your car or as extra storage space.,
,Summary,
,Spacious 3-bedroom apartment,
Fully furnished,
Available from October 1st for a maximum rental period of 24 months,
Rent: €2500 per month, including service charges, excluding gas/water/electricity,
Optional: Spacious garage of 26 m² for €200 per month,

House Name: For rent: House Klipperwerf in Leiden
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Spacious and charming family home with garden and private parking. Welcome to this lovely, spacious family home featuring a beautiful garden and a private parking space under the carport. Located in the popular Merenwijk neighborhood in Leiden, this property offers the perfect balance between urban convenience and natural tranquility. The house includes an open kitchen, a bright living room, four bedrooms, a toilet on both the ground and first floors.,
,Layout,
Ground Floor: Upon entering, you are welcomed into the hallway, with the meter cabinet and a separate toilet. From the hallway, you step into the spacious living room with an open kitchen on the right. The kitchen and dining area are generously sized, perfect for cozy family dinners or entertaining guests. The bright living room provides access to the sunny, southeast-facing backyard, where you can enjoy a peaceful outdoor space with plenty of privacy. In the garden, you’ll also find a convenient storage shed with extra space. A staircase in the hallway leads to the first floor.,
First Floor: On the first floor, a spacious landing gives access to three comfortable bedrooms. You’ll also find a separate toilet, and a bathroom equipped with a shower and washbasin.,
Second Floor: Stairs to the second floor, leading to a spacious landing with ample storage options or potential for a home office. This floor also features an additional bedroom, ideal as a quiet workspace or guest room.,
In short, this home offers everything a family needs: space, comfort, and an excellent location. Are you looking for a wonderful family home in a peaceful, green environment?,
,Location,
Merenwijk is a green, tranquil neighborhood on the eastern edge of Leiden, offering a wide range of amenities. The nearby shopping center, De Kopermolen, provides a diverse selection of supermarkets, stores, boutiques, and cozy dining spots. For leisure and recreation, the area is surrounded by lush landscapes, water features, and beautiful parks. Watersports enthusiasts can enjoy the nearby Kagerplassen area, with plenty of opportunities for sailing, canoeing, and boating. Additionally, the neighborhood features various schools, daycare centers, and playgrounds, making Merenwijk a popular choice for families seeking a safe, quiet place to raise their children.,
,Key features,
,
,Lovely garden,
,Separate storage shed,
,Carport,
,Open kitchen,
,4 bedrooms,
,
,Rent: €2995,-  excl. utilities – furnished,

Considering the historical function of this road, it has many characteristic and attractive buildings. Downtown roads and shopping centres can be reached within a few minutes. Here is a beautiful new high quality finished 3-room corner apartment with a spacious balcony and separate storage room.,
,The apartment is located on the 3rd floor, gets a beautiful wood-colored floor, has plastered walls and sleek ceilings, 2 spacious bedrooms, a bright living room, a bathroom with double sink, bath and shower, a nice spacious balcony and a spacious storage room.,
,This apartment distinguishes itself from the other apartments because it is located on a corner so the view is sublime, has a balcony which always has sun, the bathroom is equipped with double sinks with beautiful cabinets underneath, the kitchen has a beautiful island. In short ... Just that little bit more which gives an extra dimension to living!,

- High finishing levels,
- Centrally located near shops, cafes and centre,

,Description,

                                                        ,Stunning 120m² Apartment in the Heart of Amsterdam – A City Living Dream!,

House Name: For rent: House Teckop in Kamerik
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,A Day at Teckop Estate..... Are you an outdoorsman who longs for peace and quiet?,
Imagine: the sun is rising and birdsong wakes you up. After a refreshing shower in the luxurious bathroom, you start your day with a cup of coffee at the kitchen table or in a sunny spot in the garden. This is living in style, but with the simplicity and tranquility that nature offers.,
,WELCOME TO THE TECKOP ESTATE,
,Space and atmosphere..... Upon entering, you immediately feel the warm and cozy atmosphere this villa exudes. The spacious entrance leads you to a spacious bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, a separate toilet and the stairs to both the basement and the bedroom floor. Through double doors you enter the bright living room, where large windows allow you to enjoy stunning views of the surrounding countryside. A great place to relax! This is what you dream of: settling down by the fireplace in the evening after a long day of work, with a good book in your hand and a glass of wine and then feeling for a moment that the world stands still for just a moment. The living kitchen, equipped with modern appliances, is a true paradise for any cooking enthusiast. Here too, you have a fantastic view over the meadows, making cooking a relaxing experience. Through French doors you step into the sunny garden - a green oasis with several terraces, perfect for lounging, dining or barbecuing. Under the attractive canopy, you can also enjoy long, balmy summer evenings outdoors.,
,Extra outbuilding for your passions ...... In addition to the villa there is a spacious outbuilding that can be completely furnished to your liking. The perfect place for a private gym, a workshop or a hobby room.,
,Space for everyone..... Upstairs there are three spacious bedrooms, including the master bedroom, and a generous loft that can serve perfectly as a home office. The luxurious bathroom is stylishly finished and offers every comfort for a relaxing start to the day. Enjoy the freestanding bathtub on graceful legs - a real eye-catcher - a spacious walk-in shower, and double sinks. Here you start each day fresh and relaxed, in surroundings that exude luxury and tranquility.,
,Perfect location and accessibility ........This villa offers the ideal balance between tranquility and accessibility. Just a 10-minute drive from Woerden and half an hour from cities like Utrecht and Amsterdam, you'll live here in the countryside without being far from the city. The house is accessed via an automatic gate with remote control, and on the property itself there is plenty of parking, including a charging station for electric cars.,
,In short........Do you already see yourself coming home to Teckop Estate, where nature meets luxury? Come experience it for yourself - maybe this will be your new home in the Green Heart.,
,PARTICULARS:,
Available from February 1, 2025,
Rental period: indefinite (minimum of 12 months),
Rental price € 4.250,00,
Advance € 400,00 gas and light,
Security deposit € 4.250,00,
Living space 300 m2 - content 806 m3,
Excluding water/internet/tv and municipal taxes,
Unfurnished,
Not suitable for students or house sharers,
No pets allowed,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Well maintained spacious 2 bedroom top apartment with balcony, on the 2nd floor of the apartment complex 'Smaragd'. Tram stop Vuurplaat can be reached within a few minutes. In addition, the Rijnhaven metro station is within walking distance,
,Layout: ground floor: closed entrance with wide representative hall, doorbells, mailboxes, staircase, 2 elevators and access to a private storage room for bicycles, among other things. 2nd floor: entrance apartment; Modern video intercom (recently installed). Hall with meter cupboard (recently completely renovated) and toilet with a standing closet and sink. All rooms in the apartment can be reached through the spacious hall; The spacious living room at the front of the apartment is provided with lots of light through the large windows; The semi-open kitchen can be reached through the living room. The kitchen is equipped with a neutral kitchen unit with a luxurious natural stone kitchen top and a handy wall cabinet, the kitchen is also equipped with a dishwasher. In addition, the kitchen offers sufficient storage space and there is room for a cozy dining area; The north-facing balcony can be accessed through the kitchen. Bedroom I is the largest bedroom, it is nicely finished with laminate flooring and there is a lot of light through the large windows; Bedroom II is spacious, nicely finished with laminate flooring and again there is a lot of light through the large window; The large fully tiled bathroom has a walk-in shower and offers many possibilities for a personal layout; Spacious laundry room with washing machine and dryer connections, also handy to use as an extra storage room; The entire house has a neat laminate floor, plastered walls and the beautiful window frames are made of wood and equipped with double glazing.,

Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,U HEEFT EEN OBJECTCODE NODIG ALS U ONS BELT. DE CODE IS: 7 9 6 9 5,
Bezichtiging,
Wij plannen alleen een bezichtiging wanneer u een Qii account heeft aangemaakt en uw gegevens via DigiD aan ons, ter inzage, heeft vrijgegeven.,

Bent u op zoek naar een appartement in het bruisende Haarlem? Dan is deze 2-kamerwoning misschien een geschikte woning voor u!? ,
,Woning,
Gezamelijke hal met trap en lift. Via uw entree komt u in de hal waar aansluitend de slaapkamer, toilet en badkamer aan grenzen. In de ruime woonkamer heeft u een open keuken die voorzien is van alle luxe apparatuur. ,
,Woonomgeving,
Wonen in dit complex is voor de liefhebber van rust in de woning, maar alle drukte en gezelligheid op loopafstand. Restaurants, terrasjes, bioscoop (Pathé), de Jopen kerk en winkels op loopafstand. ,
,Indien u NIET voldoet aan de hiernavolgende inkomenseisen, is het niet mogelijk de woning aan te huren. ,
,Bijzonderheden,
-Beschikbaar circa per eind november,
-Bouwjaar 2011,
-Energielabel A,
-1 slaapkamer,
-Luxe keuken met inbouwapparatuur,
-Badkamer met baddouche en dubbele wasbak,
-Inpandig en externe berging,
-Woning wordt ongemeubileerd verhuurd,
-Huurder dient zelf zorg te dragen voor het sauzen of behangen van de muren en wanden en het leggen van een vloerbedekking,
-Huurprijs is exclusief servicekosten van ca € 72,62 per maand (incl voorschot water),
-Huurder dient zelf gas en/of elektra aan te vragen ,

-Kredietwaardig en voldoet aan inkomensnormen (48 x de netto huur als bruto jaarinkomen);,
-Bij één inkomen dient het bruto jaarsalaris minimaal ca. 48 keer de maandhuur van de woning te zijn (bij deze woning van € 1.460,- huur per maand, is het bruto jaarsalaris dus minimaal ca. € 70.080,-). Bij twee inkomens dienen de twee bruto jaarsalarissen samen minimaal 48 keer de maandhuur van de woning te zijn.,
-Waarborgsom van tweemaal de netto huur € 2.920,- ,
,Huurperiode,
-Een huurovereenkomst voor ten minste één jaar en wordt daarna automatisch verlengd voor onbepaalde tijd;,
-Na de minimale huurperiode van één jaar bedraagt de opzegtermijn voor de huurder één maand;,
-De huurperiode kan op elke dag van de maand ingaan. Yvastgoed bepaald de ingangsdatum van de huur. ,

-Maximaal twee volwassen personen op de huurovereenkomst;,
-Toetsing inkomen op alle contractanten, zegt één contractant op zal er opnieuw een toetsing worden gedaan, is het inkomen onvoldoende dienen alle contractanten op te zeggen;,

-Woning wordt niet verhuurd aan studenten;,
-Friends-contracten worden niet verstrekt;,
-Garantstelling (door bijvoorbeeld ouders) worden niet geaccepteerd;,
-De woning kan niet als pied-à-terre worden gehuurd;,
-Huurder dient zich op het adres in te schrijven bij de gemeente;,
-Huurders van Ymere die een sociale huurwoning achterlaten krijgen voorrang, met uitzondering van een tijdelijk contract;,
-Een creditcheck maakt onderdeel uit van onze toewijzingsprocedure, bij aanmelding verleent u hiervoor automatisch toestemming; ,

Op straat is het betaald parkeren, voor de kosten kunt u kijken op de website van de gemeente.,
Wanneer u een eigen parkeerplaats wenst kunt u via Parkeerruimte (website van ymere) nagaan of er een parkeerplaats, in de buurt, beschikbaar is om te huren. ,

House Name: For rent: House Maastrichterlaan in Beek
Garden: Present (1.215 m², located on the north-west)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Beautiful detached villa in Beek,
,Welcome to this unique living experience on the Maastrichterlaan, located in the attractive community of Beek. This villa is a real gem from the year 1960 and exudes a great mix of character and modern comfort. Perfect for bon vivants looking for a dream home with lots of space and luxury.,
,Upon arrival, you are welcomed by a generous front garden that flows seamlessly into an impressive backyard. With a plot area of no less than 1,810 m2, this villa offers plenty of privacy and tranquility. The view is magnificent but the backyard all the more so. Large covered terrace with jacuzzi, spacious pool with several terraces for loungers and a beautiful lawn with lots of greenery completes the picture. ,
,The villa itself exudes class with its detached location and authentic look. The various rooms are spacious and bathed in natural light thanks to the large windows.,
Luxury and comfort are central to this home with 134 m2 of living space in living room, kitchen and utility room there is room for everyone in the house with room for large dining tables, a separate study and cozy moments at the breakfast bar. ,
,Besides all the amenities in the kitchen like 5 burner gas-on-glass stove, combi microwave, dishwasher and built-in fridge-freezer, the pantry has extra storage space and a large oven for family dinners and garden parties.,
,On the second floors there are two spacious children's bedrooms and a master bedroom, all with parquet flooring. From the master bedroom is the very spacious roof terrace accessible where you can quietly enjoy the beautiful green views while enjoying a cup of coffee. ,
,The bathroom on this floor has a large walk-in shower with sun shower, bathtub and double sink. The toilet is located separately in the center of the hall. ,
,The loft ladder provides access to the large storage attic of approximately 40 m2 which offers sufficient height to create an extra bedroom after installing a staircase. ,
,In addition to all these square meters of living space, the house is also fully basement with usable area in the form of a laundry room, technical room, garage and storage space. These rooms are finished and with gravel floor making it really part of the house and can be used optimally. ,
,Beek is known for its cozy atmosphere and the many amenities nearby. From stores and restaurants to schools and sports facilities, everything is within easy reach. Moreover, the area lends itself perfectly to lovely walks in nature or relaxing bike rides through the Limburg countryside.,
,Are you an epicurean looking for luxury, comfort and space? Then this detached villa on the Maastrichterlaan in Beek is your ideal home. Be surprised by the charm and possibilities of this unique object and make every day a party. Make an appointment for a viewing soon and discover whether this villa is your dream home.,
,General,
,
,The property is rented furnished (negotiable),
,Is available per 1 January 2025,
,Rent is € 2.500,- per month excluding € 500,- furniture costs,
,Tenant facilitates own utilities,
,Alarm system is available but the tenant needs to take out his own subscription,
,This property is offered under the vacancy law. ,
,
,This information is not legaly binding,

House Name: For rent: House van Henegouwenstraat in Gouda
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,NOTE: TEMPORARY RENTAL FOR 12 MONTHS,
,Attractive living in the van Henegouwenstraat in Gouda!,
,What a wonderful place to call home is the Van Henegouwenstraat! Located in a friendly and sought-after neighborhood in Gouda, this street offers charming 1930s homes that are perfect for starters, families and (almost) retirees. The lively center of Gouda is within walking distance, as is the NS railway station which is only a five-minute walk away. Moreover, there are schools, sports clubs and playgrounds nearby.,
,By car, the connection to cities such as Rotterdam, The Hague and Utrecht is ideal via the A12 and A20 easy to reach. Here you can enjoy the best of both worlds: tranquility and yet everything within reach!,
,About the house: This attractive, fully furnished house is bright and spacious, with a cozy living room that offers access to a sunny and low maintenance backyard through French doors. The garden is equipped with a shed and a back entrance, perfect for summer days and enough space to enjoy the outdoors. The modern open kitchen is equipped with several built-in appliances, ideal for the cooking enthusiast.,
,On the first floor are two bedrooms, a study, and a nice bathroom with bath, shower, washbasin and toilet. On the second floor you will find a spacious attic, equipped with a washer, dryer, an extra TV or guest room, and a cozy master bedroom.,
,In short: This cozy, fully furnished and surprisingly spacious home is ready to temporarily become your home! And for the lovers: the owner would love it if you could look after his two cats as well, but this is not obligatory!,
,Interested? Contact us soon for a viewing and who knows, you may soon feel right at home in Van Henegouwenstraat!,
,PARTICULARS:,
For rent per January 2, 2025 - possibly in consultation,
Rent price € 1.850,00,
Rental period 12 months (possibility available to extend),
Security deposit € 3.700,00,
Advance payment € 350,00 (gas/water/electricity/internet/tv and municipal taxes),
Living area 115 m²,
Furnished,
Not suitable for students or house sharing,
Parking is possible with a parking permit, to be requested through the appropriate authorities.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Sophiastraat 13 RD in Haarlem
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Truly beautiful renovated maisonette house in the heart of Haarlem. Sustainability!, that is what our clients believe in and we of course completely agree with them. By completely switching off gas and using the most modern and sustainable way of heating by means of a heat pump and of course using the best wall/roof insulation, this house has obtained an energy label A, a mega achievement for a house that was originally built in 1885.,
,Living in the popular 'de Vijfhoek' in the historic center of Haarlem? This beautifully renovated maisonette offers everything you are looking for! Perfect for those who love space, atmosphere and modern luxury.,
,The first floor welcomes you with two beautiful rooms, separated by an authentic room en suite. One room is ideal to furnish as a spacious dining room/kitchen, especially with the top-of-the-line kitchen that you will find here. Think of a cooking island with induction hob, a Quooker, wine climate cabinet and more - here you can turn every meal (even the preparation) into a party!,
,On the second floor you will find two spacious bedrooms where you can also still see the roof trusses and a slightly smaller room, which can be perfectly furnished as a walk-in closet or cozy home office. The floor is also equipped with a modern separate toilet and a very stylish bathroom with a luxurious bath, walk-in shower and a washbasin with a beautiful large round mirror.,
,In short, a dream home in a top location!,
,Details:,
- Living area approx. 103m² and volume of 372m³,
- In addition to the monthly rent, the tenant must take care of the costs of gas, electricity, water, TV/Internet and municipal taxes,
- The house is offered partly decorated, this means that the floors are finished and that the lamps are hanging. The tenant can arrange something for the window decoration at his own discretion, curtain rails are of course already hung,
- Rental agreement of at least 18 months which will tacitly change into an indefinite period situation (Model A rental agreement),
- Favorable location with regard to all facilities the historic city center has to offer,
- Parking on the basis of a parking permit, more information can be obtained via the website of the municipality of Haarlem,
- Pets and smoking are/is not allowed,
- The landlord clearly prefers not to rent the house to house sharers,
- This house can be rented by a tenant with his own monthly stable sufficient income from work and unfortunately not with a guarantor or a tenant who will not live in the house himself.,

House Name: For rent: House Witte Herenstraat 25 in Haarlem
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Do you want to live in a luxurious dream home in a unique location? This one ticks all the boxes! A private parking space in front of the door, four bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a lovely outdoor area with sun. What else do you want?,
,Right in the center of Haarlem with all the shops and restaurants around the corner, but located in a quiet street. Surrounded by nice courtyards and beautiful churches (with no bell!). Within a few minutes walk you are at the central station of Haarlem, where you can take the train or the bus. Within a couple of minutes you are in the heart of Amsterdam.,
,Nestled in the charming, historic center of Haarlem, this impressive property spans nearly 200 m² across four expansive floors. Offering an ideal blend of space, luxury, and comfort, this house is perfect for those seeking modern living with the added benefit of an A energy label.,
,Ground Floor – Practical and Versatile Space,
Entering via a small staircase, you arrive on the ground floor, where two spacious rooms are separated by a convenient guest toilet. The rear room is ideal as a home office or study, perfect for anyone who works from home or simply wants a quiet space. The private parking space is accessible through the hallway at the rear of the home—an invaluable feature in the city center, especially for those who frequently use their car.,
,First Floor – Spacious Living Room and Luxury Kitchen,
A bright, stylish landing leads to the first floor, where you'll find the generous living room and modern open kitchen. Fully equipped with all essential built-in appliances, the kitchen strikes a perfect balance between functionality and elegance. This floor also opens up to a sunny terrace, divided into front and rear sections and connected by a charming walkway bridge. It’s an inviting outdoor space to enjoy the sun, right in the heart of the city.,
,Second Floor – Bedrooms and Bathroom,
The second floor offers two spacious bedrooms and an elegant bathroom, complete with a bathtub (including shower), washbasin, and toilet. Every detail is carefully finished, creating a luxurious ambiance throughout.,
,Top Floor – Master Bedroom and Luxury Bathroom,
On the top floor, the master bedroom awaits—a true oasis of tranquility. This room includes an en suite bathroom with double washbasin, toilet, bathtub, and a separate shower with underfloor heating. A private wellness experience within the comfort of your own home.,
,In summary, this modern and spacious home in the historic heart of Haarlem seamlessly combines space, comfort, and sustainability. Ideal for those looking for a stylish and energy-efficient residence in a vibrant and authentic urban setting!,
,Details:,
- Living area of 199m² and volume of 807m³, two spacious balconies together approx. 38m²,
- Private parking space on private ground behind the rented property,
- Centrally located in relation to train stations, highways and public transport options,
- Energy label A,
- Rental period is based on a fixed term (Model C rental agreement) for a fixed period of 24 months, after this rental period the moment is that the landlord returns from abroad and will live in the house again,
- In addition to the monthly rent, the tenant must take care of the costs of gas, electricity, water, TV/Internet, € 35.00 service costs (parking space and window cleaning) and municipal taxes,
- The house is rented fully furnished,
- The landlord clearly prefers not to rent the house to house sharers,
- This house can be rented by a tenant with his own monthly stable sufficient income from work and unfortunately not with a guarantor or a tenant who will not live in the house himself. - Pets and smoking are not allowed,

House Name: For rent: House Gedempte Schalk Burgergracht 66 in Haarlem
Garden: Present (28 m², located on the south-east)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,This great family house located at the Gedempte Schalk Burgergracht in Haarlem offers everything you need for modern comfort. After a thorough renovation, it is not only stylish, but also practically furnished with facilities that are often missing in standard houses: air conditioning in all rooms, two bathrooms, a garden and a beautiful balcony and more.,
,Living in the Transvaal district just above the station means a trendy and especially cozy neighborhood, which is especially popular with young families and residents between the ages of 25 and 44. The neighborhood is quiet, child-friendly and offers a nice balance between liveliness and tranquility.,
,The location could hardly be better. You are within cycling distance of the bustling center of Haarlem, within walking distance of a supermarket, and the train station is also quickly accessible. The nearest highway is within 8 minutes' drive, which further increases accessibility.,
,Ground floor: Entrance in hallway which leads to the modern toilet, the stairs to the other floors and immediately gives you a glimpse into the spacious living room with open kitchen. At the front of the house you will find the charming bay window with beautiful stained glass windows which provide a wonderful light. This cozy corner, furnished as a lounge, is guaranteed to become a favorite place for relaxing moments or a good conversation with a view of the front garden.,
,At the back of the house, the living room continues into the extension with double doors to a sunny, cozy garden. Here you can enjoy the outdoors undisturbed, with a bricked build storage room for all your garden tools. The modern kitchen is sleek and practically build. A handy kitchen island has been created around a support pillar, which separates the kitchen from the dining area in a nice way. The kitchen is otherwise equipped with a very beautiful stainless steel stove with convection oven and a gas hob with multiple gas burners. The appliance wall is equipped with a fridge/freezer, microwave and dishwasher, truly a kitchen that is simply made to serve the whole family.,
,First floor: A central landing connects the two spacious bedrooms and the first bathroom. At the rear is the 'master' bedroom with a fantastic 'walk-through wardrobe' and patio doors that provide access to the balcony, perfect for enjoying your coffee in the morning sun. This bedroom really exudes that luxurious hotel feeling. The 'master bathroom' is fully equipped with a bath, separate shower including rain shower, second toilet and a washbasin. At the front you will find a spacious bedroom, ideal for two children, complete with a bunk bed.,
,Second floor: On this floor we again have a central landing, which provides access to two bedrooms and an extra bathroom. Both rooms extend over the entire width of the house and have large dormer windows, creating a lot of extra space. The bathroom on this floor is cleverly designed, with a shower cabin, washbasin and even space for the washing machine and dryer, pleasantly practical and efficient for a busy household.,
,In short, this fully furnished home on the Gedempte Schalk Burgergracht is more than just a place to live; it offers a harmonious interplay of space, light and comfort.,
,Special features:,
- Living area approx. 132m², volume 477m³,
- Entire house is very beautiful and completely finished to modern standards (perhaps even above) and equipped with luxury and comfort, such as air conditioning in all rooms,
- In addition to the monthly rent, the tenant must take care of the costs of gas, electricity, water, TV/Internet, service costs of €55.00 and municipal taxes,
- The house is rented out fully furnished,
- Pets and smoking are/is not allowed,
- Temporary but extensive period until the owner returns from abroad available for rental for a minimum period of 18 and a maximum period of 30 months (rental agreement - Model C),
- Selection of tenant is based on landlord's approval.,
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------,
,Dit geweldige familiehuis gelegen aan de Gedempte Schalk Burgergracht in Haarlem biedt werkelijk alles wat je nodig hebt voor modern comfort. Na een grondige renovatie is het niet alleen stijlvol, maar ook praktisch ingericht met voorzieningen die vaak ontbreken in standaard huizen: airconditioning in alle vertrekken, twee badkamers, een tuin en een fraai balkon en meer.,
,Wonen in de Transvaalwijk vlak boven het station betekent een hippe en vooral gezellige buurt, die vooral populair is bij jonge gezinnen en bewoners tussen de 25 en 44 jaar. De wijk is rustig, kindvriendelijk en biedt een fijne balans tussen levendigheid en rust.,
,De ligging kan bijna niet beter. Je bent op fietsafstand van het bruisende centrum van Haarlem, op loopafstand van een supermarkt, en het treinstation is ook snel te bereiken. De dichtstbijzijnde snelweg is binnen 8 minuten rijden, wat de bereikbaarheid nog verder vergroot.,
,Parterre: Entree in gang welke leidt naar het moderne toilet, de trap naar overige verdiepingen en geeft je meteen een inkijkje in de ruimtelijke doorzonwoonkamer met open keuken. Aan de voorkant van de woning tref je de charmante erker aan met fraaie glas-in-lood-ramen welke een geweldige lichtval geven. Dit gezellige hoekje, ingericht als lounge, wordt gegarandeerd een favoriete plek voor relaxmomenten of een goed gesprek met uitzicht op de voortuin.,
,Aan de achterkant van de woning loopt de woonkamer door in de uitbouw met openslaande deuren naar een zonnige, knusse tuin. Hier kun je ongestoord van het buitenleven genieten, met een stenen berging voor al je tuingereedschap. De moderne keuken is strak en praktisch ingericht. Rondom een steunpilaar is een handig keukeneiland gecreëerd, wat de keuken op een leuke manier scheidt van het eetgedeelte. De keuken is voor de rest voorzien van een zeer fraai roestvrijstalen fornuis met heteluchtoven en een gaskookplaat met meerdere gasbranders. De apparatenwand is uitgerust met een koel,-/vriescombinatie, magnetron en vaatwasser, werkelijk een keuken die gewoon gemaakt is om het hele gezin van dienst te zijn.,
,Eerste verdieping: Een centrale overloop verbindt de twee ruime slaapkamers en de eerste badkamer. Aan de achterzijde bevindt zich de 'ouder' slaapkamer met een fantastische 'walk-through wardrobe' en openslaande deuren die toegang verlenen aan het balkon, perfect om in de ochtendzon van je koffie te genieten. Deze slaapkamer straalt echt dat luxe hotelgevoel uit. De 'master bathroom' is compleet uitgerust met een ligbad, aparte douche inclusief rainshower, tweede toilet en een wastafelmeubel. Aan de voorkant vind je een ruime slaapkamer, ideaal voor twee kinderen, compleet met een stapelbed.,
,Tweede verdieping: Op deze verdieping hebben we wederom een centrale overloop, die toegang biedt tot twee slaapkamers en een extra badkamer. Beide kamers strekken zich uit over de gehele breedte van het huis en zijn voorzien van grote dakkapellen, waardoor er veel extra ruimte ontstaat. De badkamer op deze verdieping is slim ingericht, met een douchecabine, wastafelmeubel en zelfs plek voor de wasmachine en droger, aangenaam praktisch en efficiënt voor een druk huishouden.,
,Kortom, deze compleet gemeubileerde woning aan de Gedempte Schalk Burgergracht is meer dan alleen een plek om te wonen; het biedt een harmonieus samenspel van ruimte, licht en comfort.,
,Bijzonderheden:,
- Woonoppervlak ca.132m², inhoud 477m³,
- Gehele woning is zeer fraai en helemaal naar de hedendaagse standaarden (wellicht zelfs daarboven) afgewerkt en voorzien van luxe en comfort, zoals bijvoorbeeld in alle kamers airconditioning,
- De huurder dient naast de maandelijkse huursom zorg te dragen voor de kosten van gas, elektra, water, TV/Internet, servicekosten van € 55,00 en Gemeentelijke belastingen,
- De woning wordt compleet gemeubileerd verhuurd,
- Huisdieren en roken zijn/is niet toegestaan,
- Tijdelijke doch ruime periode totdat eigenaar weer terugkeert vanuit het buitenland beschikbaar voor de verhuur voor een minimale periode van 18 en een maximale periode van 30 maanden (huurovereenkomst - Model C),
- Selectie huurder gaat op basis van gunning verhuurder.,

House Name: For rent: House Ceintuurbaan 21 in Haarlem
Garden: Present (22 m², located on the north-east)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Beautiful modern family home in a sought-after, child-friendly neighborhood! This property is available for a limited period as the owners will be working abroad during this time.,
,Located in the modern and popular residential area "De Remise," this spacious, energy-efficient family home is ideal for families. The neighborhood is quiet and child-friendly, with the Remiseplantsoen park just around the corner, a perfect play area for children. Parking is easy with a private parking space in the parking lot behind the house.,
,"De Remise" is a young residential area, recently completed (2017). These homes are well-insulated and equipped with solar panels, leading to low energy costs. The streets are low-traffic, and there are parking spaces nearby. The location is very central; you can easily reach the charming historic center of Haarlem by bike, with its variety of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options. The Heemstede-Aerdenhout and Haarlem-Central train stations, as well as the beaches of Zandvoort and Bloemendaal, are also within easy reach. Schools (including the ISH - International School Haarlem), public transport, and highways are in the immediate vicinity as well.,
,Ground floor: Via the hall with a modern toilet, you enter the spacious living room, which has a view and access to the cozy backyard through French doors. The garden has a shed and a back entrance. Behind the house, there is a parking lot where each home has a designated private parking space. At the front of the house, you’ll find the modern open kitchen, equipped with all kinds of built-in appliances, such as a large oven, dishwasher, gas stove with stainless steel extractor hood, and a fridge/freezer combination.,
,First floor: Central landing providing access to three bedrooms. At the rear is the spacious master bedroom, next to a smaller room which already has a wardrobe and is therefore ideal as a walk-in closet. At the front of the house is the third (bed)room. In addition to the bedrooms, the luxurious bathroom is also situated on this floor. The bathroom features a bathtub, walk-in shower, floating toilet, and double washbasin vanity.,
,Second floor: Landing where the washing machine and dryer (which will remain) are installed. The landing also provides access to a spacious attic room that spans the entire length of the house.,
,Details:,
- Living area of 112 m² and a volume of 400 m³,
- Private parking space on the lot behind the property,
- Centrally located near train stations, highways, and public transport options,
- Energy label A, with solar panels installed,
- Rental period is for a fixed term (Model C rental agreement) for a period of 24 months, after which the landlord will return from abroad and reoccupy the property,
- The tenant is responsible for the costs of gas, electricity, water, TV/Internet, €35.00 service costs (parking and window cleaning) and municipal taxes in addition to the monthly rent,
- The property will rented unfurnished (floors, window coverings, and lighting included), and the washing machine/dryer and wardrobe in the smallest bedroom will remain,
- The landlord clearly prefers not to rent the property to house sharers,
- The property can be rented by a tenant with a stable monthly income from work and unfortunately not with a guarantor or a tenant who will not personally occupy the property,
- Pets and smoking are not allowed,

                                                        ,MOLENLAANKWARTIER: Well-maintained 5-room FAMILY HOME with 2 bathrooms and a superb front- and backyard! The house is located close to several good schools and spacious parks.,
, Interested? Please respond by the contact buttons next to the description or send us an e-mail ,

The Molenlaankwartier is a charming and peaceful residential area in Rotterdam, located in the green and popular Hillegersberg district. The neighbourhood is known for its charming 1930s homes, wide avenues, and abundant greenery. With the Bergse Plassen within walking distance and several parks nearby, it is an ideal spot for nature lovers. The area has a village-like atmosphere with cozy shops, good schools, and excellent public transport connections to the center of Rotterdam. A perfect location for those who want to enjoy a quiet, green environment with all amenities within reach.,

New bathroom with a shower, sink with chest of drawers, floating toilet and towel radiator.,

Landing with access to all rooms and access to the washing machine connection.,
A spacious attic room with a dormer window on both sides.,
Bathroom with a bath with shower facilities, sink with chest of drawers, mirror cabinet and wall-mounted toilet.,

The sunny backyard has a back entrance.,
The backyard faces North-East.,
