House Name: For rent: House Park de Wervelaan 23 in Rijswijk
Garden: Present (30 m², located on the south-east)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Description:,
Unique, modern six bedroom house. This beautiful and spacious house is perfectly located between two green parks—Landgoed te Werve and Rijswijkse Bos. The house is modern, built in 2008, with a sunny backyard and front garden. It has a sustainable energy label A. It is located in the exclusive, family-friendly neighborhood of Park Te Werve, close to shopping area's, major roads, and public transport, with tram 17 within walking distance and Rijswijk train station a 5-minute bike ride away. Tennis courts and a small lake are also nearby, adding to the home’s appeal for sports and nature enthusiasts.,
,Layout:,
Enter through a charming garden path into a spacious hall, featuring a separate toilet and access to the garage with an electric door, ideal for bicycles or storage. The 64 m² living room with underfloor heating and a fireplace opens onto the garden via double doors. The adjacent modern kitchen includes high-end appliances: a fridge/freezer, dishwasher, 5-burner stove with oven, and microwave.,
,The first floor offers four bedrooms, a large bathroom with double sinks, a tub, and a shower and a separate toilet. Three bedrooms open to a roof terrace. The main bedroom has a private balcony. The second floor includes two more bedrooms, a bathroom with laundry facilities, a separate toilet, and extra storage.,
,Enjoy the tranquility, space, and high-quality finishes of this home in a highly sought-after location.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Eerste Helmersstraat 127 H in Amsterdam
Garden: Present (50 m², located on the east)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Beautifully renovated, turn-key triple-level ground-floor residence of 230 m², located on the quiet Eerste Helmersstraat in Amsterdam Oud-West. This home offers no less than four bedrooms and two bathrooms, is close to the Vondelpark, and boasts a charming view of the Poortgebouw of the former Wilhelmina Gasthuis.,
,AREA,
This charming home, located in the Oud-West district, is just a stone's throw from the Vondelpark. For daily shopping, there are various options such as the Albert Heijn on Overtoom or J.P. Heijestraat, as well as local bakeries and butcher shops nearby. The J.P. Heijestraat and Kinkerstraat offer a variety of shops, while the Ten Katemarkt is a great source of fresh products. You’ll find sports and relaxation facilities at David Lloyd gym and, of course, in the Vondelpark.,
,The property is easily accessible by both car and public transportation. The A10 ring road is reachable within 5 minutes. Numerous amenities are within easy reach, including nearby shopping streets and eateries, as well as several major museums within walking distance.,
,LAYOUT (see floor plans),
Ground Floor:,
Entering through a private entrance on the ground floor, you step into a spacious hallway with a separate toilet and cloakroom. The cozy living room, with ample natural light, has high ceilings (3.1 m) and oak floors, creating a warm and stylish atmosphere. There is also a separate dining room and an additional side room, ideal for a home office or children’s playroom. Underfloor heating is available throughout, with individual room controls.,
,First Floor:,
The sleeping quarters are located on the first floor. The generous master bedroom at the rear has a balcony with French doors, a built-in wardrobe, and an en-suite bathroom. This luxurious bathroom is equipped with high-quality fixtures: Mosa tiles, a Villeroy & Boch bathtub, a custom-made washbasin unit, and Dornbracht faucets. At the front of the property, there are two more spacious bedrooms.,
,Basement:,
In the charming basement, you'll find a fully-equipped kitchen. This luxurious kitchen, designed by Rhijnart, includes a Bora cooktop and Miele appliances, such as a steam oven, regular oven, coffee machine, Quooker, and a wine fridge. The Tudor-style façade across the full width can be opened to 2/3, allowing for a seamless transition from indoors to the south-facing outdoor space of approximately 70 m². Additionally, there is a large chill/sleep area at the front of the property and a bathroom with a separate bathtub (V&B), washbasin, and shower with Radomonte faucets and Mosa tiles.,
,SUSTAINABILITY,
This property has an energy label of A.,
,SPECIAL FEATURES,
,
,Turn-key double ground-floor residence,
,Generous south-facing backyard,
,Private entrance,
,Living area of 230 m²,
,High ceilings,
,Five bedrooms and two bathrooms,
,Spacious storage area,
,Good landlord practices apply; see our website,
,

,

House Name: For rent: Flat Logger 149 in Amstelveen
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Stunning Penthouse with Beautiful Views over Amstelveen and Surroundings!,
,A penthouse with a terrace of approximately 30 m² and fantastic views over Amstelveen and the surrounding area.,
This well-maintained apartment of approximately 148 m² offers everything you need. It is a duplex apartment spread across the 9th and 10th floors, with plenty of windows and natural light. All amenities are within immediate reach, including the shopping centers Waardhuizen, Groenhof, and Middenhoven for your daily groceries. Within 5 minutes by public transport (tram 51 and various bus lines), you can reach the City Center of Amstelveen. Other major roads and schools (including the international school) are also easily accessible. Parking is available without a permit right in front of the building.,
,LAYOUT,
Upon entering the 9th floor, you step into the entrance, which provides direct access to a neat cloakroom and storage space. The spacious living room offers ample natural light thanks to large windows and forms the heart of this floor. From the living room, you move into the modern kitchen, fully equipped with high-quality built-in appliances.,
Adjacent to the living room is a beautiful rooftop terrace, located on the sun side, offering complete privacy. You can enjoy the sun from 9:00 AM to 7:00 PM and cool off under an outdoor shower with both hot and cold water.,
On the other side of the apartment, there is a spacious bedroom with a jacuzzi and a door leading to the rooftop terrace. Connected to the bedroom is a walk-in closet and a very large, exclusive bathroom featuring a double shower with a rain shower function.,
,A stylish staircase leads to the 10th floor, where there is an additional room. This generous room offers numerous possibilities, whether you use it as a master bedroom or as a work/hobby space. There is also a bathroom here, complete with a shower and toilet, providing ultimate comfort and privacy.,
,The apartment is equipped with underfloor heating in all rooms.,
,Summary:,
This penthouse offers a combination of luxury, space, and comfort. It is the ideal home for anyone looking for a peaceful living environment with ample space to enjoy and relax.,
,The measurement instruction is based on NEN2580. This instruction is intended to provide a more uniform method of measuring to give an indication of the usable floor area. However, it does not fully exclude differences in measurement results due to interpretation differences, rounding, or limitations during the measurement process.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Verdronkenoord 28 L in Alkmaar
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Beautiful 2-room apartment available in a monumental building at the water of the Verdronkenoord with a parking space behind the building in the beautiful city center of Alkmaar!,
,When you enter the monumental building, secured with a videophone, you will see a beautiful marble floor.,
The monumental building was completely renovated in 2017 and this 2-room apartment on the second floor has now become available again.,
,Layout apartment Verdronkenoord 28-L:,
Entrance with luxury kitchen, cozy living room with skylights that provide sufficient light, neat bedroom, and modern bathroom with shower, sink, towel radiator, toilet, and connection for washing machine / dryer.,
,With the exception of the wet room, the apartment is equipped with laminate, net curtains, curtains and/or roller blinds.,
The finishing level of the apartment is very high. The kitchen is equipped with Siemens built-in appliances including a combination microwave, induction hob, extractor hood, dishwasher and fridge freezer.,
,The apartment has a personal parking space (closed on site), and there is a shared bicycle shed.,
The apartment is available from December 1, 2024.,

,
,Rent € 950,- per month;,
,Available from December 1, 2024;,

,one-off mutation costs of € 250,- that the tenant must pay to the lessor;,

,

Hot water supply through boiler.,
Rental price is excluding TV/internet connections and municipal taxes.,
,Location:,
Is it possible to live comfortably in a building with history? Yes, and in the heart of Alkmaar too. In a monumental Neo-Renaissance building from 1889 designed by the Alkmaar architect F. Vetser (1829-1903), 12 luxuriously finished apartments have been realized at Verdronkenoord 28 (former bank office). The monumental building is beautifully situated along the Alkmaar canal in the historic Alkmaar city center with the shopping / catering area within walking distance. In the immediate vicinity is the Accijnstoren, Eenhoornbrug and the famous Sint Laurentiuskerk.,
,Heart of Alkmaar,
At the end of the Verdronkenoord you are in the heart of Alkmaar. The Platte Stenenbrug, the Waagplein and D'Oude stad, with numerous cafes and restaurants and in the summer the world-famous cheese market. The extensive shopping area around Laat and Langestraat is also nearby.,
,An ideal residential location for anyone who loves the living comfort of today and the atmosphere and appearance of the past.,

House Name: For rent: House Riouwstraat in Utrecht
Garden: Present (9 m², located on the east)
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,This nice, bright family home with 3 bedrooms, modern kitchen and city garden in the popular district of Lombok will be available mid-December . The house is from the early 20th century and is characterized by high ceilings and large, high windows, which provide a lot of light. The ground floor has a beautiful and well-maintained wooden floor. Delivery is upholstered, but furnished is also negotiable. There's an olive tree in the city garden.,
,Lombok is a hip, multicultural neighborhood adjacent to the city center and central station, which can be reached on foot or by bike in minutes. With its specialty shops in meat, vegetables, fruit, etc., which are displayed on the sidewalk, it has an oriental, but very own atmosphere. In recent years, the district has become very popular with a highly educated public and expatriates.,
,You can park in front of the door with a parking permit and the bus stops around the corner. There is also a guarded bicycle shed on the same corner.,
,Layout:,
Ground floor: Access to the toilet and living room through the hallway. The living room measures almost 8 meters in length and has large windows at the front and rear. At the rear is a modern kitchen with hardwood worktops, a 4-burner gas stove, built-in refrigerator, combination microwave and a dishwasher. A kitchen boiler provides instant hot water.,
Through the kitchen you go to the cozy, low-maintenance city garden. It contains a flower bed, an olive tree and access to the storage room with the washing machine connection. ,
,1st floor:,
Via the stairs you reach a landing, which gives access to the master bedroom (4.10 x 2.85 m), the bathroom and a smaller (2 x 3.50 m) bedroom. In the large bedroom a wardrobe with hanging and lying area, sock drawer, etc.,
The bathroom has a walk-in shower, double sink with furniture, a second toilet and a towel radiator.,
,2nd floor:,
Via a fixed staircase you reach the attic where a full, spacious bedroom or guest room can be furnished. There is also a lot of storage space here.,
,

House Name: For rent: House Hoogstraat in Weesp
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Would you like to live in a thoroughly and optimally renovated property with high ceilings, restored to its former glory, as part of the historic waterfront on the prominent Hoogstraat? Imagine enjoying a majestic view of the Vecht River in front, with the vibrant center of Weesp, now part of the municipality of Amsterdam, behind you. Recently, a stylish home built in 1913 has been renovated to meet today’s sustainability standards.,
,The panoramic view spans the Vecht River, the vast and spacious Groene Punt, traditional Dutch drawbridges, and the well-known historical fortifications. The restoration has preserved original style elements, such as stained glass windows and doors, as well as the visible beams on the second floor, while the interior exudes luxury and comfort. The traditional French balcony railing in the distinctive front facade is also authentic. The house is gas-free and maximally energy-efficient, with double glazing, underfloor heating, a heat pump, solar panels, and maximum insulation of the walls and roof. This charming residence successfully combines classic allure with modern comfort and is now available for rent "partially furnished.",
,Weesp Center, Living Environment, and Accessibility,
Located in a prime A1 location, the center of Weesp offers high-quality amenities with its cozy terraces, cafes, restaurants, and shops just around the corner. The Weesp train station is within walking distance, with a 17-minute train ride taking you to the heart of Amsterdam. The A1 and A9 highways provide excellent connections, making Utrecht, Hilversum, and Schiphol Airport easily accessible. The green, scenic Gooi area with its special facilities is also nearby. The municipality of Weesp provides parking options for a personal vehicle in the immediate vicinity.,
,Ground Floor and Basement,
Upon entry, you are welcomed into a hallway with original tiles, stained glass details, a separate coat closet, and a toilet. The hallway leads to the spacious living room, where high ceilings and underfloor heating add a modern touch to the cozy space. The stained glass transom windows allow atmospheric light, and French doors open to a beautifully landscaped L-shaped southwest-facing patio, perfect for relaxing or dining.,
,The kitchen is a centerpiece: modern and fully equipped with advanced built-in appliances, including a Quooker, ample oven capacity, and a beautifully marbled worktop. The kitchen also opens to the patio, and a back entrance provides direct access to Achteromstraat.,
,A hatch in the living room offers access to the spacious basement, providing additional storage.,
,First Floor,
On the first floor, you’ll find two spacious bedrooms, both filled with natural light and featuring characteristic stained glass windows. The master bedroom at the front has a French balcony overlooking the Vecht and the Groene Punt, while the rear bedroom offers views of the Laurentiuskerk. Both bedrooms have original built-in closets.,
,This floor also features one of two new, luxurious bathrooms, complete with a bathtub, a walk-in shower, a double sink vanity with modern design faucets, and a toilet.,
,Second Floor,
The completely renovated attic floor adds significant value to the home. Here, there are two large bedrooms with exposed wooden beams on the ceiling, preserving the unique atmosphere. This floor also includes a second luxury bathroom, equipped with a walk-in shower, vanity, and toilet, ideal for children or guests.,
,Garden,
The sunny, southwest-facing patio offers plenty of privacy and is beautifully landscaped, providing the perfect spot to enjoy the afternoon sun. The garden’s back entrance provides access through the neighboring property to Achteromstraat.,
,Rental Conditions,
The rental price is exclusive of energy (electricity), water, and user charges.,
A one-month security deposit is required.,
Minimum rental period is one year, and immediate occupancy is possible.,
Required documentation from the tenant:,
Copy of ID;,
Three recent pay slips;,
Recent signed employer’s declaration;,
Bank statements showing salary deposits as per submitted pay slips;,
Recent signed landlord reference;,
Bank statements showing the last three rental payments.,
,Details,
Prime A1 location,
Very low energy costs,
Fully renovated with high-quality finishes,
Property is rented partially furnished,
Living area of 125 m²,
Luxury amenities: heat pump, solar panels, underfloor heating,
Two modern bathrooms,
Three toilets,
Excellent insulation with double glazing,
Stained glass windows and high ceilings preserved,
Basic lighting provided,
Sunny southwest-facing patio,
Located in the center of Weesp with views of the Vecht and Groene Punt,
Energy label A+,
Excellent location near amenities and public transport,
One-month security deposit,
Monthly rent €3,500, exclusive of energy (electricity), water, and user charges, incl. partial property tax (WOZ).,
,This home offers a unique blend of classic charm and modern luxury, maximum sustainability in the heart of historic Weesp. Ready for move-in to enjoy all its comfort and sustainable features!,

House Name: For rent: House D.L. Hudigstraat in Amsterdam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,If you are interested, please do send us an-email. Not for sharing , not for students!,
An upholstered and recently completely painted family house with three bedrooms, private parking, lots of space (137m2) in a quiet place, located on the D. L. Hudigstraat. A large family house of no less than ****** m2 with fantastic high ceilings Two or possibly three spacious bedrooms. Very spacious and sunny living room, spacious kitchen, two roof terraces and a private indoor garage, centrally located in the child-friendly Oostelijk Havengebied with the possibility of office/work at home!,
,Ground floor floor,
Entrance on the street side through the front door or the integral garage. At the rear of the ground floor is a multifunctional space, which can be used as a bedroom-guest room or as a workspace. The loft with glass floor at the back gives this spacious room a lot of light.,
First floor,
You reach the living floor via the stairs. The ceiling height of 3.25m immediately catches the eye. Landing with toilet room. . At the front is the living room of no less than 25 m2. The windows (almost from floor to ceiling) give this room a special appearance. The kitchen diner is located at the rear! This is fully equipped.,
Second floor,
Through the landing you can enter the first terrace. In the hall is a separate space for the washing machine and dryer connexion. The second floor has two bedrooms. The bathroom has a walk-in shower, a bath, washbasin, toilet. From the terrace there is a staircase to the spacious roof terrace.,
Third floor,
Roof terrace of 39m2, here you can enjoy the sun all day long, from the early morning sun to the late evening sun.,
,Surroundings,
The house is located on the quiet Sporenburg Island in the middle of the Eastern Docklands. The Eastern Docklands is known for its modern architecture, spaciousness and, of course, contact with the water. Within walking distance are an Albert Heijn and shopping center Brazil (including Jumbo, Odin, Grape District, Etos, Marqt and a pharmacy). In addition, there are several schools in the area, a caterer, furniture stores such as Pol's Potten and Sissy Boy Homeland, gyms, the Lloyd Hotel, Club Panama, HappyHappyJoyJoy, Anne & Max, Pata Negra, De Zuid, Bombarie and Roest. The Javastraat and Czaar Peterstraat are also within cycling distance with many trendy shops and restaurants. On Wednesdays there is an organic market around the corner. For water lovers, there is a small harbour, or close to a marina and a sailing school. In addition, various jetties to moor your boat before sailing to the canals of Amsterdam or for a refreshing dive.,
,Accessibility,
,You can reach the center or the Central Station in 15 minutes by bike. Tram 7 or 26 will take you to the center or CS in a short time. With the Oostveer you have a very good connection with Amsterdam North. You can reach the A10 via the Piet Heintunnel in a few minutes by car. Within walking distance are shopping center Brazil (including Albert Heijn, Jumbo, Marqt and pharmacy), within walking distance there is an organic market every Wednesday, various schools, a caterer, furniture stores such as Pol's Potten and Sissy Boy Homeland, gyms, the Lloyd Hotel, Club Panama, For water lovers there is a marina and a sailing school nearby.,

,The herringbone floor continues into the living room, which has plenty of light through the large windows in the front facade and overlooks the playing field. A wide passage with a cellar cupboard connects the living room to the dining area and the semi-open kitchen at the rear.,
,Kitchen: The corner kitchen has a modern plastic worktop and built-in appliances, including a 5-burner gas hob, extractor hood, fridge, combination microwave oven and dishwasher. The dining area offers space for a generous dining table and leads through garden doors to the covered terrace. The utility room is equipped with white goods connections and offers access to the garden, a separate toilet and the garage.,
,Garage: The garage is equipped with a kitchenette and the unit for the underfloor heating. The driveway is accessed through French doors and the garage also has French doors to the rear garden.,
,First floor: Stairs take you to the first floor, where the master bedroom is located at the front and occupies the full width. Air conditioning provides comfort in hot months. The second bedroom is at the rear. Both bedrooms are finished with oak wooden floors, wooden (tilt-and-turn) window frames with double glazing, stucco walls and sprayed ceilings.,
,Bathroom: The fully tiled bathroom is equipped with a washbasin, bathtub, shower and hanging toilet. A radiator provides pleasant warmth. A wall cupboard offers additional storage space, and the window provides plenty of natural light, giving the bathroom a fresh look.,
,Second floor: The second floor is accessed via a fixed staircase. The window in the side wall provides light into the stairwell. Thanks to the two dormers at the front and rear, there are several possibilities for use, such as an extra bedroom or study. Also located here are the central heating boiler (Nefit Economy HR, 2004) and the heat recovery system (Bergschenhoek WHR90/WHR91, 2004).,

House Name: For rent: Flat Zeestraat 54 C in Den Haag
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,Zeestraat 54-C The Hague / upholstered,
,The combination of spatial classical architecture and urban living is very rare, but this house presents both characteristics excellently. With many well-maintained ornaments throughout the property, the high ceilings, the classic architecture, large balcony and of course the beautiful shared backyard makes this house a hidden gem of the city. This 143 m2 upholstered apartment consists of 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, a spacious living room and an en-suite kitchen. The apartment is in excellent condition and emphasizes the classic features of the property such as beautiful ornaments on the walls and ceiling and high class wooden floors. ,
,This house is surrounded by characteristic streets and squares with local shops, nice cafes and restaurants and is within walking distance of the center of The Hague. And not to forget is the beautifully landscaped palace garden to relax. It is located directly opposite of Panorama Mesdag and near Noordeinde Palace. There is a public parking garage just around the corner underneath the Hilton hotel (Mauritskade). Dutch history, art and culture is not far to seek. In short, the ideal place to enjoy the royal Dutch city.,
,Layout:,
The entrance to the building is on the ground floor, after which you can choose the stairs or the elevator on the left side of the hallway or the entrance to the spacious shared backyard. The entrance to the apartment is on the second floor, entering amid a long hallway. On the left is the spacious living room with three large windows. The kitchen is connected to the living room and is equipped with all necessary appliances. Attached to the kitchen is a spacious scullery or laundry space. Back in the hall on the left is a large space to hang coats and next is the guest toilet. At the end of the hall is a large bedroom with two patio doors to the balcony, a floor to ceiling closet and a bathroom including a (rain)shower, bathtub, toilet, bidet and double washbasin. On the balcony you can enjoy the beautiful view towards the garden. Next to the large bedroom is the second bedroom which also has a door to enter the balcony and a bathroom including a toilet, (rain)shower and washbasin. ,
,In this property it is not allowed to own pets and not allowed to smoke inside. ,

,centrally located, in midst of history, art and international buildings such as embassies, Hilton Hotel and Carlton Ambassador Hotel,,
,spacious balcony,,

In the neighborhood, you’ll find plenty of charming shops, restaurants, and cafes (e.g., de Biertuin, Five Brothers Fat, Louie Louie, Brouwerij 't IJ, and Bukowski). Within walking and biking distance, you’ll find the well-known Dappermarkt, Oosterpark, Flevopark, and Artis. In short, an ideal place to live.,
,The apartment is easily accessible by car via the A10 ring road. Public transportation is also nearby, with bus and tram lines and Muiderpoort station within walking distance.,
,LAYOUT,
Via the communal (wide) staircase, you reach this lovely apartment on the first floor. The hallway provides access to all rooms and includes handy storage space. At the front, there is a spacious and bright living room with oak parquet flooring, an open kitchen equipped with various built-in appliances, such as a dishwasher and a six-burner SMEG gas stove with a large oven. At the back, there is the dining area, which provides access to the storage room with a washing machine connection and to the extra-deep balcony facing the sunny south. The bathroom features a delightful bathtub, walk-in shower, and sink. There is a separate toilet in the hallway.,

House Name: For rent: Flat Von Geusaustraat in Voorburg
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,A charming double upper house featuring three bedrooms, two balconies, a communal bicycle cellar, and a private storage room.,
,Description,
,This distinctive upper house, built in 1954, is nestled in the charming Voorburg Noord district and has an approximate living area of 114m². Well-maintained and move-in ready, this property offers three bedrooms and even a versatile hallway that can serve as a home office. The modern kitchen opens up to a 3.5m² balcony, while the second balcony can be accessed from one of the bedrooms on the same floor. Additionally, a spacious private storage room of 16m² can be found in the basement.,
,No Student, No pets, and No Sharing,
,Lay-out,
,As you step into the welcoming hall, you'll find a conveniently located toilet with a hand basin, a meter cupboard, and a wardrobe. Continuing from the hall, you'll discover a cozy 9m² bedroom complete with fitted wardrobes, offering access to a northeast-facing first balcony. The hall also gives access to a modern and well-equipped kitchen of 10m² with a six-burner gas stove/oven, dishwasher, fridge-freezer, and a separate microwave, all complemented by ample cupboard space. From the kitchen, you can step out onto the rear southwest-facing balcony, which includes a handy balcony cupboard housing the central heating system. The stairs to the fourth floor are discreetly situated in a section of the hall that can be enclosed, making it a versatile space perfect for use as a home office or workspace.,
,Through the wooden open staircase you can reach the landing, where you'll find access to the bathroom and two bedrooms measuring 17m² and 8m², both offering ample closet space. The generously sized bathroom of 7m², features a shower cabin, a relaxing bubble bath, a washbasin, a second toilet, as well as a convenient washing machine and dryer. This floor is exceptionally bright, thanks to the presence of four skylights that flood the space with natural light.,
,Location,
,This delightful residence is conveniently situated near the charming 'Theresiastraat' shopping street and the 'Koningin Julianaplein' shopping center. Additionally, schools, sports facilities, and playgrounds and parks are practically around the corner, making this location both practical and enjoyable.,
,Transportation,
,The Voorburg Noord district enjoys a strategic location with easy access to major highways such as Prins Clausplein, A4, A12, and A13, as well as an array of public transportation options, including NS stations The Hague Laan van NOI and Voorburg, Randstadrail, buses, and trams.,
,Amenities,
,Fully furnished,
,Near the shopping area,
,Close to parks,
,Public transport nearby,
,2 balconies,

House Name: For rent: House De Zarken in Monnickendam
Description:
,Description,

                                                        ,For Rent this unique property in Monnickendam close to the harbour and the cute centre of the village.,
,Features:,
,- Completely open plan living and dining area with gas powered fireplace,
- Beautiful, modern, luxury open kitchen fully equipped including cooking island and all built-in appliances,
- Master bedroom with onsuite bathtub and balcony access,
- Second, smaller bedroom which can also serve as a study/home office,
- Generous garden with nice terraced sitting area,
- Main bathroom has double rain showers as well as WC and double wash basins,
- Separate walk-in closet,
- Washing machine and dryer included,
- High quality wooden floors throughout,
- Lots of storage,
- Free parking,
- Direct bus connection, 25 minute journey to Amsterdam Central station,
,Location: Monnickendam: A Charming Town with a Rich History,
,Nestled on the shores of the Markermeer lake, Monnickendam is a picturesque town that seamlessly blends historical charm with modern amenities. With its idyllic canals, quaint streets, and vibrant harbour, Monnickendam offers a unique and tranquil lifestyle just a short distance from Amsterdam.,
,Step back in time as you wander through Monnickendam's well-preserved medieval center. Admire the iconic Speeltoren, a 16th-century bell tower that once served as a prison, and explore the fascinating Monnickendam Museum, housed in a beautifully restored 16th-century weigh house.,
,Enjoy the peaceful atmosphere of Monnickendam, where life moves at a slower pace. Take a leisurely stroll along the harbor, lined with charming cafes and restaurants, or explore the scenic waterfront by boat. With its abundance of green spaces and recreational opportunities, Monnickendam is the perfect place to escape the hustle and bustle of city life.,
,Convenient Location,
,Despite its tranquil setting, Monnickendam is conveniently located just a short distance from Amsterdam. With excellent public transportation links, you can easily access all that the capital city has to offer while enjoying the peace and quiet of Monnickendam.,
,Monnickendam is a close-knit community with a welcoming atmosphere. With a variety of local shops, restaurants, and cultural events, there's always something to see and do in this vibrant town.,
,Investing in Monnickendam,
,Monnickendam has something to offer everyone. With its rich history, charming atmosphere, and convenient location, Monnickendam is the perfect place to call home.,
,Conditions:,
,NO SHARING ALLOWED,
,Short term lease is discussable,
,Pets in consultation,
,Alongside the monthly rent is payable:,
,€ 295,- advanced payment for G/W/E – with settlement – amount can be amended based on the amount of occupants (single is different then family of 3),
€55,- for TV/Internet (Ziggo basic package),
€34,- besides the liability insurance of the tenant, this insurance offers basic insurance for the tenant (for any potential damages to the property/furniture),
,Rental agreement on the basis of a model C-contract: break for the owner after 12 months – tenant can cancel after 12 months,
,Tenancy agreements subject to owner’s consent,
A copy of the energy certificate will be provided to the tenant.,
,This property may be rented by a tenant with their own temporarily paid income from work but unfortunately not via guarantee of someone who will not live in the house themselves.,
,For more information about this property or about our total portfolio call our office or visit our website.,
Our team of specialists will be happy to assist you.,
